Name: Foil Network
Description:
FOIL Network is a new standard ﻿of interoperable and elastic Blockchain-as-a-service (BaaS) technology. It focuses on establishing a credible system for verified identities of investors, contributors, community members, validators and counterparties based on immutable and transparent blockchain technology.
Foil Network is airdropping 100 FOIL to users who complete simple tasks. Complete the social tasks, create a Foil wallet and mint testnet NFT and submit your details to the airdrop form.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Foil Network airdrop form.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and quote retweet this tweet while also tagging three friends.
Follow them on Instagram.
Create a Foil wallet by following this instruction.
Create your Testnet NFT by following this instruction.
Submit your details to this airdrop form.
You will get 100 FOIL.

Name: DogemonGO
Description:
DogemonGo was created by Frozen Limited with Shemie Suarez as the lead developer. It aims to introduce people to the world of crypto with a fun and exciting game. DOGO is the native token in the DogemonGo ecosystem that can be used to purchase Rocket Balls, renew monthly Trainer Licence and earn Dogecoins on a daily basis.
DogemonGO is giving away a total of $30,000 worth of DOGO to top and random participants of the giveaway campaign. Sign up for the giveaway, download the DogemonGO app and complete simple tasks to win the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the DogemonGO giveaway page.
Submit your email.
Now download the DogemonGO App.
Submit your BSC wallet address from the app to the giveaway page.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter.
Verify your mail.
You will get 200 points.
Also complete the additional tasks to earn more points.
Also earn 100 points for each referral.
Top 3,000 participants with the most number of points will get up to $1,800 in DOGO.
A total of 1,150 random participants will win up to $30 worth of DOGO.
Additional prizes for TikTok, Youtube and Meme creators.

Name: Augmented Finance
Description:
Augmented Finance is a DeFi liquidity protocol for high-yield lending and low-interest borrowing of digital assets, launched fairly and enabled by artificial intelligence (AI). They're on a mission to help users achieve and secure financial independence and to be their trusted long-term source of income and liquidity.
Augmented Finance public testnet is finally launched on Kovan! A $15,000 reward pool of $AGF will be distributed amongst participants for engaging in various activities. The more bugs, UI/UX inconsistencies, improvement suggestions you report, the higher chances to win better rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Augmented Finance giveaway signup form.
Join their Discord testnet feedback channel.
Join their Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and like and retweet this tweet and also tag at least 5 friends.
Follow them on Reddit.
Follow them on Medium.
Subscribe to their newsletter.
Now go to their testnet page.
Connect your Metamask wallet and change the network to Kovan test network.
Now get some testnet tokens by following this instruction.
See this testnet manual and perform the testnet assignmnets.
Submit your testnet activity details to this testing report form.
Submit your details to the giveaway signup form.
A total of 81 winners will be selected based on their activities to win up to $1,000 worth of AGF.
The more bugs, UI/UX inconsistencies, improvement suggestions, etc. you report, the higher the chance to win better rewards.
The rewards will be distributed to winners after the launch of the Augmented protocol (September 2021).
For more information regarding the testnet campaign, see this Medium article.

Name: Songbird
Description:
Songbird is the Canary network for Flare, it will have two distinct phases. Prior to the launch of Flare, Songbird will be instrumental in the continued testing of the Flare Time Series Oracle, the StateConnector and F-Asset systems and the network architecture. Post Flare launch, Songbird is intended to be a long term network for testing governance led changes to Flare, such as the incorporation of new F-Assets, changes to the FTSO, F-Asset systems or any other network change.
Songbird will be airdropping free SGB to XRP holders based on the same snapshot as of Flare which was taken at the first validated XRP ledger index number with a timestamp greater than or equal to 00:00 GMT on 12th December 2020. Eligible users will get free SGB at a ratio of 0.1511 SGB : 1 XRP.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Songbird will be airdropping free SGB to FLR airdrop participants.
The snapshot remains the same as of Flare which was taken at the first validated XRP ledger index number with a timestamp greater than or equal to 00:00 GMT on 12th December 2020.
If you’re eligible for the FLR airdrop through an exchange, then you’re also eligible for the SGB airdrop but you may need to contact the exchange to get a confirmation.
If you’re eligible for the FLR airdrop through a self custody wallet and have completed the claim process before June 12th, 2021, then you will also get free SGB.
Ledger users will be able to claim SGB through a Songbird app for Ledger which is pending approval from the Ledger Team. Ledger users will also have the option to import the seed phrase/private keys from the ETH address they’ve used as the message key into another Songbird supported wallets like Metamask, Bifrost or D’cent.
The rewards will be distributed around the launch of Songbird at a ratio of 0.1511 SGB : 1 XRP.
For more information regarding Songbird, see this page and for information regarding the Flare FLR airdrop , see this article.

Name: Tokel
Description:
Tokel aims to be the best decentralized token platform on offer. It will provide a solid foundation, using existing Komodo Technologies, for token projects to launch and succeed from by offering end-to-end token solutions for fixed supply and non-fungible tokens.
Tokel is airdropping a minimum of 5,000,000 TKL to users who hold TKL by the snapshot date. A snapshot will be taken on September 15th at 8 pm UTC and eligible holders will receive free TKL via two time-locked transactions. Half of the total pool will be time-locked for 9 months, the other 18 months. Any unsold TKL from the IDO will also be added to the airdrop pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Buy and hold TKL before the snapshot date to be eligible for the airdrop.
The snapshot will be taken on September 15th at 8 pm UTC.
Users can purchase TKL from AtomicDEX. For more information regarding this, see this article.
Eligible holders will get free TKL proportional to the amount of TKL they’re holding.
Any unsold TKL from the IDO will also be added to the airdrop pool.
All premine addresses apart from the 20 million Early Adopter allocation will be excluded from the airdrop.
Half of the airdrop pool will be time-locked for 9 months and the remaining half for 18 months.
For more information regarding the airdrop. see this Medium article.

Name: CEX.IO
Description:
CEX.IO is the leading cryptocurrency ecosystem and trading platform. With CEX.IO, you can easily buy, sell, exchange, store, and earn 100+ more cryptocurrencies. It accepts Visa, MasterCard, bank transfers and other payment ways.
CEX.IO is giving away a total of $3,000 worth of SOL to 20 lucky giveaway participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway page to get a chance to win up to $500 worth of SOL.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the CEX.IO giveaway page.
Click on “Enter Giveaway”.
Now complete simple social tasks to get up to 29 entries.
Also get 3 entries for each referral.
A total of 20 winners will be randomly selected to win a total of $3,000 worth of SOL.
Fifteen participants will win $100 worth of SOL each, two participants will win $200 worth of SOL each, two participants will win $300 worth of SOL each and one participant will win a grand prize of $500 worth of SOL.

Name: CRD Network
Description:
CRD is a utility token used on the CRD Network, a DeFi ecosystem bridging crypto and traditional financial services. By using the CRD Network app, you would be able to use DeFi in a compliant manner, so you could easily declare your earnings to the bank later.
CRD Network is airdropping a minimum of 500 CRD to participants who complete the below tasks. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to get 500 CRD. Convert ETH for a minimum of 10,000 CRD in the Sushiswap/Tacoswap ETH-CRD liquidity pool and submit your details to the airdrop form to get an airdrop of CRD equal to the amount you’ve exchanged.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the CRD Network airdrop form.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter.
Retweet the pinned airdrop tweet using hashtag #crd10, tag @CRDnetwork and tag at least three friends.
Follow them on Reddit.
Follow them on Discord.
Follow them on Bitcointalk.
You will get 500 CRD.
Exchange ETH for a minimum of 10,000 CRD in the Sushiswap/Tacoswap ETH-CRD liquidity pool and hold it till 20th September. (Optional)
Submit your details to the airdrop form
You will get an airdrop of CRD equal to the amount you’ve exchanged.
If more than 80M CRD is bought & held during the airdrop period, then the airdrop distribution will be based on first come first serve.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this page.

Name: Swapr
Description:
Swapr is a multi-chain automated market maker (AMM), deployed on Ethereum mainnet, xDai, and Arbitrum. Swapr is the first AMM to allow for adjustable swap fees through governance, as well as the first DAO deployed DeFi protocol on Ethereum; developed organically within the DXdao community.
Swapr is airdropping a total of 12,000,000 SWPR to various communities. 1inch gov fee voters, Omen users, xSDT holders, BanklessDAO voters, Swapr users, users who’ve voted “Yes” to deploy Uniswap on Arbitrum, Dex.guru traders, Dxdao POAP holders, users who’ve provided liquidity on Swapr and DXD holders are eligible to claim free SWPR.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Swapr airdrop claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will see the amount of SWPR tokens you can claim.
Now change the network from “Ethereum” to “Arbitrum”.
You will be needing some ETH on Arbitrum to claim the tokens. Swapr will direct you to the Arbitrum bridge if you don’t currently have ETH on Arbitrum.
Claim your tokens once you bridge some ETH to Arbitrum.
A snapshot was taken on July 1st, 2021 of 1inch gov fee voters, Omen users, xSDT holders, BanklessDAO voters, Swapr users, users who’ve voted “Yes” to deploy Uniswap on Arbitrum, Dex.guru traders, Dxdao POAP holders and users who’ve provided liquidity on Swapr. A total of 4,000,000 SWPR has been allocated to these communities.
 A snapshot of DXD holders who had at least 0.5 DXD was taken on August 19th, 2021 at midnight UTC. A total of 8,000,000 SWPR has been allocated to DXD holders.
Eligible participants have until December 31st, 2021 to claim the airdrop.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article. For a step-by-step guide to claim the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: BullionFX
Description:
BullionFX ecosystem represents the future of decentralized banking and finance. Its BULL token is bought back and burned with transaction fees generated from applicable assets bought and sold on the BullionFX trading platform — including our forthcoming token $GOLD, the first institutionally audited gold token in the world.
BullionFX is airdropping a total of $5,000 worth of BULL to users who complete simple social tasks. Create an account at DigiFinex, complete the required social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to get an equal share from the total airdrop pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the BullionFX airdrop form.
Create an account at DigiFinex.
Follow them on Twitter and like, retweet the pinned tweet and also tag @mike_maloney & 3 other friends.
Join the BullionFX Telegram group and Digifinex Telegram group.
Use the “Add Member” function on the BullionFX Telegram group and invite 10 friends to the group. (Optional)
Join their Discord channel.
Create an invite Link and invite 10 friends to the BullionFX Discord channel. (Optional)
Inviting friends to the Telegram group and Discord channel will increase your rewards.
Submit your details to the airdrop form.
You will get an equal share from the total airdrop pool.

Name: Donnie Finance
Description:
Donnie Finance is the 1st De-Fi project which aims to launch 6 independent finance services. Their vision is to substitute the conventional CeFi market by providing decentralized financial with the same level of services given by existing banks such as lending, swap etc.
Donnie Finance is airdropping a total of 500,000 DON to IOST holders on supported exchanges. A snapshot will be taken at the first IOST network block created after Sept 30, 8:00 AM (UTC). Eligible holders will receive free DON within a week after the snapshot based on the below formula.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Donnie Finance will be airdropping free DON to IOST holders on supported exchanges.
Supported exchanges will be announced in the coming days.
A snapshot will be taken at the first IOST network block created after Sept 30, 8:00 AM (UTC).
A tool pool of 500,000 DON will be distributed to eligible holders.
The number of tokens you will receive will be based on the formula: User A = (Amount of IOST held by user A at the snapshot time / Total amount of IOST held by the exchange at the snapshot time) * Total DON airdropped to exchange.
The airdrop will be distributed within a week after the snapshot.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: SimbCoin
Description:
Simbcoin has a unique position in the African market, which allows it to offer a hotel and real estate investment opportunity offering its owners all the advantages of a booming sector. They build iconic hotels, luxury furnished apartments in high demand areas and sell rooms and suites to private individuals. They then partner with major hotel operators to optimize rental rates and occupancy rates, which in turn generates excellent returns for their investors. They are managed by Global Investment Trading(GTI) which is made up of more than 8,000 crypto-investors, members in more than 55 countries in the world, with 7 representation head offices (Senegal, Togo, Burkina-Faso, Uganda, Madagascar, Dubai, and Cameroon).
SimbCoin is airdropping a total of 200,000 SMBSWAP to participants who complete simple social tasks. Chat with their Telegram bot and complete the required social tasks to get 8 SMBSWAP. Also get 2 SMBSWAP for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and post a tweet about SimbCoin using hashtag #simbcoinBEP20 and tag at least 1 friend.
Submit your BEP-20 wallet address and other details to the bot.
You will get 8 SMBSWAP.
Also get 2 SMBSWAP for each referral.

Name: BUSTA
Description:
BUSTA is a next-generation GameFi platform and DEX built on Binance Smart Chain. It is an enormous and ambitious ecosystem that will soon be populated by multiple games and tokens. Accompanied by its own niche DEX with customizable smart contracts for every token, Staking pools, Affiliate and Partner programs, and DAO, it is truly unique in its intricately weaved architecture.
BUST is airdropping a total of 100,000 BUST to users who complete simple Twitter tasks. Make a retweet, tag at least three friends and submit your BEP-20 address to get an equal share from the total airdrop pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Retweet this tweet and tag at least three friends.
Submit your BEP-20 wallet address in the tweet or comment.
You will get an equal share from a total pool of 100,000 BUST.
The airdrop will end on August 31st at 12pm UTC.

Name: Seor
Description:
Seor network is an independent Oracle system, which can provide a unified general data protocol for off-chain data for different blockchain systems, and provide the required accurate data for various Dapps such as DeFi, Game, and Tools.
Seor is giving away a total of 80,000 SEOR to selected giveaway participants. Sign up for the giveaway, join their Telegram group and complete simple social tasks to earn entries. Also get 2 entries for each referral. The total pool will be equally distributed among all winners.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Seor airdrop page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Join their Telegram group and post a message.
Now complete simple social tasks to get up to 10 entries.
Also get 2 entries for each referral.
A total pool of 80,000 SEOR will be equally distributed among all winners who will join the public beta & share experiences on Twitter/Youtube.
The final winners will be announced after the public beta.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Azuro
Description:
Azuro is a global decentralized betting protocol, delivering a classic betting experience for multiple front-ends via vivid liquidity pools, odds imported via oracles & NFTs powering secondary markets. They envision Azuro to become the widely used decentralized infrastructure on which future betting apps (or as we call them "front-ends") will rely.
Azuro is airdropping a total of “at least” 6,000 USDT + 6,000 AZUR + NFTs to users who participate in their testnet. In the betting contest (which they kick-off the testnet with) you will compete for prizes like 1,000 USDT + 1,500 AZUR and many NFTs.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with the Azuro Telegram bot.
Click on “Testnet Registration”.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel. (Optional)
Follow them on Twitter.
Submit your details to the bot.
Now visit the Azuro contest page.
Connect your Metamask wallet and change the Ethereum network to Rinkeby test network.
Get some test ETH from here.
Now go to the Events page and click on “Claim 100 USDT”.
You will get 100 USDT test tokens. You can claim 100 USDT every day.
Now make at least 15 bets on the events page.
Top 10 participants on the leaderboard will win up to 1,000 USDT + 1,500 AZUR.
The remaining participants will equally share a prize pool of 1,000 USDT + 1,500 AZUR.
All participants will also get different NFTs based on their rank on the leaderboard and maybe more.
Also refer your friends to get a share from a pool of 2,000 USDT.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article and for the step-by-step participation guide see this Medium article.

Name: Hashbon Rocket
Description:
Be brave and fast enough to catch HASH – it will be an early bird pass to HASHBON ROCKET starting on the 9th of September. Hashbon Rocket is the first-ever cross-chain decentralized exchange for tokens. Please welcome the Pre-Sale campaign to sit at the forefront of Hashbon Rocket to support the project.
Hashbon Rocket is giving a total of 600,000 HASH to Reddit, Twitter and Telegram bounty participants. Complete the bounty tasks and submit your details to the bounty form. The top 100 participants with the most number of stakes from each campaign will share the total bounty pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Join their Twitter Bounty Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter.
Register for the bounty by submitting this form.
Create at least 1 quote tweet (in the Retweet section) per week of the Hashbon posts by checking one of the famous Digital Asset Exchanges to choose from and also having written the most natural comment in style like this – “it’s a really cool project / promising project / Guys @binance , when will you start working with Hashbon? / @kucoincom , will you add the Hash Token? “or any other suitable comments similar to the example.
Create at least 2 tweets per week about Hash with few of these hashtags #blockchain #bitcoin  #crypto #ethereum #cryptocurrencies #fintech #defi #hashtoken #hashbon and mention @Hashbon in the post. [Post must be organic.]
You must like and comment on all the posts on the official account.
The post must remain active until the bounty campaign finishes.
These tasks must be performed once a day.
Leave a report of the completed activity in this activity form every week on Wednesday.
For more information regarding the bounty, see this Bitcointalk thread.

Name: MonsterWar
Description:
MonsterWar is a digital gaming platform and a gaming marketplace of unique virtual creatures created by combining blockchain technology and the gaming industry to take the gaming experience to a new level.
MonsterWar is giving away $10 worth of MWA to 2,000 lucky participants. Sign up for the giveaway and complete simple tasks to earn entries. Also get 2 entries for each referral. The top 10 participants on the leaderboard will also win $500 worth of MWA each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the MonsterWar giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Verify your mail.
Now complete simple social tasks to get up to 10 entries.
Also get 2 entries for each referral.
You need to refer at least 3 members to be eligible for the giveaway.
A total of 2,000 participants will be randomly selected to win $10 worth of MWA each.
The top 10 participants on the leaderboard will win $500 worth of MWA each.

Name: Juno
Description:
Juno is an open source platform for interoperable smart contracts which automatically executes, controls or documents a procedure of relevant events and actions according to the terms of such contract or agreement to be valid & usable across multiple sovereign networks.
Juno will be airdropping a total of 30,663,193 JUNO to ATOM stakers. The snapshot was taken based on the Cosmos Hub 3 snapshot from February 18th, 2021 at 6:00 PM UTC. Eligible stakers will get free JUNO at a ratio of 1 ATOM : 1 JUNO.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Juno stakedrop page.
Enter your ATOM address.
If you’re eligible then you can see your allocation.
The snapshot was taken based on the Cosmos Hub 3 snapshot from February 18th, 2021 at 6:00 PM UTC.
Atom stakers who had their assets bonded during the snapshot are eligible.
Eligible stakers will be able to claim free JUNO at a ratio of 1 ATOM : 1 JUNO.
The rewards can be claimed after the launch of the Juno mainnet, which is expected to happen on October 1st, 2021 at 12:00 PM CET.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: DeHive
Description:
DeHive is a multi-chain protocol that provides smart asset management of tokenized portfolios. DeHive decentralized protocol concentrate the top DeFi asset and enables its management by accumulating them into Clusters. Thus it helps to amplify the profit while minimizing the risks of loss.
DeHive is airdropping a total of 500 DHV to participants who complete simple tasks. Complete the Twitter tasks, add DHV to CoinGecko and CoinMarketCap watchlist and submit your details to the airdrop form. A total of 100 lucky participants will win 5 DHV.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the DeHive airdrop form.
Follow them on Twitter and like and retweet the pinned tweet.
Add DHV to CoinGecko and CoinMarketCap watchlist and take screenshots.
Submit your screenshots and other details to the airdrop form.
A total of 100 lucky participants will win 5 DHV.
The rewards will be distributed on August 30th, 2021.
The distribution list has been finalized. See the eligible wallets from this sheet.

Name: KEEPs
Description:
KEEPs aims to build an ecosystem platform for a new concept culture and art industry that encompasses the entire art industry such as music, film, and drama. It aims to provide a space where anyone in the world can participate in and run the culture and art industry by providing a platform that can be used in a variety of cultural and arts fields.
Keeps is giving away a total of $3,000 worth of TRX lucky giveaway participants. Sign up for the giveaway and complete simple social tasks to earn entries. Also get 3 entries for each referral. Five hundred lucky participants will win $5 worth of TRX each and three lucky winners will win up to $200 worth of TRX.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Keeps giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Complete simple social tasks to get up to 5 entries.
Also get 3 entries for each referral.
A total of 500 participants will be randomly selected to win $5 worth of TRX each.
An additional three participants will also be selected to win up to $200 worth TRX.

Name: Omm
Description:
Omm is an open money market: a decentralized peer-to-contract money market protocol built on the ICON Network, with a direct fiat on- and off-ramp through the Bridge widget. Their mission is to lower the friction between traditional banking services and decentralized financial infrastructure while offering cryptocurrency holders the opportunity to borrow fiat-backed assets against their crypto assets.
Omm is airdropping a total of 1,000,000 OMM to various participants. Users who’ve provided liquidity on Balanced before July 31st, users who’ve participated in governance for Balanced (BIP 1,2) or ICONbet (in 2021), users who’ve used Omm on the testnet before August 19th at 5 am UTC or filled their proof of Discord form and users who’ve used Aave or Compound before July 31 are eligible to claim up to 400 OMM.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Omm airdrop page.
Users who’ve provided liquidity on Balanced before July 31st can claim 100 OMM. You’ll need to provide liquidity for OMM on Balanced, and stake your LP tokens on Omm to unlock the rewards.
Users who’ve participated in governance for Balanced (BIP 1,2) or ICONbet (in 2021) can claim 100 OMM. You’ll need to supply and borrow assets on Omm, and stake at least 100 OMM to unlock the rewards.
Users who’ve used Omm on the testnet before August 19th at 5 am UTC or filled their proof of Discord form can claim 400 OMM. You’ll need to supply and borrow assets on Omm, and stake at least 200 OMM to unlock the rewards.
Users who’ve used Aave or Compound before July 31st, 2021 can claim 100 OMM. You’ll need to verify your wallet with Metamask, then sign in with Bridge to claim your rewards. Only the first 1,600 users can claim this airdrop.
The claim will end on September 25th,2021.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Bitget
Description:
Bitget is a Top-5 CoinMarketCap ranked crypto derivatives trading platform launched and regulated since 2018. It is currently the worlds leading crypto exchange for Copy-trading. This lets Pro-traders monetize their audience by letting them automatically copy trades for a 10% share of profits.
Bitget is airdropping 100 BGB each to the first 500 Russian airdrop participants. Create an account at Bitget, complete simple social tasks and send your UID to @Anri_nap on Telegram to receive the tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at Bitget.
Follow them on their Russian Twitter handle.
Join their Russian Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Join the Bitget Vkontakte page.
Submit your Bitget UID to @Anri_nap on Telegram.
The first 500 Russian participants will get 100 BGB each.

Name: Remitano
Description:
Established in 2015 , Remitano provides P2P escrowed cryptocurrency marketplace where people can buy or sell Bitcoin and altcoins fast & securely with friendly 24/7 online customer support. Remitano is trusted in more than 30 countries around the world and is being constantly developed and expanded every day.
Remitano is airdropping free RENEC to users who download the app and mine. Download the Remitano app for Android or IOS and mine every day to receive free RENEC.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Download Remitano app on Google Play or App Store.
Create an account and verify your mobile number.
Choose “Mining RENEC” in the menu and then “Scroll down to mine RENEC” and tap the button “Mine RENEC” to receive the airdrop.
You will get 0.24 RENEC per day.

Name: Aluna.Social
Description:
Aluna.Social is a multi exchange social trading terminal for cryptocurrency traders and investors. They combine an API trading terminal with a Social Network and gamification. Expert traders get rewarded financially and reputationally, and beginners can learn from and auto-copy the world’s best traders.
Aluna.Social is airdropping a total of 100,000 ALN to users who sign up and make a trade. Create an account at Aluna.Social and BitMEX, connect your Metamask wallet, trade at least $1,000 worth of volume on BitMEX to the eligible for a share of the drop. Also get more share for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Aluna.Social registration page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Verify your mail and log in.
Now visit the airdrop page.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
Connect your BitMEX account.
Trade at least $1,000 in volume on BitMEX.
You will get 1 star for every $1 of trading on BitMEX.
The more stars you collect, the higher the share of the airdrop.
Also get 500 stars for each referral who completes the required tasks.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Angel Protocol
Description:
Angel Protocol is a global social enterprise that leverages revolutionary decentralized finance (DeFi) yield mechanisms such as Anchor Protocol’s 20% ‘Earn’ functionality to create perpetual charity endowments.
Angel Protocol will be airdropping their governance token “HALO” to LUNA and ANC stakers. Stake LUNA or ANC to be eligible for the airdrop. The snapshot details have not been announced yet.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold and stake LUNA or ANC in a custodial wallet like Terra Station to be eligible for the airdrop. You can buy LUNA on Binance and ANC from Kucoin.
The snapshot details have not been announced yet.
Stakers who’ve delegated LUNA to Angel Validator will receive a bonus airdrop. See this video to know how to delegate to Angel Validator.
Follow their social channels for further updates regarding the airdrop.
Check the ANC airdrop announcement tweet and LUNA airdrop announcement tweet to learn more.

Name: StarTerra
Description:
StarTerra is the first gamified launchpad for Terra Blockchain where you can Play2Earn while utilizing NFTs. The native token of the StarTerra platform (STT) is a transferable representation of attributed governance and utility functions specified in the StarTerra platform, and which is designed to be used solely as an interoperable utility token on the platform.
StarTerra is airdropping 2% of the total supply to LUNA stakers, bLUNA providers. The snapshot was taken on August 18th, 2021 at block height 4186200. An additional 1% of the total supply has been allocated to the whitelisted community members.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the StarTerra airdrop claim page.
Connect your Terra wallet.
A total of 3M to LUNA stakers, bLUNA providers and whitelisted community members.
1M STT has been allocated to LUNA stakers, 1M STT to bLUNA providers and 1M to whitelisted community members.
The snapshot of LUNA stakers and bLUNA providers was taken on August 18th, 2021 at block height 4186200.
Users who’ve staked at least 100 LUNA or have provided at least 100 bLUNA to Anchor Protocol by the snapshot date are eligible for the airdrop.
The number of tokens you can claim will be based on a formula developed by StarTerra.
A total of 10,000 community members will get the whitelisted community airdrop with 100 STT per user.
The whitelisted community airdrop is divided into 4 pools:
200 spots will go to the Top 200 Memes which were created using the tags @StarTerra_io #airdrop $STT. The winners will be selected at the end of the campaign and their memes will be shared with the community.
1000 spots will be awarded randomly to their first 10,000 Twitter followers.
300 spots will be given away by KOL’s who’ve supported Luna Ecosystem via contests of their creation.
8000 spots will be awarded randomly to StarTerra x SweepWidget whitelist campaign participants.
The airdrop rewards can be claimed upon the launch of their platform.
25% of the airdropped tokens can be claimed immediately, another 25% can be unlocked when the user stakes their tokens into one of our 3 faction-based pools, another 25% can be unlocked when a user stake STT into their Single Asset Staking Contract and the remaining 25% can be claimed after a user participates in their first IDO.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Blockasset
Description:
Blockasset is an upcoming athlete NFT platform and marketplace, built on Solana. Blockasset aims to bridge the gap between athletes and their fans with athlete-verified exclusive NFTs and fan experiences.
Blockasset is airdropping free NFT to participants who pre-register on the platform. Visit Blockasset and submit your email to register for the NFT airdrop.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Blockasset website.
Submit your mail and click on “Register Interest”.
You will get a free trading card NFT when the platform launches.

Name: SuperRare
Description:
SuperRare is a marketplace to collect and trade unique, single-edition digital artworks. Each artwork is authentically created by an artist in the network, and tokenized as a crypto-collectible digital item that you can own and trade.
SuperRare is airdropping their new governance token “RARE” to early artists and collectors of the platform. The snapshot was taken on July 21st, 2021, and eligible participants can now claim their share from a total pool of 150,000,000 RARE.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the SuperRare airdrop claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you can claim free RARE tokens.
The snapshot was taken on July 21st, 2021.
Artists or collectors who’ve bought or sold on the platform by the snapshot date are eligible to claim the airdrop.
The rewards were allocated based on a combination of gross market value (GMV) and the quantity of art purchased/sold.
Eligible participants have until 90 days from the announcement of the airdrop to claim the tokens.
Unclaimed tokens will be distributed back to the community treasury.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: HAI DAMO
Description:
Hedge Against Inflation (HAI) is the first decentralized asset management organization (DAMO), providing exposure to the most dominant and promising projects in the crypto space. They achieve this by combining revolutionary DeFi mechanisms with traditional finance paradigms.
HAI DAMO is airdropping their new governance token “DAMO” to API3 stakers. The snapshot of API3 stakers will be taken on August 22nd, 2021 and stakers who were staking at least 18 API3 by the snapshot date will be eligible to receive free DAMO at a ratio of 18 API3 : 1 DAMO.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Stake at least 18 API3 on API3 DAO.
A snapshot will be taken on August 22nd, 2021.
Eligible stakers will get free DAMO at a ratio of 18 API3 : 1 DAMO.
Check the airdrop announcement tweet from here.

Name: Seascape Network
Description:
Seascape Network is a gaming ecosystem focused on incentivizing gamers, developers, and influencers for both game playing and game development. Seascape breaks high and complex barriers to entry through gamification, bringing mass adoption to blockchain gaming and decentralized finance seamlessly.
Seascape Network is giving away a total of $500 worth of CWS and ten Binance mystery NFT boxes. Create an account at Binance, complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway page to get a chance to win $50 worth of CWS and NFT boxes.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Seascape giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Create an account at Binance and submit your Binance UID to the giveaway page.
You will get 6 entries.
Complete the remaining tasks to earn more entries.
Also earn 5 entries for each referral up to a maximum of 20 referrals.
Ten lucky participants will win $50 worth of CWS and ten Binance mystery NFT boxes each.

Name: SKALE Network
Description:
SKALE proposes a decentralized, configurable network of on-demand blockchains that support high-throughput, low-cost, and low-latency transactions enabled with storage capabilities and advanced analytics. Additionally, SKALE proposes messaging protocols that enable participants to communicate between these disparate systems.
SKALE Network is airdropping a total of 50,000 SKL to the top 786 participants. Sign up for the airdrop and complete simple social tasks to earn entries. The top 786 participants with the most entries could win up to 4,000 SKL.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the SKALE Network airdrop page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Verify your mail.
Join their Telegram group and post a message as mentioned in the first task.
You will get 100 entries.
Complete additional tasks to earn more entries.
Also earn 150 entries for each referral.
The top 786 participants with the most number of entries could win up to 4,000 SKL each.
The rewards will be distributed within five business days after the end of the airdrop.

Name: Sunny
Description:
Sunny is a composable DeFi yield aggregator powered by Solana, one of the fastest growing blockchain ecosystems. The Sunny Protocol is designed with composability as a core feature, enabling other applications and protocols to easily build on top of it.
Sunny will be airdropping a total of 99,423,500 SUNNY to OSMO holders and Osmosis liquidity providers. A pool of 49,711,750 SUNNY will be distributed to OSMO holders based on a snapshot taken on August 6th, 2021 at 00:39:42 UTC and an additional pool of 49,711,750 SUNNY will be distributed to users providing liquidity on the Osmosis DEX based on a random snapshot between August 11th, 2021 at 00:00 UTC and August 25th, 2021 at 00:00 UTC. Eligible holders will be able to claim their rewards after the launch of the platform.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Sunny will be airdropping a pool of 49,711,750 SUNNY to OSMO holders.
The snapshot was taken on August 6th, 2021 at 00:39:42 UTC.
Every Osmosis address that had any amount of OSMO (including staked/unstaking/LP) and has completed missions 1 through 4 (if available) on Osmosis were eligible for the airdrop. Wallets that were not eligible for the initial OSMO airdrop to ATOM holders (mission 0) but had OSMO were also eligible for the airdrop.
A total of 3,562 SUNNY are claimable by each eligible OSMO wallet.
An additional pool of 49,711,750 SUNNY will be distributed to users providing liquidity on the Osmosis DEX based on a random snapshot between August 11th, 2021 at 00:00 UTC and August 25th, 2021 at 00:00 UTC.
Eligible holders and liquidity providers will be able to claim their rewards after the launch of the platform. Follow their social channels for more updates regarding the launch of the platform.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Raydium
Description:
Raydium is an automated market maker (AMM) and liquidity provider built on the Solana blockchain for the Serum decentralized exchange (DEX). Raydium has a first-mover advantage as an AMM within Serum and will be an integral part of bringing new and existing projects and protocols into the ecosystem.
Raydium is airdropping a total of $100,000 worth of RAY to airdrop participants who complete simple tasks. Connect your Solana wallet, make a swap and complete simple social tasks to get 7 entries. The first 4,000 participants will get $10 worth of RAY. There’s also a lucky draw in which you could win up to $1,000 in RAY. Top 5 referrals will also get $2,000 worth of RAY each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Raydium airdrop page.
Click on “Connect” and connect your Solana wallet.
Now scroll down to “Step 2”.
Make a swap on Raydium and complete the Twitter task and refer at least one friend to get 5 points.
Complete bonus tasks to get an extra 2 points.
The first 4,000 participants will get $10 worth of RAY.
There’s also a lucky draw in which you could win up to $1,000 worth of RAY.
Refer your friends to get 1 point for each referral. Top 5 referrals will get $2,000 worth of RAY each.

Name: Shield
Description:
Shield is building a one-of-a-kind decentralized protocol for future derivatives infrastructure, enabling global borderless access to finance. They plan to decrease the gap between the trading experiences of DeFi and CeFi platforms, enabling traders from cryptocurrency and non-crypto currency fields to become a part of the DeFi ecosystem.
Shield is airdropping a total of 4,085,754 SLD to early supporters who have done various actions. Users who’ve participated in Shield Kovan & BSC testnet, Shield ITO application, 1st & 2nd Bug Bounty Program and Shield Gleam Series Campaign are eligible to claim the airdrop.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Shield airdrop claim page.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
Switch the network to Binance Smart Chain. For more info regarding this, see this article.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim your rewards.
Users who’ve participated in Shield Kovan & BSC testnet, Shield ITO application, 1st & 2nd Bug Bounty Program and Shield Gleam Series Campaign are eligible to claim the airdrop.
If you’re sure and still can’t claim then wait for the 2nd round which will go live on August 12th at 12PM UTC.
The claim will end on September 12th, 2021 and all unclaimed rewards will be redistributed to a community pool.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: WEYU
Description:
WEYU’s mission is to push forward the mass adoption of Non-Fungible-Tokens to the everyday internet user. WEYU is the world’s first Multi-Chain Platform designed specifically for the NFT resale market. As the tokenization of items such as collectibles, art, music, content, property, and everything in-between becomes the norm, WEYU believes that the mass adoption tipping point will come from simple-to-use platforms that cater to the average internet user.
WEYU is airdropping a total of 25,000,000 WEYU to airdrop participants. Connect your Sollet wallet, link your Telegram account and submit your email to get three tickets and also complete the optional social tasks to get extra tickets. Also get two tickets for each referral. The total airdrop pool will be distributed proportionally to the number of tickets a participant holds. One lucky participant will also get an NFT every day till the airdrop ends.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the WEYU airdrop page.
Click on “Connect wallet” and select “Solana”.
Now click on “Sollet” and connect your Sollet wallet.
Link your Telegram account and submit your email address.
You will get three tickets.
Complete the other optional social tasks from the airdrop page to get extra tickets
Also get two tickets for each referral up to a maximum of 100 tickets.
A total airdrop pool of 25,000,000 WEYU will be distributed proportionally to the number of tickets a participant holds.
An additional reward of one WEYU NFT will also be given every day to one lucky participant till the airdrop ends.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: dYdX
Description:
dYdX is building an open platform for advanced cryptofinancial products, powered by the Ethereum blockchain. They're building a powerful and professional exchange for trading cryptoassets where users can truly own their trades and, eventually, the exchange itself.
dydx is airdropping their new governance token “DYDX” to various historical users of the platform. A total of 75,000,000 DYDX has been allocated to eligible users. The snapshot was taken on July 26th, 2021 at 00:00:00 UTC of users who have traded on dYdX protocols (perpetual, margin, spot) on Layer 2 or Layer 1 or deposited funds into dYdX’s borrow/supply pools. Eligible users need to achieve certain trading milestones to unlock the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the dydx rewards page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will see your rewards under “Allocation”.
Users who have traded on dYdX protocols (perpetual, margin, spot) on Layer 2 or Layer 1 or deposited funds into dYdX’s borrow/supply pools by the snapshot time are eligible for the airdrop.
The snapshot was taken on July 26, 2021, at 00:00:00 UTC.
Eligible users need to achieve certain trading milestones as mentioned in this post on Layer 2 Perpetuals within the first 28 days of Epoch 0 to unlock the rewards. Epoch 0 went live on August 3rd, 2021 at 15:00:00 UTC and will end on August 31st, 2021 at 15:00:00 UTC.
Unlocked rewards can be claimed from September 8th, 2021 at 15:00:00 UTC.
For more information regarding the airdrop and trading milestones, see this post.

Name: SMART VALOR
Description:
SMART VALOR is a financial technology company operating a digital asset and cryptocurrency exchange. As a fully compliant exchange, authorized by the financial supervisory authority of Liechtenstein, SMART VALOR provides custody, trading and brokerage to customers from 130 countries.
SMART VALOR is airdropping $10 in BTC to users who sign up, completes KYC, and participates in a quiz. Also make a BTC purchase to get up to $2,000 worth of VALOR.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account on SMART VALOR.
Complete your KYC verification.
Now visit this Learn & Win page and submit your email to the step 2 field to download the guide.
Read the guide and go to step 3 to participate in the quiz.
You will get $10 in BTC if you answer all the questions correctly.
Also make a Bitcoin purchase to get up to $2,000 worth of VALOR.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this page.

Name: DeFiChain
Description: DeFiChain and Cake DeFi are jointly airdropping $30 worth of DFI coins to new users. Create an account at Cake DeFi, complete your verification and deposit $50 worth of any coin to receive the rewards. Also get $10 worth DFI for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at Cake Defi.
Verify your mail and log in.
Complete your KYC verification.
Now make a deposit worth $50 of any supported currencies.
You will get $30 worth of DFI coins if you’ve signed up using the above referral link else you will get only $20 worth of DFI coins.
Also get $10 worth of DFI for each referral.
The rewards will be locked for 180 days in the Confectionery program but you will automatically earn 37% interest during this time.

Name: DFyn
Description:
Dfyn is a multichain AMM DEX currently functional on the Polygon network. Dfyn nodes on various chains act as liquidity entry and exit points into the cross-chain liquidity super mesh that is being enabled by Router Protocol.
Dfyn is airdropping a total of 591,440 DFYN to early adopters of the platform. A snapshot was taken on May 1st, 2021 at 23:59:59 (UTC) and users who’ve either provided liquidity or have made a trade by the snapshot time will get 80 DFYN.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Dfyn will be airdropping a total of 591,440 DFYN to early adopters of the platform.
A snapshot was taken on May 1st, 2021 at 23:59:59 (UTC).
Users who’ve either provided liquidity or have made a trade by the snapshot time will get 80 DFYN.
Users who’re eligible for both liquidity and trade will get 160 DFYN.
A total of 5,382 addresses were eligible for the airdrop. Eligible addresses can be found here.
The rewards will be automatically distributed on the Polygon network in 4 tranches starting from August 5th, 2021 and ending on September 15th, 2021.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Immutable X
Description:
Immutable X is a next-generation protocol for trading Ethereum NFTs which gives users instant trade confirmation, massive scalability, and no gas fees without compromising user custody. Their goal is to make minting and trading Ethereum NFTs even easier than trading traditional digital assets.
Immutable X is airdropping a total of 500,000 IMX to users who’ve traded or held a God’s Unchained NFT. A snapshot was taken on July 22nd, 2021 at 12 am UTC and eligible users will be able to claim free IMX after the token generation event.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Immutable X will be airdropping free IMX to users who’ve traded or held a God’s Unchained NFT.
The snapshot was taken on July 22nd, 2021 at 12 am UTC.
A total of 7,918 users were eligible in which each eligible user will receive 12.63 IMX per claim.
Another pool of 400,000 IMX will be distributed based on each user’s Gods Unchained’s trading and holdings in their inventory on the snapshot date (Date TBA).
Distribution will take place on the Token Generation Date. (Date TBA)
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Notional
Description:
Notional is a protocol on Ethereum that facilitates fixed-rate, fixed-term crypto asset lending and borrowing through a novel financial instrument called fCash. Notional is designed to optimize capital efficiency and balance the needs of liquidity providers and the system's end users.
Notional is airdropping 0.75% of the total supply to various early users of the platform. A snapshot was taken on July 4th, 2021 at 00:00 GMT and users who have borrowed, lent or provided liquidity more than or equal to 50 DAI/USDC as of the snapshot date will receive between 600 NOTE and 1800 NOTE.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Notional will airdrop 0.75% of the total supply to various early participants of the platform.
The snapshot was taken on July 4th, 2021 at 00:00 GMT.
All users who have borrowed, lent or provided liquidity more than or equal to 50 DAI/USDC as of the snapshot date will receive between 600 NOTE and 1800 NOTE.
A total of 741 addresses are eligible for this airdrop. Check here to see the eligible addresses.
The rewards will be distributed pre-V2 launch (tentatively) in September, pending audits.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: StormGain
Description:
StormGain is an all-in-one crypto trading platform suitable for all. Built to embrace convenience and simplicity, their dynamic platform is for those who want to profit from either the growth or decline of the cryptocurrency market and form long-term investments in crypto assets.
StormGain is airdropping 25 USDT to new users who create an account at the platform. Enter the promo code “BONUS25” while signing up and make a deposit of a least 100 USDT to the trading account to receive the bonus. Also you can mine crypto and receive your first coins in 4 hours. Refer a friend for mining and get 15% of mined funds they withdraw. Your friend will get 3 USDT for registration.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the StormGain website.
Enter “BONUS25” in the promo code field.
Submit your details and sign up.
Go to your profile and verify your email and mobile number.
Now make a deposit of at least 100 USDT to the trading account.
You will get 25 USDT.
Visit the Cloud Miner section, tap “Activate”, and automatically connect to our cloud servers (The process doesn’t use your phone’s or desktop CPU). You will get your first crypto to your wallet in 4 hours. (+3 USDT)
Refer a friend and get 15% of mined funds they withdraw. All referrals who register with your link will receive Free 3USDT in their miner account balance. The more friends you add, the more funds you earn. For more information regarding the referral program, see this post.

Name: Altair
Description:
Altair combines the industry-leading infrastructure built by Centrifuge to finance real-world assets (RWA) on Centrifuge Chain, with the newest experimental features — before they go live on Centrifuge Chain. It is the network for users who want to test the bounds of asset financing. From art NFTs to undiscovered assets — Altair enables users to tokenize their most experimental assets and finance them.
Altair will be airdropping 61% of the total supply to CFG holders. The snapshot was taken at block number #6650475. Eligible holders will get free AIR at a ratio of 1 AIR : 1 CFG.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Altair will be airdropping 61% of the total supply to CFG holders.
A snapshot was taken at block number #6650475.
Users who’ve held CFG in a normal account, a multisig account, or in a proxy account were eligible.
Eligible holders will get free AIR at a ratio of 1 AIR : 1 CFG to their corresponding address on Altair.
The rewards will be distributed once the Altair network is live and has secured its parachain slot.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Marco
Description:
Marco is a Peer-to-Peer app and online marketplace that connects people who want to rent out their homes with people who are looking for accommodations in that locale.
Marco is giving away a total of 1,000,000 MRC to 1,000 lucky participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway page for a chance to win 1,000 MRC.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Marco giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Complete simple tasks to earn entries.
Submit your details to the giveaway page.
You will get up to 12 entries.
A total of 1,000 winners will be randomly selected to win 1,000 MRC each.

Name: Revolve Games
Description:
Revolve Games is redefining GameFi, with an emphasis on creating a robust gaming ecosystem that is plugged into the heart of DeFi. The Revolve games ecosystem incentivizes both gamers to provide liquidity and for liquidity providers to play Revolve games. Liquidity and token stakers who perform well in games throughout the Revolve Metaverse are awarded with reward multipliers.
Revolve Games is giving away a total of $50,000 worth of RPG to 1,000 lucky giveaway participants. Complete all the social tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bot to get a chance to win $40 worth of RPG. Also refer your friends to win up to $1,500 in RPG.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter and like, retweet this tweet using the hashtag #Revolvegames.
Follow them on Medium and clap and comment on this post using hashtag #Revolvegames.
Submit your details to the bot.
Thousand lucky participants will be randomly selected to win $40 worth of RPG each.
The top three referrals will get up to $1,500 in RPG and the top referrals from 4 – 50 in the leaderboard will share $6,750 in RPG.
The rewards will be distributed on March 22nd, 2022.

Name: BullPerks
Description:
Bull Perks is a decentralized community VC and launchpad coupled with multichain capabilities. The platform will give users access to exclusive projects at ground floor prices not available to the average trader.
BullPerks is giving away a total of 3,000 USDT to 100 lucky giveaway participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form to get a chance to win 30 USDT each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the BullPerks giveaway form.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet the pinned tweet and also tag @bullperks and at least 3 friends.
Follow them on Facebook.
Follow them on Medium.
Submit your details to the giveaway form.
A total of 100 winners will be randomly selected to win 30 USDT each.
The winners will be announced on July 28th at 5:00 pm CET.

Name: EmiSwap
Description:
EmiSwap is a gamified, rewarding, and decentralized automated market maker exchange powered by an ESW governance token that runs on Ethereum and compensates 100% gas fees. EmiSwap is a gamified, rewarding, and decentralized automated market maker exchange powered by an ESW governance token that runs on Ethereum and compensates 100% gas fees.
EmiSwap is airdropping a total of 1,000,000 ESW to airdrop participants. Swap a minimum of $200 in any token pair or provide at least $500 liquidity to any token pair pool on Emiswap and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive 170 ESW tokens. The gas fees paid by the users are also refunded in ESW token.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the EmiSwap airdrop form.
Swap a min. of $200 in any token pair in any token pair or provide at least $500 liquidity for 1 week to any token pair pool on Emiswap.
The gas fees are refunded in ESW, so make sure to save your transaction ID.
Join their Telegram Group. (optional)
Submit your details to the airdrop form.
The first 5,882 airdrop participants will get 170 ESW.
The rewards will be distributed within 2-3 weeks after the airdrop ends.
Token Generation Event will happen on the 1st of July 2021.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: ShapeShift
Description:
ShapeShift is the only cryptocurrency trading platform offering zero-commission crypto trading and self-custody. ShapeShift.com allows users to buy crypto with fiat, trade, track, and secure their crypto through a simple and beautiful web interface. Users always stay in control of their keys. ShapeShift is based in the United Kingdom, with offices in London, UK, and Denver, Colorado.
ShapeShift is airdropping their new governance token “FOX” to early users and various DeFi users. Various ShapeShift customers, Gitcoin, Uniswap, SushiSwap, Yearn, Aave, Alchemix, 1inch, Curve, Balancer, and 0x token holders, and most of the THORChain users, are eligible to claim up to 8,500 FOX. The claimable amount will decrease 10% from the original amount each day for 10 days after 90 days from the start of the airdrop date.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the ShapeShift airdrop claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim up to 8,500 FOX.
The eligible users are:
ShapeShift customers and KeepKey owners.
Users who’ve traded $1 or more in ETH or any ERC-20 token through ShapeShift prior to June 9th, 2021.
Every customer with a wallet registered with ShapeShift holding crypto as of June 9th, 2021.
Every KeepKey customer who connected their KeepKey with ShapeShift as of June 9th, 2021.
THORChain traders of ETH/ERC-20 assets and those who upgraded ETH.RUNE for Native RUNE as of June 16th at 2 p.m. MST and RUNE ERC-20 token holders as of June 9th, 2021.
Gitcoin, Aave, Compound, Uniswap, SushiSwap, Yearn, Alchemix, Balancer, Curve, Maker, BadgerDAO, 0x and 1inch users who had more than $1,500 worth of the respective project tokens as of June 9th, 2021 .
A total pool of 340,000,000 FOX has been allocated to the eligible users.
The claimable amount will decrease 10% from the original amount each day for 10 days after 90 days from the start of the airdrop date and the unclaimed tokens will be returned to the ShapeShift DAO after that period.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this article.

Name: THORSwap
Description:
THORSwap is the world’s first Multichain DEX that utilizes the THORChain network to provide a front-end user interface to perform cross-chain swaps. This is done in a permissionless, trustless, and non-custodial manner. There are no pegged or wrapped assets, it is purely native.
THORSwap will be airdropping a total of 5% of the total supply to various early users of the platform. THORName buyers, THORSwap traders and Liquidity providers, active Discord members and THORChain supporters and community members will be eligible for the airdrop. More details regarding the airdrop are yet to be announced.
Step-by-Step Guide:
THORSwap will airdrop 5% of the total supply to various early users of the platform.
THORName buyers, THORSwap traders and Liquidity providers, active Discord members and THORChain supporters and community members will be eligible for the airdrop.
The snapshot details are yet to be announced.
Follow their social channels to stay updated about the airdrop.
Check out the airdrop announcement tweet from here.

Name: VoltNFT
Description:
VOLT NFT is a digital marketplace for crypto collectibles and non-fungible tokens (NFTs). Their mission is to bring creators closer to the consumers and provide both creators and the customers with the best experience possible.
VoltNFT is conducting a bounty program worth a total pool of 1,000,000 VOLTY. Participate in multiple bounty campaigns and submit your details to the relevant bounty form to get a share from the total bounty pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the VoltNFT Bitcointalk bounty page.
Follow them on Twitter, complete the bounty tasks and submit your details to the Twitter bounty form to get a share from a pool of 200,000 VOLTY.
Join their Telegram group, bounty group and complete the bounty tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bounty form to get a share from a pool of 200,000 VOLTY.
Participate in their Youtube campaign, complete bounty tasks and submit your details to the Youtube bounty form to get a share from a pool of 200,000 VOLTY.
Participate in their Blog campaign, complete bounty tasks and submit your details to the Blog bounty form to get a share from a pool of 200,000 VOLTY.
Participate in their Signature campaign and complete the relevant bounty tasks according to the rank to get a share from a pool of 200,000 VOLTY.
For more information regarding the bounty, see this Medium article.
If you’ve any doubts regarding the bounty, ask in their bounty Telegram group.

Name: OpenOcean
Description:
OpenOcean is the world's first full aggregation protocol for crypto trading that sources liquidity from DeFi and CeFi, and enables cross-chain swaps. Their intelligent routing algorithm finds the best prices from DEXes and CEXes, and split the routes to provide traders the best prices with low slippage and fast settlement.
OpenOcean is airdropping a total of 19,000,000 OOE to early users of the platform. The snapshots for the first round were taken from the launch day of the platform until March 8th, 2021, at 23:59:59 (UTC+8) and the snapshots for the second round were taken from March 8th at 4:00 PM until June 24, 2021, at 12:00 AM UTC. Users who made at least four trades or made a total trading volume of at least 40 USDT during the snapshots are eligible to claim free OOE.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the OpenOcean airdrop claim page.
Connect your wallet to the network you used to make trades on the platform.
If you’re eligible, then you will see the number of tokens you are eligible to claim.
The airdrop is divided into two rounds in which a total of 10,000,000 OOE were allocated for round one and 9,000,000 OOE for round 2.
The snapshots for the first round were taken from the launch day of the platform until March 8th, 2021, at 23:59:59 (UTC+8) and the snapshots for the second round were taken from March 8th at 4:00 PM until June 24, 2021, at 12:00 AM UTC.
Users who made at least four trades or made a total trading volume of at least 40 USDT during the snapshots are eligible to claim the tokens.
For more information regarding the airdrop and launch of the OOE token, see this Medium article.
Also see the announcements of round 1 and round 2 of the airdrop.

Name: NFTb
Description:
NFTb is the first NFT marketplace for digital art and goods built on the Binance Smart Chain. NFTb is 100% community-owned and functions as a DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization). Their first goal is to structure the token economics of the network to incentivize creators of digital art and collectibles to create NFTs and sell them on NFTb.
NFTb is airdropping free NFTB tokens to early supports of the NFTb platform. A snapshot of users who minted, bought & liked an NFT on NFTb between May 1st, 2021 at 00:00 UTC and June 21st at 14:30 UTC was taken on June 21st, 2021 at 14:30 UTC. Eligible users will get up to 1,000 NFTB per action.
Step-by-Step Guide:
NFTb will be airdropping free NFTB to early supporters of the NFTb platform.
A snapshot of users who minted, bought and liked an NFT on NFTb between May 1st, 2021 at 00:00 UTC and June 21st at 14:30 UTC was taken on June 21st, 2021, at 14:30 UTC.
The rewards are distributed as follows:
Creators who have minted an NFT on NFTb will receive 1000 NFTB per NFT.
Collectors who have purchased an NFT on NFTb will receive 1000 NFTB per purchase.
Users who have liked an NFT on NFTb will receive 10 NFTB per like.
Users who’ve completed more than one action will get multiple airdrops.
The distribution will begin on July 16th at 23:30 UTC and will fully be sent out by July 18th at 23:30 UTC.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: hi

hi is leveraging blockchain technology to build services that are community-powered. Members of hi are the key stakeholders of the ecosystem and the business is committed to maximize membership value – not profits. Their first service is the world’s first universal cross-ecosystem mobile payment and financial services platform.
hi is airdropping 2.5 HI per day for answering simple questions. Chat with the Telegram bot, submit your number and answer a simple question to get 2.5 HI per day. Also get 1.25 HI for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Share your phone number.
Enter “airdropsio” if it’s asking for a referrer nickname.
Now submit your nickname.
Now click on “Claim Daily Reward”.
Answer a simple question.
You will get 2.5 HI.
Answer a question every day to get 2.5 HI per day.
Also get 1.25 HI for each referral.
Complete your KYC verification.
The rewards are locked for now and will be available for withdrawal after one year.

Name: SafeBull
Description:
SafeBull Protocol is a decentralized finance (DeFi) token. SafeBull will develop a non-fungible token (NFT) exchange, as well as charity projects and crypto educational apps.
SafeBull is airdropping 300,000 SAFEBULL to participants who chat with their Telegram bot and complete simple social tasks. Also get 200,000 SAFEBULL for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:

Follow them on Twitter.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Submit your details to the bot.
You will get 300,000 SAFEBULL.
Also get 200,000 SAFEBULL for each referral.
In order to receive tokens, you must be a SafeBull holder and have any number of coins, if you have not already done so, you can buy tokens at this link.

Name: TAP
Description:
TAP is an integrated cryptocurrency exchange platform. They provide an exchange app that will let you trade on major crypto exchanges within the Tap app and have a seamless link with modern banking facilities and major crypto exchanges.
TAP is airdropping £2.50 worth of BTC to new users who sign up in their app and complete KYC. Also get £2.50 worth of BTC for each referral who signs up using your referral link and completes KYC.

Download the TAP app for Android/IOS.
Sign up and verify your mail and phone.
Enter “TNG-517-114-4B25” in the referral code field. (Required)
Complete your KYC verification.
You will get £2.50 worth of BTC.
Also get £2.50 worth of BTC for each referral who signs up using your referral link and completes KYC.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: Moonbet
Description:
Moonbet is the world's first community-driven decentralized iGaming ecosystem. It allows the community to become owners of a world-class online sportsbook, casino, and eSports betting platform through decentralized gaming.
Moonbet is giving away 1,000,000 MBET each to 1,750 lucky participants. Create an account at Moonbet and complete KYC verification to get a chance to win the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at Moonbet.
Verify your mail and log in.
Complete your KYC verification.
Starting from July 7th, 2021, 100 winners will be randomly selected for seven days and then 50 winners per day for 21 days to win 1,000,000 MBET each.

Name: Shield Finance
Description:
Shield Finance is a Multi-Chain DeFi Insurance Aggregator that allows users to buy protection against major market crashes due to black swan events (hacks, exploits, rug pulls, sell-offs). Shield utilizes a proprietary aggregation engine to provide custom insurance packages for investor needs.
Shield Finance is airdropping a total of 90% of the total supply of BULL tokens to SHLD holders. Airdrop is divided into 5 stages and on each stage, 18% of the total supply will be distributed. The snapshot for each stage will be taken at random and eligible holders will receive free BULL at a ratio of 10000 BULL : 1 SHLD.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Shield Finance is airdropping BULL tokens to SHLD holders.
Connect your wallet and claim your BULL as mentioned in this Medium article.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim BULL at a ratio of 10000 BULL : 1 SHLD.
The airdrop is divided into five stages with each stage lasting for two days.
A total of 18% of the total supply will be distributed at each stage, with 90% of the total supply distributed after five stages.
The first stage began on June 4, 2021, at 3:00:00 pm and ended on June 6, 2021, at 3:00:00 pm.
Each stage will start 30 days after the previous stage.
The snapshot for each stage will be taken at a random time.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Virtualrise
Description:
Virtualrise is a hyper-deflationary token, which rewards investors for holding tokens, while also incorporating the Buy-Back approach already present in the stock market. As part of the Buy-Back process, the contract takes care of buying back some of the tokens and burn them whenever a sale happens.
VirtualRise is giving away a total of 12,000,000,000,000 VRISE to 200 lucky participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form for a chance to win 60,000,000,000 VRISE each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Medium.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet the pinned tweet.
Submit your details to this giveaway form.
A total of 200 winners will be randomly selected to win 60,000,000,000 VRISE each.
The winners will be announced on July 8th at 5:00 pm CET.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Spar Finance
Description:
Spar Finance is an asset management protocol for mass adoption powered by Terra & Mirror. With the SPAR token, users can take part in governance, provide liquidity and stake.
Spar Finance will airdrop a total of 6,214,286 SPAR to LUNA and MIR stakers. The snapshot date will not be announced and the claim will go live at TGE, which is expected to happen after the completion of their public testnet.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold and stake LUNA or MIR to be eligible for the airdrop. You can buy LUNA and MIR on Binance.
MIR holders must stake their tokens in governance to be eligible.
The snapshot date will not be announced for the airdrop.
LUNA stakers will have an allocation of 5,714,286 SPAR and MIR stakers will have an allocation of 500,000 SPAR.
Eligible stakers will be able to claim their tokens on Spar Finance after TGE, which is expected to happen after the completion of their public testnet.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this tweet.
Follow their social channels for further updates regarding the airdrop.

Name: Salsa Valley
Description:
Salsa Valley is a unique place in Mexico, but only in a parallel Universe. Salsa Valley residents are crypto enthusiasts who have long since introduced cryptocurrency into their daily lives. Salsa Token is the main cryptocurrency of "Salsa Valley" - a crypto platform that unites crypto enthusiasts, lovers of hot salsa sauce, meme fans, 2D animators, gamers and those who love to joke and laugh.
Salsa Valley is giving away a total of 500,000,000,000 SALSA to 900 lucky participants and top 100 referrers. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway page to get a chance to win 500,000,000 SALSA.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Salsa Valley giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Complete simple tasks to earn entries.
Also earn 5 entries for each referral.
A total of 900 participants will be randomly selected to win 500,000,000 SALSA.
Top 100 referred will also win 500,000,000 SALSA.

Name: RAI Finance
Description:
RAI Finance is a protocol designed to provide DeFi with a wider range of assets, a higher amount of liquidity, and a diverse set of financial use cases. When this feature set is combined with the cross-chain compatibility of the Polkadot ecosystem, it eliminates fragmentation across the existing DeFi ecosystem by bringing a complement of new assets and a higher amount of liquidity to decentralized finance.
RAI Finance and BitWell are jointly airdropping a total of $2,000 in RAI to the first 500 users who deposit RAI. Create an account at BitWell and deposit RAI to share the total pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at BitWell.
Now deposit BEP20 RAI tokens.
The first 500 users who deposit RAI will share a pool of $2,000 in RAI.
The airdrop will only be valid if at least 1,000 users deposit RAI.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this article.

Name: Connect Financial
Description:
Connect Financial is the first true cryptocurrency Visa Credit Card. Once you deposit cryptocurrency into your Connect Finance account you will be extended a line of credit. This allows you to keep holding your crypto, whilst enabling you to spend freely with your card. The Connect Finance token ($CNFI) is designed to be a high utility token and is the center of the Connect Finance ecosystem. Users are incentivized to stake their tokens which opens up the doorway to Connect Finance rewards system.
Connect Financial will be airdropping their new governance token “CNFD” to CNFI stakers. A snapshot will be taken on July 1st, 2021, at 8 pm PST. Stake a minimum of 5,000 CNFI by the snapshot time to be eligible for the airdrop.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold and stake a minimum of 5,000 CNFI to be eligible for the airdrop.
A snapshot will be taken on July 1st, 2021, at 8 pm PST.
A total of 5% of the total supply will be distributed to eligible stakers.
The rewards will be distributed immediately after the snapshot.
Check the airdrop announcement from here.

Name: Icarus Finance
Description:
Icarus Finance is a decentralized crypto mining protocol that combines traditional mining, DeFi applications and governance (DAO). They combine the flexibility of mining multiple assets (Bitcoin and Ethereum) via their hash rate tokens, with farming via traditional DeFi applications through their governance token, $ICA.
Icarus Finance will be airdropping a total of 100,000 ICA to ICA holders and stakers. A snapshot will be taken between April 18th, 2021, 10 AM UTC and July 18th, 2021, 10 AM UTC. Eligible holders will receive free ICA based on the average holdings during the snapshot period.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold or stake a minimum of 10 ICA to be eligible for the airdrop.
A snapshot will be taken between April 18th, 2021, 10 AM UTC and July 18th, 2021, 10 AM UTC.
Holding even for one day during the snapshot period will make you eligible for the airdrop.
Beefy Finance stakers and XDITTO stakers are not eligible for the airdrop.
Eligible holders and stakers will receive free ICA based on the average holdings during the snapshot period.
The rewards will be distributed on July 31st, 2021.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Osmosis
Description:
Osmosis is an advanced AMM protocol built using the Cosmos SDK that will allow developers to design, build, and deploy their own customized AMMs.
Osmosis is airdropping a total of 50,000,000 OSMO to ATOM stakers. A snapshot of ATOM stakers was taken on February 18, 2021, in which eligible participants will be able to claim 20% of the tokens immediately and the remaining tokens can be claimed after completing the required tasks mentioned below.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Osmosis airdrop claim page.
Connect your Keplr wallet or import your Cosmos mainnet address to Keplr to be able to claim the tokens.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim the tokens.
A snapshot of ATOM stakers was taken on February 18, 2021, during the Cosmos Hub Stargate Upgrade.
Users who were staking only in a non-custodial wallet are eligible to claim the airdrop.
20% of the airdrop allocation can be claimed immediately and the remaining 80% can be claimed once a user performs certain on-chain activities:
Making a swap
Add liquidity to a Pool
Stake OSMO
Vote on a Governance Proposal
The full allocation can be claimed only if a user completes all the above tasks in the first two months after the launch. After two months, the claimable OSMO per account will decrease linearly over the next 4 months.
All unclaimed OSMO after six months of the launch of Osmosis will be transferred to the on-chain community pool.
The number of tokens a user receives is proportional to the square root of its ATOM balance at that time, with a special 2.5x multiplier for staked ATOMs.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Glimpse
Description:
Glimpse is a blockchain based social media network that allows any person to upload short videos of their life and sell them on their open marketplace in the form of an NFT. Glimpse allows individuals to monetize select content they would otherwise share for free by tokenizing it in the form of a digitally unique NFT– creating a novel untapped revenue stream for content creators.
Glimpse is conducting a bounty program worth a total of $20,000 in GLMS. Register for the bounty and complete simple bounty tasks mentioned in the Medium article to get stakes. The stakes will be converted to GLMS and will be distributed within two weeks after Glimpse’s IDO.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Glimpse bounty registration page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Follow them on Twitter.
Join their Telegram group.
Now participate in different bounty tasks mentioned in this Medium article.
The bounty campaigns are divided into two categories, content and social.
The bounty program will run for four weeks, starting from June 14th till July 16th (UTC).
Participants will get stakes based on the tasks they complete.
The stakes will get converted to GLMS and will be distributed within two weeks after Glimpse’s IDO.
For more information regarding the bounty, see this Medium article.

Name: Pylon Protocol
Description:
Pylon Protocol is a suite of DeFi savings and payments products powered by yield redirection built on Terra. Pylon enables sustainable exchanges between long-term value providers and their consumers through customizable deposit contracts and yield redirection. You can find out more about Pylon Protocol from here.
Pylon Protocol is airdropping their native governance and value accrual token MINE to LUNA stakers. The snapshot was taken on June 26th, 2021 and eligible stakers will be able to claim their MINE tokens now.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Pylon Protocol airdrop claim page.
Connect your Terra wallet using the Chrome Terra Station extension.
A snapshot of LUNA stakers was taken on June 26th, 2021.
If you’re eligible then you will be able to claim free MINE tokens.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this tweet.

Name: GemBites
Description:
GemBites is developing visually stunning and exciting gambling games that will use the GemBites (GBTS) token. Online gaming and gambling is an ever-green industry that is growing every day and it has been going through a paradigm shift as it transitions towards crypto. Along with it, blockchain technology allows for anonymity and trust in the gambling setup.
GemBites is airdropping a total of 500,000 GBTS to users who complete social tasks. Sign up for the airdrop, complete easy social tasks and submit your details to get up to 10 GBTS.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the GemBites airdrop page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Verify your mail and log in.
You will get 500 points.
Also get 500 points for each referral up to a maximum of two referrals.
Complete the remaining tasks to get up to 10,000 points.
Every 1,000 points are worth 1 GBTS.
You will get up to 10 GBTS if you complete all the tasks.

Name: CobraSwap
Description:
CobraSwap is the first AMM with Anti Whale function and the most profitable farm option on Binance Smart Chain with the biggest referral bonus.
CobraSwap is giving away a total of 4,000 COBRA to 100 lucky participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway page. Hundred lucky participants will be randomly selected to win 40 COBRA each.
