Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the CobraSwap giveaway form.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet this tweet using hashtags #Airdrop #Airdrops #giveaway #bsc #cobraswap #defi and also tag three friends.
Join their Telegram channel.
Submit your details to the giveaway form.
A total of hundred participants will be randomly selected to win 40 COBRA each.
The rewards will be distributed on June 28th.

Name: AladdinDAO
Description:
AladdinDAO is a decentralized network to shift crypto investments from venture capitalists to the wisdom of crowds through collective value discovery. At AladdinDAO, a group of world class experts in DeFi known as the AladdinDAO Boule identifies the most promising DeFi projects and enables AladdinDAO community members to enjoy the returns of their liquidity mining programs. As a result, the protocol will help to reduce information asymmetry and optimize asset allocations for the DeFi space overall.
AladdinDAO will be airdropping a total of 10,000,000 ALD to participants of various rekt projects. The airdrop will be divided into ten rounds in which 1,000,000 ALD will be distributed in each round. The top two rekt projects will be selected every week based on community voting to be airdropped. The first round of airdrop will go to the participants of Force DAO and Pickle Finance, in which the poll will be split 50/50 between the two projects.
Step-by-Step Guide:
AladdinDAO will be airdropping a total of 10,000,000 ALD to participants of various rekt projects.
The total pool will be divided into ten rounds in which a total of 1,000,000 ALD will be split 50/50 every week to the top two rekt projects selected by community voting.
The first two projects that got selected for round one are ForceDAO and Pickle Finance.
A snapshot of various Force DAO addresses was taken at block height 12171679.
Pickle Finance’s addresses with a balance were collected from the team’s data.
Force DAO participants will receive 77 ALD per address and Pickle Finance participants will get 1,577 ALD per address.
Eligible participants can claim their tokens from the AladdidanDAO airdrop portal.
Follow their social channels to see the future projects that will get selected for the remaining nine rounds.
For more information regarding AladdinDAO airdrop, see this Medium article and for information related to round one of the airdrop, see this article.

Name: Noft Games
Description:
Noft Games is a cosmic battle-royal show, where users get characters, enjoy their battle, and trade them. Fantastic creatures named Nofts have been closed on the spaceship and fight among themselves to survive. Technically, Noft Games is a dApp built on blockchain technology called Binance Smart Chain. Each noft is a BEP-721 standard token.
Noft Games is giving away 0.1 BNB and 2 NFTs to three lucky participants. Complete the easy Twitter tasks to get a chance to win the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Follow Noft Games and Babylons on Twitter.
Like and retweet this tweet with a quote and few words about the giveaway using hashtags #NoftGames #BabylonsRising #BSC and also tag at least two friends.
Three winners will be randomly selected to win 0.1 BNB and two Noft NFTs.

Name: EarnBet
Description:
EarnBet.io is a fully decentralized casino where users have the option of being a shareholder on the site by holding BET tokens or users may choose to gamble directly against the house via one of their many popular games.
EarnBet is giving away a total of $1,000 in BTC to the giveaway participants. Create an account at EarnBet, play the CRASH game, complete simple social tasks and submit your details to win up to $250 in BTC. An additional pool of $500 in BTC will be split equally between ten random participants.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at EarnBet.
Sign up and verify your email address.
Now play the game “CRASH” using FUN tokens you’ve received for signing up or pay using one of the supported cryptocurrencies.
Try to cash out at the highest possible multiplier before crashing.
Take a screenshot of your highest crash multiplier with your EarnBet name and submit it to this tweet as a comment and also like and retweet the tweet.
Follow them on Twitter.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Reddit.
The top three participants with the highest cash out multiplier will win up to $250 in BTC.
An additional pool of $500 in BTC will be split equally between ten random participants.
Also refer your friends to EarnBet and if your friends win, then you will also win the same amount of money.
The winners will be contacted on July 7th, 2021, via Twitter to claim the rewards.

Name: Orion Money
Description:
Orion Money is a gateway for stablecoins on other blockchains to access Anchor Protocol, providing boosted tiers of APY depending on your Orion holdings. It's built on the Terra blockchain. Orion Money won the Delphi Terra Hackathon some weeks ago and closed an oversubscribed seed round recently.
Orion Money will be airdropping their new governance token “ORION” to LUNA stakers, LUNA stakers who’re delegating to Orion and early users of the Orion app. A total of 4% of the total supply will be distributed to eligible stakers.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold and stake your LUNA coins in a custodial wallet like Terra Station. You can buy LUNA on Binance.
Orion Money will be airdropping free ORION tokens to various LUNA stakers who’re staking with any validators.
There will also be additional airdrops for LUNA stakers who are delegating their coins with Orion delegators and early users of the Orion app will be eligible for the airdrop (source).
Orion validator will have 0% commission until the ORION TGE, after TGE the commission will be set to 5% and will be distributed to ORION stakers every month for 12 months once ORION staking goes live on the Terra protocol (source).
There will also be an airdrop for Ethereum users and the rewards will be distributed via a farming approach. More details TBA.
A total of 4% of the total supply has been allocated for the airdrop.
The snapshot will be taken between the private farming event start and ORION TGE.
The airdrop launch is expected to happen at the end of September.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.
Further details regarding the airdrop will be announced in the coming days, so follow their social channels to get the latest updates.

Name: Omni
Description:
Omni is a never-been-done-before mega app, that's full of world-class features and tools. Inside the app, users can go live, share stories, create channels, chat with other users, transfer money, video or audio call, sell or buy products in stores, create videos and photos with special effects and much more. All of these in-app actions are rewarded with Omni Coins, that can be used inside the app or exchanged for BTC on Polkaswap.
Omni is airdropping 6 OMN to users who sign up for their waitlist and complete simple social tasks. Also get up to 2 OMN for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Omni waitlist airdrop page.
Click on “Join Twitter” and follow them on Twitter.
Click on “Join Telegram” and join their Telegram group.
Now submit your details to the airdrop page.
You will get 1 OMN.
Complete the remaining tasks to get a total of 6 OMN tokens.
Also get up to 2 OMN for each referral.

Name: Regen Network
Description:
Regen Network realigns the agricultural economy with ecological health by creating the global marketplace for planetary stewardship. Using a distributed ledger and modern remote sensing technology, their team is creating new tools for how humanity relates to its environment.
Regen Network is airdropping a total of 500,000 REGEN to ATOM stakers. Complete KYC between June 20th, 2021 at 00:00 UTC and June 22nd, 2021 at 23:59 UTC and stake a minimum of 1 ATOM to be eligible for the airdrop. Eligible stakers will get free REGEN at a ratio of 0.08 REGEN : 1 ATOM.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Stake a minimum of 1 ATOM or up to a maximum of 10,000 ATOM to be eligible.
Complete your KYC between June 20th, 2021, at 00:00 UTC and June 22nd, 2021, at 23:59 UTC.
A total pool of 500,000 REGEN will be distributed to eligible stakers at a ratio of 0.08 REGEN : 1 ATOM.
The maximum amount a user can earn is 800 REGEN.
The distribution will begin when the KYC window closes.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Instadapp
Description:
Instadapp is a full feature platform for both users and developers to leverage the full potential of DeFi. The Instadapp protocol ('DSL') acts as the middleware that aggregates multiple DeFi protocols into one upgradable smart contract layer. This structure allows Instadapp to access the full potential of Decentralized Finance.
Instadapp is airdropping a total of 11,000,000 INST to Maker, Compound & Aave users on mainnet and also to Aave users on Polygon. The snapshot of mainnet users was taken at block number #12644000 and the snapshot of Polygon users was taken at block number #15773000. Eligible users will be able to claim free INST based on the net value of a user’s position.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Instadapp airdrop claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim free INST tokens.
Users who were managing DeFi positions on Maker, Compound or Aave on mainnet and Aave positions on Polygon are eligible to claim the airdrop.
The snapshot of mainnet users was taken at block number #12644000 and the snapshot of Polygon users was taken at block number #15773000.
The number of tokens a user receives will depend on the net value of the user’s position.
The rewards can only be claimed if you upgrade your account to DSA v2 on Instadapp.
Users who were managing their positions directly on Maker, Compound or Aave need to create an Instadapp DSA account and import their positions to claim the airdrop.
Users who were managing their positions through Instadapp will have their net value counted double while calculating the distribution chart.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: YESorNO
Description:
YESorNO is a decentralized peer-to-peer network that builds an efficient, timely, and low-cost protocol for issuing prediction markets. It is based on a new generation of consensus that involves active network members and rewards them for their activity.
YESorNO is airdropping 1,800 YON to users who complete all the mandatory on the bot. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bot to receive the tokens. Also get 330 YON for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Complete the verification from the bot.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet the pinned tweet.
Follow their advisor on Twitter and retweet this tweet.
Submit your BEP20 wallet address.
You will get 1800 YON.
Also get 330 YON for each referral.

Name: Fanadise
Description:
Fanadise is an exclusive content platform created for internet influencers to monetize their social presence and bring interactions with followers to a whole new level.
Fanadise is airdropping a total of 500,000 FAN tokens to users who complete the airdrop tasks. Sign up at their launchpad, complete KYC and complete simple social tasks to get tickets. Also get more tickets for referring your friend. Airdrop rewards will be distributed based on the number of tickets a user holds.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Fanadise registration page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Now complete your KYC verification.
You will get one ticket.
Now refer your friends to get more tickets.
Join their Telegram group, follow them on Twitter, retweet this tweet and tag at least three friends and send your retweet link to [email protected] to get an extra one ticket. (Optional)
The total pool will be distributed to all eligible users based on the number of tickets.
The distribution will happen somewhere between June 28th, 2021 and July 10th, 2021.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: MaskDAO
Description:
MaskDAO is a community led Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) built off the community of Hashmask NFT holders. Together the DAO will innovate the NFT ecosystem by building an artist focused marketplace, curate new NFT releases, and new tools proposed by its community members and curators.
MaskDAO is airdropping a total of 2,457,600 MSK to Hashmask holders. A snapshot of Hashmask holders was taken on June 10th, 2021
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the MaskDAO airdrop claim page.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim free MSK.
The snapshot of Hashmask holders was taken on June 10th, 2021.
Eligible holders will get free MSK based on a quadratic reward formula to benefit all HM holders, not just the large holders.
The claiming will end on July 12th, 2021.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this article.

Name: Degen’s Farm
Description:
Degen’s Farm is a collectible NFT game based on the Ethereum blockchain. The entire collection of creatures, lands and tools is built using the ERC721 standard. The goal of the game is to farm unique creatures and collect them.
Degen’s Farm is airdropping 500,000,000,000,000 DUNG to OpenSea users. The snapshot was taken on May 15th, 2021 and users who’ve bought at least one NFT on OpenSea before the snapshot are eligible to claim free DUNG.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Degen’s Farm airdrop claim page.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim free DUNG tokens.
The snapshot was taken on May 15th, 2021.
Users who’ve bought at least one NFT before the snapshot are eligible to claim 500,000,000,000,000 DUNG.

Name: Hermez Network
Description:
Hermez is an open-source ZK-Rollup optimised for secure, low-cost and usable token transfers on the wings of Ethereum.
Hermez Network is airdropping a total of 200,000 HEZ to users who use their L2 payment solution. Connect your Metamask wallet, deposit tokens to Hermez and execute at least two layer 2 transactions between Hermez accounts to be eligible for the airdrop.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Hermez wallet page.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
Make a deposit into Hermez wallet.
Now execute at least two layer 2 transfers between Hermez accounts. The transfers must be executed before June 28th, 2021, at 9 AM UTC to be eligible for the airdrop.
Eligible participants will get free HEZ proportional to the total amount of funds deposited between June 21st, 2021, at 10 AM UTC and June 28th, 2021, at 9 AM UTC.
The rewards are calculated by converting the daily value of each token to USD and calculating the percentage for each user over the total users’ deposit amount over the 7 days of the round.
Users that keep their deposits throughout the airdrop round will receive more share of the airdrop pool than users that deposit later or withdraw earlier.
Users that deposit HEZ will get a boost of 2x towards the reward calculation and users that deposit any other tokens will get only 1x towards reward calculation.
The rewards will be distributed automatically to eligible addresses after the end of the airdrop period.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: Blockster
Description:
Blockster is a social network with user-generated content focused on crypto and blockchain. It targets cryptocurrency users who are looking for opportunities to make money through investing and trading in digital assets.
Blockster is airdropping a total of 1,000,000 BXR to the airdrop participants. Sign up at their website, complete easy social tasks and submit your details to receive 10 BXR tokens. Also, earn 1 BXR for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Blockster website.
Click on “Join waitlist”.
Submit your details and sign up.
Verify your mail and log in.
Complete simple social tasks to earn ten entries.
Each entry is worth 1 BXR.
Also get 1 BXR for each referral.
You will get a mail with details to claim your tokens after the end of the token Blockster Phase 6 token sale.

Name: Holdefi
Description:
Holdefi is a decentralized protocol powered by smart contracts that allows everyone to lend and borrow with their crypto assets.
Holdefi is giving away 100 HLD each to giveaway participants. Join their Telegram group and be active to get points. Ten winners will be selected to win 100 HLD each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Talk about Holdefi in the group.
Combot will award users with a randomized amount of XP (between 1 and 12) for their text messages, once in every 1 – 4 minutes.
The top 10 users with the most points will get 100 HLD each.

Name: aiRight
Description:
aiRight is the world’s first all-in-one NFT creation and copyright management platform. Users can generate AI NFTs, protect origin with copyright issuance, trade and tokenize unique artworks, take advantage of their complete royalty mechanism for contributors on-chain.
aiRight will be airdropping a total of 100,000,000 AIRI to various ORAI holders. A snapshot will be taken at any time on June 16th, 2021 of ORAI token holders, token stakers, liquidity providers, validators, and delegators. The amount of AIRI a holder gets will depend on the role and the coefficient rate of the holder.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the aiRight website and connect your BSC wallet when the claim goes live.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim free AIRI tokens.
A snapshot of ORAI token holders, token stakers, liquidity providers, validators, and delegators will be taken at a random time on June 16th, 2021.
Exchange holders must move ORAI out to a private wallet before the snapshot to be eligible.
Eligible holders will get free AIRI based on a role-coefficient matrix mentioned in the below Medium article.
The claim will go live on June 17th, 2021 and will last for a month with weekly snapshots to recalibrate the distribution of AIRI airdrop. This means that the full rewards can be claimed only over the course of one month with each claim can be made at every block of BSC, estimated to be every 3 seconds.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Skyward Finance
Description:
Skyward Finance is a decentralized platform to enable fair token distribution and price discovery for projects built on NEAR Protocol.
Skyward Finance is airdropping free SKYWARD to testnet participants. Sign up for the testnet using NEAR wallet and make testnet transactions to earn real SKYWARD. Also earn more for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Skyward Finance testnet page.
Click on “Sign in with NEAR wallet”.
Now create an account or import your existing account.
You will be redirected to the testnet page after signing in.
Now create your testnet account.
Visit the testnet sales page and click on “Deposit wNear”.
Select the amount and depsoit.
Now allow the transaction from the NEAR wallet.
You will get free SKYWARD for making testnet transactions.
Also refer your friends to earn more SKYWARD.
The rewards can be withdrawn after June 19th, 2021.
Follow their social channels for updates regarding distribution and allocation.

Name: CyberTime Finance
Description:
CyberTime is a DeFi + NFT community-driven ecosystem at BSC. The team has already successfully implemented NFT Fantasy League, DAO voting with governance token CTF and LP farming. CyberTime has been audited by Certik.
CyberTime Finance is airdropping a total of 150,000 NFTL tokens and 6 NFTs to top 100 participants on the leaderboard. Complete simple social tasks to earn points and hold NFTL to earn additional points. The total pool will be divided 50/50 and the top 15 participants will get 50% of the share plus the NFTs and the remaining 50% will be shared among the remaining 85 participants.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the CyberTime Finance airdrop page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Complete simple social tasks to earn points.
You can earn an extra 500 to 1,000 points for holding NFTL.
Submit your details to the airdrop page.
The top 15 participants on the leaderboard will share 50% of the total pool and the remaining 50% will be shared among the next 85 top participants.
The rewards will be distributed on June 22nd, 2021.
For more information regarding this campaign, see this post.

Name: Kooopa
Description:
Kooopa is building a community-driven gaming network powered by a crypto with massive earning potential and genuine utility. Kooopa uses a multi-purpose DeFi backbone to encourage long-term holding. Kooopa DeFi services and outputs include: NFT minting, wrapped/fan-token creation, Esports betting and participation, high-yield token staking and more.
KOOOPA is airdropping a total of 1,000,000,000 KOO to whitelist airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the whitelist airdrop form to get a share from the total airdrop pool. The rewards will be distributed on a first come first serve basis.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the KOOPA whitelist airdrop form.
Follow them on Twitter and like, retweet their pinned tweet.
Join their Telegram group.
Submit your ETH wallet address and other details to the airdrop form.
The rewards will be distributed on a first come first served basis, and allocated tokens will be split evenly among those first to register from a total airdrop pool of 1,000,000,000 KOO.
The tokens will be distributed in one week after the Token Generation Event.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: MoonEdge
Description:
MoonEdge is the first decentralized launch pad fully dedicated to project launches on Polygon (formally Matic). MoonEdge’s goal is to provide a seamless path for Polygon-built projects to make it to market. Through this, they are lowering the barrier to entry for all Polygon enthusiasts.
MoonEdge is airdropping a total of 2,000,000 MOONED to airdrop participants. Connect your Polygon wallet and complete simple social tasks to earn tickets. Also get 1 ticket for each referral. The total pool will be equally distributed among all participants based on the total number of tickets.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the MoonEdge airdrop page.
Click on Sign up and register.
Verify your mail and log in.
Configure Polygon with Metamask by following these steps and connect your wallet to MoonEdge.
Join their Telegram channel and Twitter and submit your details to the airdrop page.
You will get one ticket.
Also get one ticket for each referral.
A total pool of 2,000,000 MOONED will be distributed equally to all participants based on the number of tickets.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: NEFTiPEDiA
Description:
NEFTiPEDIA is a next-generation decentralized NFT for all types of marketplaces catering to the growing world of digital artists, creators and collectors. NEFTiPEDiA wants to be the first truly community-run marketplace and believes that the diversity will make it an eccentric and truly one-of-kind project in the world.
NEFTiPEDIA is airdropping a total of 4,000,000 NFT tokens to airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive 150 NFT tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the NEFTiPEDiA airdrop form.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow then on Twitter.
Follow them on Facebook.
Submit your NEFTiPEDiA wallet address from Trust Wallet as mentioned in this video and other details to the airdrop form.
You will get 150 NFT tokens.
The rewards will be distributed within three days after the end of the ICO.

Name: Thorstarter
Description:
Thorstarter allows users to efficiently and safely swap long tail crypto assets, and allows any smart contract enabled blockchain to access liquidity from any other Thorchain-compatible chain. Thorstarter will act as an IDO platform for new projects, providing them with deep liquidity right from the start. Alternatively, Thorstarter will enable existing projects to reach investors and participants across multiple blockchains by creating a liquidity pool for their token paired with XRUNE.
Thorstarter is airdropping free XRUNE to airdrop participants. Complete simple tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to get an undisclosed airdrop amount.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Thorstarter airdrop form.
Download XDEFI wallet and activate it using code “THORChad”.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter and like and retweet this tweet using hashtags $RUNE & $XRUNE and also tag two friends.
Submit your details to the airdrop form.
You will get an undisclosed airdrop amount after the public sale.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Hybrix
Description:
Hybrix is a highly inclusive distributed platform environment to network and manage digital forms of value transfer, interlinking other decentralized networks. It solves the problem of a currently fragmented ecosystem of solutions in digital ledger technologies and alternative economies.
Hybrix is airdropping a total of $5,000 worth of HY to airdrop participants. Sign up for the airdrop and complete simple social tasks to earn entries. Ten lucky participants will win up to $1,000 in HY and all other participants will receive the remaining share of HY.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Hybrix airdrop page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Complete simple social tasks to earn entries.
Ten participants will be randomly selected to win up to $1,000 in HY.
The remaining share of HY will be distributed to all other participants.

Name: CyberPeach
Description:
Cyberpeach is the first product of the line of products created by the CyberTree Finance initiative. It is a hybrid form of a deflationary crypto asset with staking and farming capabilities built on top of the Binance Smart Chain.
CyberPeach is airdropping a total of $5,000 worth of BNB to the first 1,000 participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to get $5 worth of BNB.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the CyberPeach airdrop form.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet all the tweets up until June 14th using hashtags #BNB #BTC #BSCGEM #BSCGEMS #BSC $BSC $BNB $BTC $cake #BinanceSmartChain #PancakeSwap and also tag at least three friends.
Submit your details to the airdrop form.
The first 1,000 participants will get $5 worth of BNB each.

Name: Arweave
Description:
Arweave is a new type of storage that backs data with sustainable and perpetual endowments, allowing users and developers to truly store data forever – for the very first time. As a collectively owned hard drive that never forgets, Arweave allows users to remember and preserve valuable information, apps, and history indefinitely. By preserving history, it prevents others from rewriting it.
Arweave is airdropping 0.05 AR to airdrop participants. Create your wallet and post a tweet to verify that you’re not a bot to get your reward.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Arweave airdrop page.
Agree to the instructions and click on “Continue”.
Download the wallet key file and click on “Next”.
Post a tweet from the airdrop page to verify that you’re not a bot.
You will get 0.05 AR.

Name: Collectible
Description:
Collectible is an exclusive NFT + Physical item online platform. Collectible is the future of highly exclusive tokenized items like jewelry, watches or luxury bags of famous brands sold as asset based NFT’s on the Ethereum and Binance blockchain. With different ”drops” happening each month ranging from the most sought after piece of jewelry or a century old painting brought back to life on the blockchain. They will provide a new level of authenticity combining unique 1 of a kind items with state of the art NFT / blockchain technology.
Collectible is giving away a total of $30,000 worth of COLLT to lucky giveaway participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form for a chance to win $100 worth of COLLT tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Collectible giveaway form.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet this tweet.
Follow them on Medium.
Submit your BSC wallet address and other details to the giveaway form.
Three hundred participants will be randomly selected to win $100 worth of COLLT each.
The rewards will be distributed on June 25th, 2021.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: APENFT
Description:
APENFT was born with the mission to register world-class artworks as NFTs on-chain. It is built on top of TRON, one of the world's top three public chains, and is powered by the world's largest distributed data storage system, BitTorrent. They aim to build a bridge between top-notch artists and blockchain and to support the growth of native crypto NFT artists.
APENFT is airdropping 5% of the total supply to various holders on Tron mainnet. A snapshot will be taken on June 10, 2021, at 12:00 (UTC) of TRC20-BTC, TRC20-ETH, TRC20-TUSD, TRX, BTT and JST holders and eligible holders will receive free NFT proportional to their holdings. The airdrop will happen over the course of two years and 1% of the total supply will be airdropped in the first month and the remaining 4% of the total supply will be airdropped once per month for 24 months.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold TRC20-BTC, TRC20-ETH, TRC20-TUSD, TRX, BTT or JST in a private wallet or on an exchange supporting the airdrop like Binance.
A snapshot will be taken on June 10, 2021, at 12:00 of eligible holders.
A total of 5% of the total supply will be airdropped over the course of 2 years.
1% of the total supply will be airdropped on June 10, 2021, at 12:00 (UTC) and the remaining 4% of the total supply will be airdropped on the 10th of every month for 24 months.
Eligible holders will receive free NFT proportional to their token holdings.
TRX balance ≥ 100, JST balance ≥ 100, BTT balance ≥ 2000, TRC20-BTC balance ≥ 0.0002, TRC20-ETH balance ≥ 0.003 or a TRC20-TUSD balance ≥ 7 is required to be eligible for the airdrop.
Some of the major exchanges that have announced support for the airdrop are Binance, Huobi, Poloniex, Bitforex, and Bithumb.
For more information regarding the airdrop and updated exchanges list, see this Medium article.

Name: Ruugle
Description:
Ruugle is an innovative and advanced search engine that is censorship resistant for all crypto related sites, and a crypto grading platform to determine high and low risk investments.
Ruugle is giving away a total of 1,000,000 RGL to lucky giveaway participants. Sign up for the giveaway and complete simple social tasks to earn entries. You can also earn four entries for each referral. Ten thousand lucky participants will be randomly selected to win 100 RGL each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Ruugle giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Complete the tasks mentioned on the giveaway page to earn entries.
Also earn four entries for each referral.
Submit your details to the giveaway page.
Ten thousand lucky participants will be randomly selected to win 100 RGL each.

Name: PolkaSyndicate
Description:
PolkaSyndicate is the first Polkadot parachain community designed to create smarter Polkadot Parachain investors, streamline parachain investment rewards to its members, as well as increase the amount of parachain and staking rewards for all members of the syndicate.
PolkaSyndicate is giving away a total of $50,000 worth of PSYN to giveaway participants. Complete all the social tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bot to get a chance to win $40 worth of PSYN. Also refer your friends to win up to $1,500 in PSYN.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join their Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet his tweet using the hashtag #Polkasyndicate.
Follow them on Medium and clap and comment on this post using hashtag #Polkasyndicate.
Submit your details to the bot.
Thousand lucky participants will be randomly selected to win $40 worth of PSYN each.
The top three referrals will get up to $1,500 in PSYN and the top referrals from 4 – 50 in the leaderboard will share $6,750 in PSYN.
The rewards will be distributed on March 27th, 2022.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: EasyBake
Description:
EasyBake aims to provide users with a decentralized, affordable, and interoperable platter of financial treats for the benefit of their community. Their mission is to identify unique and innovative (crafty) solutions to finance in a decentralized ecosystem, namely one that operates in an interoperable manner.
EasyBake is airdropping a total of 10,000,000 OVEN to LAYER and LAYERX holders. A snapshot will be taken randomly throughout June and eligible LAYER holders will get free OVEN at a ratio of 1 OVEN : 5 LAYER and LAYERX holders will get free OVEN at a ratio of 100 OVEN : 1 LAYERX. An additional pool of OVEN will be distributed to EasyBake ecosystem participants, which includes active community participants, NFT holders (details TBA).
Step-by-Step Guide:
EasyBake will airdrop a total of 10,000,000 OVEN to LAYER and LAYERX holders.
The snapshots will be taken through the month of JUNE.
Eligible LAYER holders will get free OVEN at a ratio of 1 OVEN : 5 LAYER and LAYERX holders will get free OVEN at a ratio of 100 OVEN : 1 LAYERX.
An additional share will be airdropped to active community participants based on their participation points, for holding an NFT (details TBA) and more. Community participants must submit their details to this registration page to be eligible.
More details regarding claiming and distribution will be announced in the coming days, so make sure to follow their social channels for updates.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: DRONEFLY
Description:
DRONEFLY is a secure blockchain-based system that provides reliable drone flight data. It enables secure drone flight experience authentication and management and sharing flight data. The flight experience proof system provides certified flight experience information, and rewards participants based on their flight experience and flight skill levels.
DRONEFLY is giving away free TRX to thousand lucky participants. Join their Telegram group and submit your details to the giveaway form to win up 20 TRX. Top referrals on the leaderboard will also win up to 2,000 TRX each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the DRONEFLY giveaway form.
Join their Telegram group.
Submit your TRX address and other details to the giveaway form.
Thousand participants will be randomly selected to win 20 TRX each.
Also refer your friends to the giveaway and the top five referrals on the leaderboard will win up to 2,000 TRX.

Name: Honeyswap
Description:
Honeyswap is a network of decentralized exchanges which are supported and maintained by the 1Hive community. Honeyswap uses a multi-token model to manage the balance between Global and Local incentives.
Honeyswap is airdropping a total of 50,000 xComb tokens to Honeyswap liquidity providers on xDai. According to the team, the snapshot of existing liquidity providers on xDai was taken around May 26th, 2021. The number of tokens a user can claim will be proportional to the amount of time and liquidity value contributed to Honeyswap.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Honeyswap airdrop claim page.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim your tokens.
According to the team, the snapshot of existing liquidity providers on xDai was taken around May 26th, 2021.
Eligible participants will get free xComb proportional to the amount of time and liquidity value contributed to Honeyswap.
A total of 10% of the airdrop token will be available immediately and the remaining 90% will be released over the following months.
An additional token called pComb will be airdropped to Polygon users on Honeyswap in the coming future.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: DAWIN
Description:
DAWIN is a platform that makes convenient and practical use of the cryptocurrency in daily life. By providing DWT on the DPEC platform that allows payment, settlement, currency exchange and remittance of the cryptocurrency, they desire to expand a new era of the mixed payment system of credit card payment and various cryptocurrency payments in various daily-life places such as hospitals, convenience stores, real estates, and even karaoke.
DAWIN is giving away free TRX to giveaway participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form to win up to 1,000 TRX. Top referrals on the leaderboard will also win up to 2,400 TRX each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the DAWIN giveaway form.
Join their Telegram group.
Sumit your TRX address and other details to the giveaway form.
Two thousand participants will be randomly selected to win 10 TRX each and two lucky participants will be selected to win the jackpot prize of 1,000 TRX each.
Also refer your friends to the giveaway and the top referrals on the leaderboard will win up to 2,400 TRX.

Name: Charged Particles
Description:
Charged Particles is a protocol that allows users to deposit ERC-20, ERC-721, or ERC-1155 tokens (ANY tokens) into an NFT. The Principal amount can be time-locked inside the NFT, and through integration with Aave’s aTokens, the programmable yield from these DeFi yield-generating assets is just a few clicks away.
Charged Particles is airdropping a total of 3,000,000 IONX to CHARGE token holders. CHARGE was a social token used to reward the Charged Particles community in various ways such as for community moderation, donation to Gitcoin Grants, purchase of a LEPTON, participating in Charged Particles Metaverse events and as a prize for various contests. The snapshot of CHARGE holders was taken right before the announcement of the IONX TGE event. All eligible holders will be able to claim their free IONX at a ratio of 1 CHARGE = 1.69 IONX.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Charged Particles airdrop claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim your free IONX tokens.
The snapshot of CHARGE holders was taken right before the announcement of the IONX TGE event.
A total of 3% of the total supply (3,000,000 IONX) has been allocated to the airdrop and will be split evenly for three months. The first 1% will be unlocked at TGE, another 1% will be unlocked next month and the final 1% will be unlocked in the third month.
Eligible holders will be able to claim their IONX token at a ratio of 1 CHARGE = 1.69 IONX with a maximum cap of 20,000 CHARGE.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: BarterTrade
Description:
BarterTrade is an online digital asset/cryptocurrency exchange/wallet created by developers who specialize in the implementation of cryptology. BarterTrade combines services for buying, selling and storing your cryptocurrency (and various other digital assets) with the ability to spend them anywhere Bitcoin or plastic cards are accepted.
BarterTrade is airdropping a total of $5,000 worth of tokens to airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your BarterTrade UID to the airdrop tweet to get $10 worth of BNB, LTC or XRP. One lucky participant will also get a chance to win $1,000 worth of BART.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at BarterTrade.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet this tweet and also tag three friends.
Join their Telegram group.
Submit your BarterTrade UID to the airdrop tweet.
The first 400 participants to post their UID will get $10 worth of BNB, LTC or XRP and one lucky participant will also win $1,000 worth of BART.

Name: Dev Protocol
Description:
Dev Protocol is a technology that realizes sustainability for creators' activities. It is mined by creators, and also a reward for users supporting creators through a process called staking. Because Dev Protocol is completely decentralized and is a middleware protocol for on-chain governance, anyone can join the ecosystem by developing various applications (Dapps).
Dev Protocol is airdropping a total of 283,000 DEV to the first 2,203 airdrop applicants. Users who’ve made more than 500 commits to OSS (Open Source Software) projects between 2020-05-01 to 2021-05-01 are eligible for the airdrop.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Dev Protocol airdrop claim page.
Submit your GitHub username.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim your DEV tokens.
Users who’ve made more than 500 commits to OSS (Open Source Software) projects between 2020-05-01 to 2021-05-01 are eligible to claim the tokens.
If you’ve made over 1,000 commits, then you will be able to claim 1,000 DEV, if you’ve made more than 2,000 commits, then you will be able to claim 400 DEV and if you’ve made more than 500 commits, then you will be able to claim 100 DEV tokens.
The airdrop will end as soon as the first 2,203 airdrop applicants claim the airdrop.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: BlackPool
Description:
BlackPool is a new fund operating within the NFT industry: managing a range of assets from sports cards to game items to digital art. BlackPool is the first decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) built solely for NFT gaming and trading.
BlackPool is airdropping a total of 1,500,000 BPT tokens to various NFT communities. A total of 12 protocols has been selected by Blackpool like Rekt, Sorare, Axie Infinity and many more. The snapshot of the respective protocols were taken on different dates. Eligible participants have a total of 14 days from the start date to claim the tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Blackpool airdrop claim page.
Connect your ETH or Polygon wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will get a claim box to claim your tokens.
BlackPool has selected a total of 12 NFT protocols to airdrop the tokens, including Rekt, Sorare and Axie Infinity. For the complete list, see the below Medium article. The eligible addresses can be found on this sheet.
The snapshot of the respective protocols were taken on different dates. So check the below article to see the snapshot dates of each project.
A total of 1,500,000 BPT tokens has been equally allocated to all the eligible participants. This comes to around 24 BPT per account.
After the first 10 days from the airdrop start date, the claimable amount will decrease 25% every day for 4 days until it reaches 0. So eligible participants have a total of 14 days from the start date to claim the tokens
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Ribbon Finance
Description:
Ribbon Finance is a new protocol that creates crypto structured products for DeFi. Structured products are packaged financial instruments that use a combination of derivatives to achieve some specific risk-return objective, such as betting on volatility, enhancing yields or principal protection. Ribbon currently offers a high yield product on ETH which generates yield through an automated option strategy. Ribbon will continue to expand the product offerings over time, including community-generated structured products.
Ribbon Finance is airdropping their new governance token “RBN” to various early participants. A total of 30,000,000 RBN has been allocated to past & existing users of Ribbon products, active Ribbon Discord members and users of existing options protocols on Ethereum: Hegic, Opyn, Charm, and Primitive.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Ribbon Finance airdrop claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to see your claim amount.
Click on the RBN amount and claim to get your tokens.
A total of 21M RBN has been allocated to past & existing users of Ribbon products, a total of 5M RBN has been allocated to members of the Ribbon Discord who’ve sent >5 messages and a total of 4M RBN has been allocated to users of existing options protocols on Ethereum: Hegic, Opyn, Charm, and Primitive. For detailed information regarding the airdrop distribution, see this Medium article.
The claimed RBN tokens will remain non-transferable and can only be used for voting. It may only become transferable later on if there is a strong governance turnout.
For more information regarding the airdrop and RBN, see this Medium article.

Name: ZoidPay
Description:
ZoidPay is a tech company specialized in custom-made blockchain payment solutions for companies and individuals alike. Since their incorporation in 2018, they have been solely focused on developing products and constantly growing their team.
ZoidPay is airdropping a total of 1,000,000 ZPAY tokens to TOMO holders and stakers. Hold or stake a minimum of 5,000 TOMO in a private wallet to be eligible for an equal share of the total airdrop pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold a minimum of 5,000 TOMO in a private wallet or stake a minimum of 5,000 TOMO in TomoPool or TomoMaster to be eligible for the airdrop.
Users holding TOMO on an exchange won’t be eligible for the airdrop.
A snapshot will be taken at any time between May 27th, 2021 and June 4th, 2021.
A total of 1,000,000 ZPAY will be distributed equally to all eligible holders.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this tweet.

Name: Gitcoin
Description:
Gitcoin is a platform to fund builders looking for meaningful, open-source work. They’ve pioneered Quadratic Funding, a novel, democratic way to fund public goods in their quarterly Gitcoin Grants rounds. Since its launch in November 2017, Gitcoin Grants has now provided nearly $16M of funding to public goods.
Gitcoin is airdropping its new governance token GTC to various early participants of the platform. A total of 15,000,000 GTC has been allocated to GMV (Gross Marketplace Value), users who’ve done on-platform actions, KERNEL members, and projects who’ve participated in the Funder’s League.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Gitcoin airdrop claim page.
Log in using Github.
If you’re eligible, then you will see your claim amount.
Now connect your ETH wallet, click on “Get started” and complete the three required missions.
You will be able to claim your tokens once you’ve completed the missions.
A total of 15,000,000 GTC has been allocated to various past Gitcoin participants. They’re distributed as follows:
10,080,000 GTC has been allocated to GMV (Gross Marketplace Value), which means any action in which value flowed through Gitcoin. This includes bounties, tips, hackathons, and grants. GMV allocations were split evenly between spenders and earners.
3,060,000 GTC has been allocated to on-platform actions, which means any user who opened a bounty, submitted work to a bounty, opened a grant or contributed to a grant.
240,000 GTC has been allocated to members of KERNEL.
The remaining 900,000 GTC has been allocated to projects who’ve participated in the Funder’s League.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this article. You can also check out this video to learn how to claim your tokens.

Name: QiSwap
Description:
QiSwap is a fully decentralized protocol that automatically provides liquidity for QTUM based on automated market making (AMM) algorithms. Their goal is to provide a fast, professional, and secure platform while offering low fees and higher Transactions Per Second. This will improve the DEX user experience and increase liquidity as fees become negligible.
QiSwap is airdropping free QI tokens to QI holders. A snapshot will be taken at Qtum block height #924,270, which is expected to happen around May 30th, 2021, in which holders will receive free QI at a ratio of 1:1.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold QI in a private wallet like QiSwap web wallet or in a Qtum QT Core wallet with QRC20 support.
QiSwap has not discussed with any exchanges to support the airdrop, so even if an exchange supports the airdrop, it’s recommended to hold QI in a private wallet.
A snapshot will be taken at Qtum block height #924,270, which is expected to happen around May 30th, 2021.
Eligible holders will receive free QI at a ratio of 1:1.
The airdrop distribution will begin after the snapshot has taken place.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: IndexRiders
Description:
IndexRiders is a game where one player rewards another for their good deeds for their own profit. All the player needs to do is predict 1 of 100 possible BTC prices (in range of 100, radius +/- 50 from the BTC price, for a particular time – depending on which one of their games you choose to play!).
IndexRiders is giving away 1,500 BBD tokens each to lucky giveaway participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway page to earn entries. Twenty random participants will be selected to win 1,500 BBD tokens each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the IndexRiders giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Create an account at IndexRiders. (+120 BBD)
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter.
Retweet the two tweets mentioned on the airdrop page.
You will get a total of 14 entries.
Also get 1 entry for each referral up to a maximum of 20 referrals.
Twenty participants will be randomly selected to win 1,500 BBD each.
The rewards will be distributed to your IndexRiders account within seven days after the end of the competition.

Name: Octopus Protocol
Description:
Octopus is an open protocol to create, exchange, settle, and manage synthetic assets. The protocol enables the issuance of synthetic tokens and their exchange through decentralized derivatives. Octopus Protocol leverages innovative technological solutions like blockchain and smart contracts to facilitate a platform for engagement with decentralized derivatives. Through a trustless architecture, Octopus seeks to offer unparalleled access and exposure to real-world assets.
Octopus Protocol will giveaway a total of 10,000,000 xOPS tokens to the Octopus community. The entire giveaway is conducted in a total of 4 rounds. A total of 1000 winners will have the unique opportunity to grab xOPS tokens. In each round, 250 winners have a chance to receive the xOPS airdrop tokens. This is the Round 3 of the giveaway event. A total of 2,500,000 xOPS will be given away to 250 lucky participants in this round.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit Octopus Protocol round 3 giveaway page.
 Submit your details and sign up.
Complete all the steps to earn entries.
You will get a total of 50 entries.
Also get 1 entry for each referral. (Optional)
A total of 250 winners will be randomly selected to win 10,000 xOPS each.
The rewards will be distributed shortly after the IDO.
The xOPS tokens will be swapped to OPS once it’s listed on an exchange.
For more information regarding the giveaway, see this Medium article.

Name: Crypto Thrills
Description:
Crypto Thrills is a crypto-based casino platform. Their goal is to indulge users with an unparalleled gaming experience, give users value for money and the best online casino experience with all the advantages that gambling in bitcoin, bitcoin cash and litecoin has to offer.
Crypto Thrills is airdropping 3 mBTC to new users. Create an account and follow the below steps to receive the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Crypto Thrills registration page.
Submit your details and sign up, select mBTC as a currency.
Verify your mail and log in.
Now visit the Bonus page and enter “3THRILLS” into the bonus field.
You will get 3 mBTC Free Bonus to play anywhere in the casino.

Name: DexLab
Description:
DexLab is an integrated DEX platform that provides a GUI to issue and expand Solana-based tokens without code. It leverages the Serum Decentralized Exchange (DEX)'s central order book to support ultra-fast transactions, shared liquidity, and new features for monetization.
DexLab is airdropping a total of 6,250,000 DXL to whitelist registrants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the whitelist registration form to receive an equal share of the total airdrop pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the DexLab airdrop and whitelist form.
Follow them on Twitter and like, retweet the pinned tweet using hashtags #Dexlab #DXL #DXLIDO #IDO #IDOsale.
Join their Telegram group.
Submit your SOL wallet address and other details to the above form. Create one from here if you don’t already have one.
You will get an equal share from a total airdrop pool of 6,250,000 DXL.
The rewards will be distributed within one week after the IDO.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: GuessIt
Description:
GuessIt is a puzzle solving game constructed on Binance Smart Chain and allows participators to farm and earn GuessIt Tokens. With the farmed GuessIt Tokens, people can see part of the puzzle, can try to solve the puzzle (most of the time involves guessing) and will get rewarded when the puzzle is solved.
GuessIt is airdropping a total of 200,000,000 GSSIT to airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive an equal share from the total airdrop pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the GuessIt airdrop form.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet this tweet.
Submit your Binance Smart Chain wallet address and other details to the airdrop form.
You will get an equal share from a total airdrop pool of 200,000,000 GSSIT.
The airdrop distribution will begin on June 6th, 2021.

Name: DoRen
Description:
DoRen is a decentralized renewable energy platform. The project was designed to solve the problems of existing centralized energy systems and records new renewable energy through blockchain to enable control based on transparency and integrity of blockchain data in line with the current whirlpool of changes in renewable energy.
DoRen is airdropping $5 worth of DRE to airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks, download DoRen wallet and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the DoRen airdrop form.
Join their Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter, Facebook and Medium.
Download the DoRen app.
Submit your DRE wallet address from the app and other details to the airdrop form.
You will get $5 worth of DRE tokens.

Name: SolPAD
Description:
SolPAD is an AIO Platform built natively on Solana with TRUE multichain support. The main aim of SolPAD Finance is to solve the illiquidity problem of the Solana Ecosystem and provide the one harmonized UX/UI using their platform.
SolPAD is airdropping a total of 2,000,000 PAD to airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bot to receive 300 PAD tokens. Also get 100 PAD for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Complete the captcha verification.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter.
Submit your SOL wallet address and other details to the bot. Create one from here if you don’t already have one.
You will get 300 PAD tokens.
Also get 100 PAD for each referral.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.
The airdrop bot is a little slow now, so please be patient.

Name: ENEDEX
Description:
ENEDEX is the world’s first Polkadot Moonbeam cross-chain DEX for energy trading providing an easy way to kickstart new projects and raise capital. ENEDEX enables a market for minters to safely issue over collateralized synthetic assets, a market for traders to gain exposure to them, and a platform for entrepreneurs to develop new projects accelerating the energy transition creating a sustainable environment.
ENEDEX is giving away 1 rare green energy Elon Musk animated NFT to one lucky participant. Complete simple social tasks to earn entries. One lucky participant will be randomly selected on June 28th, 2021 to win the rare NFT.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the ENEDEX giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Now complete the social tasks mentioned on the giveaway page to earn entries.
You will get a maximum of seven entries.
One lucky participant will be randomly selected on June 28th, 2021 to win the rare green energy Elon Musk animated NFT.
For more information regarding the giveaway, see this Medium article.

Name: Convex Finance
Description:
Convex Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for CRV stakers and liquidity providers alike, all in a simple and easy to use interface. Convex aims to simplify staking on Curve, as well as the CRV-locking system with the help of its native fee-earning token: CVX.
Convex Finance is airdropping 1% of the total supply to various veCRV holders. A snapshot was taken on April 23rd, 2021, at block number 12296676 in which various veCRV holders as mentioned in the below article at the time of snapshot and users whose veCRV was used to vote to whitelist Convex Finance contract for a total of 1% of CVX supply are eligible to claim the airdrop.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Convex Finance airdrop claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to see your claim amount.
Click on the amount and claim to get your tokens.
A snapshot was taken on April 23rd, 2021, at block number 12296676.
Various veCRV holders as mentioned in this article at the time of snapshot and users whose veCRV was used to vote to whitelist Convex Finance contract for a total of 1% of CVX supply are eligible to claim the airdrop.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: RunNode
Description:
RunNode is a scaling solution for Solana using a nodes-as-a-service developer API that allows for automatic node scaling to handle increased traffic. RunNode will also be a staking-as-a-service platform. Their staking-as-a-service platform will enable simple and easy staking for users that are holding Solana tokens to help power the RunNode validator node network.
RunNode is airdropping 1% of their total supply to airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to get an equal share of the total airdrop pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the RunNode airdrop form.
Follow them on Twitter and like, retweet this tweet.
Join their Telegram channel.
Follow them on Discord.
Submit your SOL wallet address and other details to the airdrop form. Create one from here if you don’t already have one.
You will get an equal share of the total airdrop pool.
The rewards will be distributed after the public sale.
Users who’ve already joined the first round are not eligible to participate in this round.

Name: Venus
Description:
Venus is a Decentralized Finance (DeFi) money market platform on Binance Smart Chain to enable digital asset lending and generation of synthetic stablecoins backed by a basket of various BEP-20 assets. The collateral provided to Venus will be represented by vTokens (such as vBTC) which will enable users to redeem the underlying collateral as well as to borrow against it.
Venus is airdropping their new rewards token VRT to XVS and vXVS holders. A snapshot will be taken on May 17th, 2021, at block number 7479562 and users who held XVS or vXVS in a private wallet or in a supporting exchange like Binance during the snapshot will receive free VRT at a ratio of 1,000 VRT per 1 XVS. Users having XVS or vXVS in a private wallet will also receive limited edition NFTs at a ratio of 1 VENUS NFT per 10 XVS owned or the corresponding amount vXVS.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold XVS or vXVS in a private wallet or in a supporting exchange like Binance.
A snapshot will be taken on May 17th, 2021, at block number 7479562.
Users who held at least 0.01 XVS or the corresponding amount of vXVS in a private wallet or in a supporting exchange like Binance during the snapshot will receive free VRT at a ratio of 1,000 VRT per 1 XVS.
The corresponding ratio of 1 XVS = 50 vXVS.
Venus is also airdropping limited edition NFTs at a ratio of 1 VENUS NFT per 10 XVS or for the corresponding amount of vXVS. Users need to hold XVS or vXVS in a private wallet to be eligible to receive the NFTs.
The rewards distribution will begin on May 17, 2021, and will end on May 24, 2021.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article. To see this Binance announcement, click here.

Name: ChainX
Description:
ChainX (PCX), the earliest launched project in the Polkadot ecosystem is committed to the research and application of Bitcoin layer 2 expansion, digital asset gateway and Polkadot second-layer relay chain, To realize cross-chain asset exchange, leading the new direction of Bitcoin Cross-DeFi. ChainX is committed to Layer 2 expansion and asset gateway research of Bitcoin, well-positioned to provide high-performance transaction trusteeship and interoperability among chains in asset transfer.
SherpaX is an independent research and development network to ChainX, like how Kusama is to Polkadot. SherpaX will be forked from ChainX. A snapshot will be taken during the fork and a total supply of 10,500,000 KSX will be airdropped to PCX holders at a ratio of 1:1 as an IAO (Initial Airdrop Offering) with additional issuance planned every year. The snapshot date will remain unknown and the distribution will happen when SherpaX becomes a parachain, which is expected to occur mid-June 2021.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold PCX in a private wallet. Create one from here if you don’t already have one.
SherpaX will conduct an airdrop of their native token KSX to PCX holders.
A snapshot of PCX holders will be taken when SherpaX is forked from ChainX, which is expected to happen sometime before the Kusama slot auctions.
A total supply of 10,500,000 KSX will be airdropped to eligible PCX holders.
The airdrop ratio will depend on the timing of the Kusama slot auction and the time of the PCX mining rewards being halved. If the airdrop occurs before the PCX halving, then the ratio will be 1:1, or if the airdrop occurs after the PCX halving, then there will be a slight reduction like 1:0.998.
The distribution is planned to happen in mid-June 2021, when SherpaX becomes a parachain.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article. If you have additional questions regarding SherpaX regarding SherpaX, then ask in this Telegram group. Also check out their FAQ section.

Name: ProjectX
Description:
ProjectX is an NFT + DeFi powered app providing NFT holders with real liquidity and traders with exposure to NFTs without directly purchasing the asset.
ProjectX is giving away 3 NFTs plus one $1,000 worth of DXNF and an additional pool of $20,000 tokens to giveaway participants. Complete simple social tasks to earn entries in which three lucky participants every month will be randomly selected to win 3 NFTs plus one $1,000 worth of DXNF. An additional pool of $20,000 DXNF will be shared among all participants with at least 25 entries. You can also earn more entries for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the ProjectX airdrop page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Now complete simple social tasks to earn entries.
You can earn up to 17 entries.
Also get 10 entries for each referral.
Three lucky participants will be randomly selected every month to win an NFT each plus one $1,000 worth of DXNF.
An additional pool of $20,000 worth of DXNF will be shared among all participants with at least 25 entries.

Name: Solstarter
Description:
Solstarter is the first decentralized fundraising and Initial Distribution Offering (IDO) platform on the Solana blockchain. Their goal is to make investing in the future of decentralized finance easy and accessible to everyone. Solstarter empowers Solana-based projects with the ability to raise liquidity in a fair manner while also developing dedicated communities behind them. Solstarter brings the capabilities of traditional venture capital to anyone through fair launches and democratized allocations.
Solstarter is airdropping a total of 1,000,000 SOS to whitelist airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the whitelist airdrop form to get an equal share from the total airdrop pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Solstarter whitelist airdrop form.
Follow them on Twitter and like, retweet the pinned tweet.
Join their Telegram group.
Submit your SOL wallet address and other details to the airdrop form. You can create an SOL wallet from here if you don’t already have one.
You will get an equal share from a total airdrop pool of 1,000,000 SOS.
The tokens will be distributed in the first week after the Token Generation Event.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Gondola Finance
Description:
Gondola finance is a fork of Saddle, focused on connecting assets on Avalanche. Their goal is to enable smooth asset transfer between fragmented liquidities via stableswap.
Gondola Finance is airdropping free GDL to early stakers and users who make a transaction on the platform. Make at least one swap transaction on the Gondola platform to get an equal share from a pool of 300,000 GDL, users who’ve staked on the platform prior to their farming delay will get an extra 500 GDL and users who were affected by the staking bug during their farming launch will get additional rewards from a pool of 333K GDL based on their pool share.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Gondola app.
Connect your wallet.
Make at least one swap transaction either from z-token to ERC-20 or from ERC-20 to z-token.
Follow them on Twitter.
Retweet this tweet and submit your Avalanche C-chain address as a reply to the tweet.
You will get an equal share from the total airdrop pool of 300,000 GDL.

Name: Revuto
Description:
Revuto is a clean, intuitive, and easily accessible single dashboard subscription management service. Revuto’s mission is to save customers time, energy, and money by completely redefining the subscription management experience.
Revuto is airdropping 10 REVU tokens to airdrop participants. Create an account at Revuto to get the reward. Also earn more REVU for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Revuto airdrop page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Verify your mail and log in.
You will get 10 REVU tokens.
Invite up to 60 friends to get 600 REVU and PRO benefits and from there onwards, get 20% REVU for each referral.

Name: Solanium
Description:
Solanium is a decentralized platform on the Solana blockchain. The platform will introduce decentralized fundraising, time-weighted token staking and governance voting to the Solana ecosystem. The platform will be an all-in-one solution for Solana, with an integrated wallet, DEX and transaction management. All major Solana wallets will be supported. The platform will extend any connected wallet with inline wallet management.
Solanium is airdropping a total of 1,000,000 SLIM to airdrop participants. Connect your Sollet wallet, link your Telegram account and submit your email to get one ticket. Also get one ticket for each referral. The total airdrop pool will be distributed proportionally to the number of tickets a participant holds.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Solanium airdrop page.
Connect your Sollet wallet. Create one from here if you don’t already have one.
Now click on “Verify Wallet” to verify your wallet.
Link your Telegram account and submit your email address.
You will get one ticket.
Follow them on Twitter, retweet this tweet, tag at least three friends and submit your retweet link to the airdrop page to get an extra ticket. (Optional)
Also get one ticket for each referral.
A total airdrop pool of 1,000,000 SLIM will be distributed proportionally to the number of tickets a participant holds.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Impermax Finance
Description:
Impermax Finance is an advanced DeFi ecosystem that helps Liquidity Providers to leverage their LP tokens and holdings by creating a set of financial tools based on these tokens. It is a permissionless lending market that Liquidity Providers can utilize to leverage LP tokens as collateral to borrow other tokens in their ETH pair.
Impermax Finance is airdropping their new governance token IMX to Uniswap V2 liquidity providers. The snapshot was taken on April 25th at 12:00 AM UTC. Uniswap V2 liquidity providers who provided at least $951.56 worth of liquidity at the time of snapshot were eligible in which the top 35,000 liquidity providers have been selected to claim 400 IMX tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Impermax Finance website.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim 400 IMX tokens.
The snapshot was taken on April 25th at 12:00 AM UTC.
Uniswap V2 liquidity providers who provided at least $951.56 worth of liquidity at the time of the snapshot were eligible in which the top 35,000 liquidity providers have been selected to claim 400 IMX tokens.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Avalaunch
Description:
Avalaunch is designed to remove the pain points of the current fundraising landscape. Conceived with an investor-forward framework, the protocol’s goal is to remove the confusion, cost, and volatility of other platforms. They want to inform and empower investors to participate in sales with confidence.
Avalaunch will be airdropping a total of 2,000,000 XAVA to AVAX validators and delegators. The snapshot was taken on May 3rd, 2021, at 12:00 p.m. PST in which the total airdrop pool will be equally distributed among all participants. The airdrop tokens are vested for one year, at which the tokens will be distributed daily over the course of three months.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Avalaunch will be airdropping free XAVA to eligible AVAX validators and delegators.
The snapshot was taken on May 3rd, 2021, at 12:00 p.m. PST.
A total airdrop pool of 2,000,000 XAVA will be equally distributed among all participants.
The airdrop tokens are vested for one year, at which the airdrop tokens will be distributed daily over the course of three months.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Metex
Description:
Metex is an Australian registered company focused on building an ecosystem around the tokenization and trade of precious metals. The Metex Global Metals Exchange will bring retail investors the ability to buy, sell and trade the world’s leading cryptocurrencies, stable coins and tokenized precious metals.
Metex is airdropping 5 USDT to the first 2,000 airdrop participants. Create an account at Metex using the below-mentioned coupon code to receive the reward.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Metex registration page.
Enter “0974d3d3dd9327777fe1978e0a19a55c” into the “Coupon code” field.
Submit your details and sign up.
You will get 5 USDT.
You need to register using the above link to receive the rewards.
The airdrop will be open until the end of this year or when 2,000 registrations are reached.
If you’ve any questions regarding the airdrop, ask @BountySupport on Telegram.

Name: O3 Swap
Description:
O3 Swap is a proprietary cross-chain aggregation protocol built by O3 Labs. The mission of O3 Swap is to provide consumers access to cryptocurrency-based, financial services, allowing them to exchange, or ‘swap’, various digital assets within their O3 Wallet.
O3 Swap will be airdropping free O3 tokens to users who test their platform. Make at least one transaction on Swap, Hub, or Add/Withdraw liquidity to get free O3 tokens. The rewards will be distributed in mid-May.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the O3 Swap website.
Connect your ETH, BSC, HECO or NEO wallet.
Now make at least one transaction on the Swap, Hub, or Add/Withdraw liquidity section.
You will get free O3 tokens.
The team hasn’t mentioned the number of rewards.
Also earn additional rewards by participating in different campaigns mentioned in this Medium article.
The rewards will be distributed in mid-May.

Name: KuCoin
Description:
KuCoin is a global cryptocurrency exchange aiming to provide users with digital asset transactions and exchange services that are both convenient and exceptionally secure. 1 out of 4 crypto holders worldwide ss with KuCoin.
KuCoin Futures is a reliable Crypto Derivatives Platform powered by KuCoin, you can trade Bitcoin/ETH and other hottest altcoin contracts with up to 100x leverage, supporting coin-margined & USDT-margined. KuCoin Futures is giving away a total of $130,000 worth of rewards to the participants.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create a KuCoin Futures account.
Bonus 1: 60,000 USDT airdrops for everyone
$5 airdrop for each mission, you can claim a maximum of 7 airdrops! Only 12,000 airdrops. The last activity can be claimed multiple times.
Complete the first deal of contract of any amount = $5 airdrop
Invite a friend to enable Futures trading = $5 airdrop
Complete the first brawl of Kucoin Futures with brawl points more than zero= $5 airdrop
Hold at least 500 KCS during the activity period = $5 airdrop
Trade 5,000 USDT of contract = $5 airdrop
Bonus 2: 50,000 USDT
Users whose Futures trading volume ≥ 2,000 USDT can EQUALLY share 50,000 USDT Rewards.
Bonus 3: 20,000 USDT
The top 1 trader with the highest trading volume can win 5,000 USDT.
Traders who rank top 2 to 50 can win a share of 15,000 USDT.
Submit your details to this registration form.
The rewards will be distributed within seven days after the end of the activity.
For more information, see this post.

Name: Baguette
Description:
Baguette aims at providing a platform that offers various ways of earning returns, including through staking without the risk of being exposed to Impermanent Loss. The goal of Baguette is to bring solutions that can be found on other platforms like the Binance Smart Chain, such as staking pools but running on the most decentralized network, Avalanche.
Baguette has airdropped a total of 18,062,500 BAG to AVAX stakers. A snapshot of users staking on their own node or delegating to another one was taken on April 25, at 12:00 Paris Time, in which a total of 7,225 eligible addresses received 2,500 BAG each. The tokens have already been distributed to users’ X-chain Avalanche wallet in the form of fake tokens and users have to swap it to a C-chain wallet before May 31st, 2021, at 12:00 pm UTC+2 to be able to claim the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Baguette has distributed free BAG tokens to AVAX stakers.
Anyone who was staking AVAX on his own node or delegating to another one during the snapshot were eligible.
The snapshot was taken on April 25, at 12:00 Paris Time, in which a total of 7,225 eligible addresses received 2,500 BAG each in the form of fake BAG tokens in their X-chain wallet.
Eligible participants have to swap their fake BAG tokens from their X-chain wallet to a C-chain wallet before May 31st, 2021, at 12:00 pm UTC+2 to be able to claim the rewards.
Users must have an Avalanche address on the C-chain with Metamask to be able to swap the tokens. For more information regarding the swap and claim, see this Medium article.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this tweet.

Name: Aeneas
Description:
Aeneas is a social-driven decentralized public-benefit platform aimed to endow users to gain influence on the political system through gathering money for changing laws, creating free economic zones and radical innovations
Aeneas and WhiteBIT are jointly giving away a total of 33,400 ASH to 500 lucky participants. Create an account on WhiteBIT, complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form for a chance to win 66.8 ASH.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at WhiteBIT.
Join Aeneas Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow Aeneas on Twitter and post a tweet about Aeneas. Tag them and three friends.
Submit your details to this giveaway form.
A total of 500 lucky participants will get 66.8 ASH.

Name: Force DAO
Description:
Force DAO is a DAO for strategists, building the people’s gateway to quant finance. Built on decentralized blockchains, Force DAO brings strategists together with community investors to find yield-bearing DeFi opportunities.
Force DAO is airdropping a total of 25,000,000 FORCE to various communities. Force DAO is relaunching the airdrop with a new FORCE token after their previous contract got exploited in a hack. Users who suffered losses in the exploit will also be able to claim the airdrop according to their remediation plan. Participants of Aave, Alchemix, Badger, Balancer, Curve, Maker DAO, Synthetix, Sushi, Vesper, and Yearn communities, public beta and lightspeed participants, Harvest Finance Multisig users and participants in the BSC, Polygon, xDAI, and Fantom DeFi ecosystems are eligible to claim the airdrop. The snapshot of participating projects was taken throughout January 1st, 2021 and February 28th, 2021. The initial claim will go live on April 28th at 4 pm EST and ends on June 16th at 4 pm EST.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Force DAO airdrop claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet and click on “Claim” to claim your rewards.
The claim will go live on April 28th at 4 pm EST.
The snapshot of participating projects was taken throughout January 1st, 2021 and February 28th, 2021.
A pool of 17,750,000 FORCE has been allocated to participants of Aave, Alchemix, Badger, Balancer, Curve, Maker DAO, Synthetix, Sushi, Vesper, and Yearn projects.
A pool of 4,500,000 FORCE has been allocated to Force DAO public beta and lightspeed participants.
A pool of 250,000 FORCE has been allocated to Harvest Finance Multisig users.
A pool of 2,500,000 FORCE has been allocated to BSC, Polygon, xDAI, and Fantom DeFi ecosystem participants.
The claim for BSC, Polygon, xDAI, and Fantom DeFi ecosystem participants will be announced later.
This airdrop is a relaunch of the initial airdrop because the previous contract got exploited in a hack. Users who suffered losses in the exploit will also be able to claim the airdrop according to their remediation plan. For more information regarding this remediation plan, see this Medium article.
The normal claim will go live on April 28th at 4 pm EST and ends on June 9th at 4 pm EST. Users can claim again from June 9th at 4 pm EST, but the claimable rewards are reduced linearly by each block until June 16th at 4 pm EST.
All unclaimed FORCE will go back to the Force DAO treasury.
For more information, see this post and also see this Medium article.

Name: Etherlite
Description:
EtherLite is a pure POS-based blockchain network, surfacing to create a space where all the major DApps can be bought over under one roof and dealt with in a cost-effective manner, expanding the base of blockchain development and usage in the community.
Etherlite will be airdropping a total of 2.1 Billion ETL coins to ETH holders. Hold your ETH in a private wallet at the time of snapshot to be eligible to claim the airdrop. The snapshot will be taken on May 1st, 2021 at Ethereum block no 12345678. Eligible holders will be able to claim ETL starting from July 1st, 2021.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold your ETH in a private wallet during the snapshot.
A snapshot will be taken on May 1st, 2021, at Ethereum block no 12345678.
Eligible holders will be able to check their balance on the Etherlite website starting from June 15th, 2021 and can be claimed from July 1st, 2021.
A total of 2.1 Billion ETL coins will be airdropped in which all eligible holders will be able to claim between 10 – 15 ETL per 1 ETH.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Badger DAO
Description:
Badger is a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) with a single purpose: build the products and infrastructure necessary to accelerate Bitcoin as collateral across other blockchains.
Badger DAO is airdropping free DIGG options to various participants. bDIGG holders, DIGG/wBTC uni and sushi stakers, bDIGG/bBTC stakers (on BSC), Badger NFT holders and other supporters are eligible to claim the airdrop.
