The first snapshot was taken on April 21st 2021 in which 30% of all DIGG options will be airdropped and a second snapshot will be taken on May 6th 2021 in which 60% of all DIGG options will be airdropped and the remaining 10% will be airdropped to Badger NFT holders and other supporters determined by Badger DAO team. DIGG options can be redeemed for DIGG tokens after it reaches maturity.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Badger DAO will be airdropping free DIGG options to bDIGG holders, DIGG/wBTC uni and sushi stakers, bDIGG/bBTC stakers (on BSC), Badger NFT holders and other supporters determined by the Badger DAO team are eligible for the airdrop.
There will be two snapshots in which the first one was already taken on April 22nd 2021, in which 30% of all DIGG options will be airdropped and a second snapshot will be taken on May 6th 2021, in which 60% of all DIGG options will be airdropped. 5% of all DIGG options will be airdropped to Badger NFT holders and the remaining 5% will be airdropped to Badger supporters determined by the Badger DAO team.
The rewards are distributed linearly based on total amounts per address.
Eligible participants will be able to claim the rewards through the Badger app after the claim goes live.
The claimed DIGG options can be redeemed for DIGG tokens after it reaches maturity.
The DIGG options will launch on May 7th, 2021 and will mature on June 7th 2021.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.
Follow their social channels to see updates related to claim and other airdrop related news.

Name: Binance
Description:
Binanace is the leading crypto to crypto exchange around with over 100 coins supported for deposit and withdrawal. Their mission is to be the infrastructure services provider for the blockchain ecosystem.
Binance is conducting multiple trading competitions and giveaway events to its’s users. Create an account on Binance and participate in the below-mentioned events to earn rewards.

Name: DeversiFi
Description:
DeversiFi is a professional-grade, self-custodial exchange built using the StarkWare zkSTARK layer 2 scaling technology allowing for an industry-first 9,000+ tps via UI or API. DeversiFi is built with serious traders in mind and reflects the experience of a large centralised exchange (by providing low-fees, fast speeds, privacy-by-default and deeply liquidity, aggregated order books) to self-custodial trading.
DeversiFi is airdropping their governance token DVF to various communities in the future. Active users of DeversiFi until the DVF launch and NEC holders who had balances on 25th March at Ethereum block 12107360 are eligible to claim free DVF. An additional DVF pool will also be allocated to liquidity providers. Users who deposit for the first time will also get an extra 20 USDT.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the DeversiFi website.
Be an active user of the platform.
Users who deposit for the first time on DeversiFi will get an extra 20 USDT.
DeversiFi will airdrop free DVF tokens to all active users until the launch of the DVF token (within a few months).
A total of 7% of the total DVF supply will also be distributed to NEC holders. The snapshot of NEC holders was taken on March 25th, 2021, at Ethereum block 12107360.
An additional pool of DVF will be allocated to liquidity miners.
For more information regarding the airdrop and DVF token, see this article.
Follow their social channels to see the announcements regarding the DVF launch.

Name: Bribe
Description:
Bribe is a cross-chain liquidity protocol for algorithmic stablecoins. The mission of Bribe is to give stablecoin holders an opportunity to maximize yield in the cross-chain ecosystem. At present, Bribe deploys the first single-token farming pool of Fei stablecoin.
Bribe is airdropping a total of 650,000 BRIBE to various participants. Fei genesis participants can claim a total of 500,000 BRIBE and an additional 50,000 BRIBE can be claimed by OG members in the Bribe Discord server, lottery winners of social media campaigns and participants of the early contribution program.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Bribe airdrop claim page.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim free BRIBE tokens.
A total of 650,000 BRIBE can be claimed by Fei genesis participants, OG members in the Bribe Discord server, lottery winners of social media campaigns and early contribution program participants.
There’s no deadline to claim the airdrop, so users can claim the airdrop at any time.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Ampleforth
Description:
Ampleforth is a cryptocurrency and financial building block. Much like Bitcoin, it is algorithmic and uncollateralized. However, unlike Bitcoin, AMPL can be used to denominate stable contracts. The Ampleforth protocol translates price volatility into supply volatility. This means the number of AMPL tokens in user wallets automatically increases or decreases based on price.
Ampleforth is airdropping their new governance token FORTH (67% of the total supply) to eligible airdrop participants. The snapshot was taken on March 30th, 2021. Users who’ve interacted with AMPL, Geyser participants, and users who held AMPL during negative rebase periods are eligible to claim free FORTH tokens. FORTH is already tradable on Binance.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Ampleforth airdrop claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim free FORTH tokens.
The snapshot was taken on March 30th, 2021.
Users who’ve interacted with AMPL on-chain, Geyser participants and users that held AMPL during negative rebase periods are eligible to claim free FORTH tokens.
Users have until April 16th, 2022, to claim the tokens.
After the above deadline, unclaimed tokens will be placed in a community governed DAO.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: FUTURE
Description:
FUTURE is a platform allowing purchases of decentralized futures with fixed rates and fixed/floating swaps. It's operating on the Solana blockchain.
FUTURE is ardropping free FTR tokens in return for simple social tasks. Retweet the mentioned tweet, create a SOL wallet from Sollet and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive the tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the FUTURE airdrop form.
Retweet this tweet with a quote.
Create a SOL wallet via Sollet or Solflare.
Submit your SOL wallet address and other details to the airdrop form.
You will get free FTR tokens.
For more information regarding distribution and other announcements, follow them on Twitter and Discord.

Name: SingularityDAO
Description:
SingularityDAO is a democratically governed Decentralized Autonomous Organization stewarding a non-custodial smart contract network. It aims to foster the growth of the decentralized networks that represent today’s most valuable and promising technological and social innovations via leveraging AI-DeFi to stimulate the growth of the utility-token ecosystem.
SingularityDAO is airdropping a total of 5,000,000 SDAO to AGI holders, stakers and liquidity providers over the course of four months. A total of 2,000,000 SDAO will be airdropped to stakers who staked at least 1,000 AGI during the snapshot and the remaining 3,000,000 SDAO will be airdropped to users having at least 1,000 AGI in the AGI liquidity pools on DEXs and users who held at least 1,000 AGI in a private wallet at the time of the snapshot. The snapshot was taken on April 17th 2021, at 11:59 PM UTC+0. Eligible holders will have to register on the SingularityDAO Airdrop Portal prior to three days before each months session to be eligible to claim the rewards. The claiming period will go live from May 16, 2021, till August 23, 2021, and eligible registrants from each month can claim the rewards anytime during the claiming period.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the SingularityDAO Airdrop Portal once the registration starts.
AGI holders, stakers and liquidity providers are eligible to claim the airdrop.
The snapshot was taken on April 17th 2021, at 11:59 PM UTC+0.
A total of 2,000,000 SDAO will be airdropped to stakers who staked at least 1,000 AGI on staking.singularitynet.io during the snapshot in which 1,000,000 SDAO will be distributed equally among all the stakers and the remaining 1,000,000 SDAO will be distributed proportionally to the amount of SDAO staked.
A total of 3,000,000 SDAO will be airdropped to users who held at least 1,000 AGI in a private wallet at the time of the snapshot and also to users having at least 1,000 AGI in the AGI liquidity pools on DEXs from May 2021. Additional random snapshots will be taken every month of AGI holders in which users holding AGI through May 2021 will be able to claim the airdrop of June 2021 and so on till August 2021. Liquidity providers can claim the airdrop only from June 2021.
The registration for the airdrop participants will go live for three days at 12:00 AM UTC on the 13th of every month for four months, starting from May 13th 2021, till August 13th 2021. Eligible participants will have to register on the SingularityDAO Airdrop Portal before each months claiming period goes live.
The claiming period will go live at 12:00 AM UTC on the 16th of every month for four months and eligible registrants have until August 23 2021, 11:59 PM UTC to claim the rewards. The claiming of each months allocation can be done at any time during the claiming period.
All unclaimed airdrop tokens will be distributed to the wider SingularityDAO community at a later date.
For more information regarding the airdrop, registration, distribution and claiming, see this Medium article.

Name: SORA
Description:
SORA is a new economic system: a 'decentralized central bank' with built-in tools for decentralized finance. The SORA network implements a new kind of parachain architecture on the Polkadot network: a so-called parachain-virtual-bridge capable of bridging external blockchains (like Ethereum) to Polkadot.
SORA is airdropping a total of 33,100,000 VAL to ERC-20 XOR holders. The snapshot was taken on April 12th, 2021, at Ethereum block 12225000 and eligible holders will be able to claim free VAL at a ratio of 94.57142857142857 VAL per XOR sometime this week on Polkaswap.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the SORA VAL claim page when the claim goes live.
The claim will go sometime this week. Follow their social channels for the announcement.
Users who’ve held ERC-20 XOR in a private wallet at the time of the snapshot are eligible to claim the rewards.
The snapshot was taken on April 12th, 2021, at Ethereum block 12225000.
Eligible holders will be able to claim 94.57142857142857 VAL per XOR in which 10 VAL will be distributed at the launch of the SORA v2 mainnet and the remaining tokens over time as VAL gets burned from transactions.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Caizcoin
Description:
Caizcoin is a financial platform approved by Islamic scholars as conforming to Islamic financial law. Caizcoin unites Muslims and non-Muslims around the world by connecting innovative financial solutions with eternal human values, allowing everyone to participate fairly in the modern world of finance and make payments easily.
Caizcoin is giving away a total of $100,000 worth of CAIZ tokens. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bot for a chance to win $40 worth of CAIZ tokens. Top 50 referrals will also get up to $1,500 worth of CAIZ tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet, like, and comment on this tweet using hashtag #CaizCoin.
Follow them on Instagram and like, comment on this post using hashtag #CaizCoin.
Submit your details to the bot.
Two thousand lucky participants will be randomly selected to win $40 worth of CAIZ each.
Top 50 referrals will also get up to $1,500 worth of CAUZ tokens.
The rewards will be distributed on December 26th, 2021.

Name: Maiar Exchange
Description:
Maiar Exchange is the ultimate automated market maker, rearchitecting some of the key elements to build a product that can leverage the entire performance of the Elrond architecture to offer global, near-instant, inexpensive transactions between an expanding suite of assets.
Maiar Exchange will be airdropping free MEX tokens to EGLD holders and various DeFi communities. The first snapshot will be taken on April 19th, 2021, with daily snapshots to follow for one year. EGLD holders will have an allocation of 47.50% of the token supply and UNI, SUSHI and CAKE holders will have an allocation of 2.55% of the token supply. The rewards will be claimable for one month after each snapshot and all unclaimed tokens will be burned.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold EGLD, UNI, SUSHI & CAKE in your private wallet or buy and hold EGLD in Maiar App with a $10 cashback to be eligible for the airdrop. You can buy EGLD, UNI, SUSHI & CAKE on Binance if you don’t have any.
A one-time snapshot of UNI, SUSHI & CAKE holders will be taken at a time that will be announced later.
The first snapshot of EGLD holders will be taken on April 19th, 2021, with daily snapshots and weekly distribution to follow for one year.
A total of 47.50% of the token supply has been allocated to EGLD holders and will be distributed as follows:
A snapshot of users having EGLD in their private wallet will be taken every day for one year with weekly distribution and a 1X multiplier towards the rewards.
A snapshot of users having EGLD in the Maiar App with at least 1 EGLD and five referrals will be taken every day for one year with weekly distribution and a 1.25X multiplier towards the rewards.
A snapshot of EGLD stakers will be taken every day for one year with weekly distribution and a 1.5X multiplier towards the rewards.
The EGLD snapshot calculation is based on the weekly average of daily random snapshots.
The rewards will be claimable for one month after each snapshot and all unclaimed tokens will be burned.
The first four weeks snapshots will each have a 5x, 4x, 3x and 2x multiplier.
Details regarding the claim will be announced later. Follow their announcements to see the updates.
An additional pool of 44.95% of the token supply will be distributed to liquidity providers over the next ten years, with five halvings every two years.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: HOPR
Description:
HOPR protocol provides network-level and metadata privacy for every type of data exchange while introducing the first-ever open incentivized mixnet, where users earn tokens for running nodes.
HOPR is airdropping free HOPR to HOPR & AVADO PC users. Eligible users will be able to claim up to 500 HOPR. All AVADO owners will also receive a free AVADO NFT. The rewards will be distributed in the form of wxHOPR (used to run HOPR node), which can be swapped to HOPR using OmniBridge after unwrapping it from wxHOPR to xHOPR.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the HOPR airdrop claim page.
Submit your email address used to buy HOPR or AVADO device.
You will also need Metamask to claim your rewards.
The first 300 users who’ve already bought a HOPR-PC will be able to claim 500 HOPR.
The first 1,000 users who’ve already bought an AVADO-PC before April 1st, 2021, will be able to claim 100 HOPR.
The first 1,000 users who will buy an AVADO/HOPR-PC in the future and install the HOPR package will be able to claim 50 HOPR.
All HOPR claimers will also receive a free AVADO NFT.
The rewards will be distributed in the form of wxHOPR (used to run HOPR node), which can be swapped to HOPR using OmniBridge after unwrapping it from wxHOPR to xHOPR.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this article.

Name: Aladdin
Description:
Aladdin aims to cater to cryptocurrency users and traders all over the world. The overall exchange operations are led by the TNC IT Group. Aladdin Exchange ensures a reliable market price for crypto-asset buying and selling. Moreover, the exchange is expertly engineered with a security system of the highest standard to protect traders’ digital assets and secure transactions.
Aladdin is giving away 100 TNC tokens to new users. Create an account at Aladdin and complete Aladdin Pro verification (Level 3) to receive 100 TNC. Also, get 20 TNC for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Aladdin registration page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Verify your mail and log in.
For successful registration, you will get 100 TNC.
Also get 20 TNC for each referral.
You need to complete Aladdin Pro verification (Level 3) to be eligible to receive the rewards.

Name: PolkaDomain
Description:
PolkaDomain is an interoperable and decentralized blockchain naming service with an integrated domain and NFT marketplace built on Polkadot.
PolkaDomain is airdropping a total of 200,000 NAME (2% of the supply) to giveaway participants and .eth ENS owners. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form for a chance to be selected to win an equal share of 75% of the total airdrop pool. The remaining 25% of the pool will be airdropped to .eth ENS owners.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the PolkaDomain airdrop form.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and post a tweet with this Medium article and tag $NAME.
Post your tweet link along with your ETH address to the Telegram group.
Submit your details to the giveaway form.
Participants will be randomly selected to share 75% of the total airdrop pool.
The rewards will be distributed on April 17th, 2021, after NAME gets listed on Uniswap.
The remaining 25% of the pool will be airdropped to .eth ENS owners.
For more information regarding the giveaway and airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Forefront
Description:
Forefront was built as a tool to aid in this curation - sharing resources, data and insights on how to navigate the ever-changing social token landscape. Forefront now supports 23 social tokens. It’s the home for exclusive content on social tokens, a weekly newsletter, and profiles for 20+ projects and counting.
Forefront is airdropping a total of 2,000,000 FF tokens to users that held various social tokens listed on Forefront. The snapshot of the various token holders was taken on March 12th, 2021, at 12 PM UTC. All eligible users can claim the airdrop till April 14th, 2021.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Forefront claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim at least 238 FF tokens.
The snapshot of users who held various social tokens listed on Forefront was taken on March 12th, 2021, at 12 PM UTC.
The allocation a user receives was based on the number of tokens held for each social token during the snapshot.
Users should’ve also held a minimum threshold of tokens for each social token as mentioned in the below article to be eligible.
The airdrop claiming will end on April 14th, 2021.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this article.

Name: Mettalex
Description:
Mettalex is a Fetch.ai powered decentralized derivatives exchange (DEX). It will enable commodity market instruments to trade in tokenized forms and enable the buyback of FET.
Mettalex is airdropping free MTLX tokens to FET holders on Binance. Create an account on Binance and hold an average of at least 10,000 FET for eight weeks to be eligible to receive free MTLX at a ratio of 1 MTLX : 10,000 FET.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account on Binance.
Hold FET for eight weeks starting from April 13, 2021, at 11:59 PM UTC till June 1, 2021, at 11:59 PM UTC on Binance.
The snapshots will be taken every week and users with an average of at least 10,000 FET for eight weeks will receive free MTLX at a ratio of 1 MTLX : 10,000 FET.
The rewards will be distributed to users’ Binance accounts after the end of the campaign.
For more information regarding the dates and times of the snapshot and other details of the airdrop, see this Binance announcement and Mettalex announcement.

Name: KLOMP
Description:
KLOMP is a new effective and secure DEFI platform. KLOMP is the primarily utility token, created to govern and facilitate transactions on the Klomp platform, as well as to encourage investors to share effective investing strategies with the community.
KLOMP is airdropping 100,000 KLOMP in total and the first 2,000 participants will receive 50 KLOMP tokens each. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive the tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the KLOMP airdrop form.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter, retweet the pinned tweet using hashtags $KLOMP #Airdrop and tag at least three friends.
Submit your details to the airdrop form.
You will get 50 KOMP tokens.

Name: NFTMart
Description:
NFTMart, the first Polkadot platform to build a fractional trading marketplace of non-fungible tokens (NFTs) with its own public blockchain, announced an undisclosed number of funding by PAKA, LD CAPITAL, CMS, AU21 CAPITAL, DFG(Digital Finance Group) and Crasolum. NFTmart is trying to become the world's most professional NFT decentralized trading market. It is divided into two parts. The first part is called nftmart.network, an open and decentralized NFT public chain mainly used to issuance NFT products and transaction data on the chain. The second part provides friendly transaction scenarios for the nftmart.io website so that users can upload or trade NFT conveniently and quickly.
NFTMart is airdropping free testnet coins to airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive the tokens. The testnet coins can be swapped at a later stage.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the NFTMart airdrop form.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet this tweet.
Submit your Polkadot wallet address and other details to the form.
You will get free testnet coins after completing all tasks and you can swap your testnet coins to mainnet coins once mainnet goes live.
The testnet coins will be distributed within five days after the end of the event

Name: Waypoint
Description:
Waypoint provides bridges between networks, starting with BSC and MATIC, for ease of moving assets across various chains. The WPNT token can be bought on one network, bridged and then sold on another in order for users to transfer funds. The choice for which chains to be bridged in the future will be made via voting by WPNT holders.
Waypoint is airdropping a total of 10,000,000 WPNT to LINK & SNX holders and users who’ve used Eth-Matic Bridge. The snapshot of LINK & SNX holders who had at least 0.1 LINK or SNX was taken on April 1st, 2021 and the snapshot of Eth-Matic Bridge users was taken in March 2021. Eligible participants will be able to claim 400 WPNT tokens until May 10th, 2021.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Waypoint airdrop claim page.
Connect your Metamask and change the network to BSC or Polygon according to your eligibility.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim 400 WPNT tokens.
The snapshot of LINK & SNX holders who had at least 0.1 LINK or SNX was taken on April 1st, 2021 and the snapshot of Eth-Matic Bridge users was taken in March 2021.
Eligible users have until May 10th, 2021, to claim the tokens.
Unclaimed tokens will be redistributed.

Name: LOTTO
Description:
LOTTO is a new type of lottery token that automatically enters all holders into a lottery once per week. In one transaction, LOTTO performs a unique rebase that removes 10 tokens from all holders, pools those tokens together, and gives them to one random participant.
LOTTO is airdropping free LOTTO tokens to users who’ve met certain conditions. Top 50 DeFi token holders, Upfiring (UFR) holders, PoolTogether users and users who’ve registered for the airdrop via Telegram and 4Chan are eligible to claim up to 2,000 LOTTO.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the LOTTO airdrop claim page.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim your tokens.
A snapshot was taken on January 18th, 2021 at 6 AM EST.
Top 50 DeFi token holders mentioned in the below Medium article, Upfiring (UFR) holders, PoolTogether users and users who’ve registered for the airdrop via Telegram and 4Chan are eligible to claim the rewards.
Top 50 DeFi token holders can claim 400 LOTTO tokens.
Upfiring (UFR) holders who had at least 1 UFR on the snapshot date can claim 2,000 LOTTO.
Users who’ve ever bought a ticket on PoolTogether can claim 400 LOTTO and users who’ve interacted with the PoolTogether V2 contract can also claim 400 LOTTO.
Telegram and 4Chan users who’ve registered for the airdrop are also eligible to receive 400 LOTTO.
For more information regarding the airdrop and to see the full list of eligible projects, see this Medium post.

Name: 1inch
Description:
1inch is a decentralized exchange aggregator that sources liquidity from various exchanges and can split a single trade transaction across multiple DEXs. Smart contract technology empowers this aggregator to enable users to optimize and customize their trades. With the release of 1INCH token and the addition of liquidity pools to the platform, you can now add liquidity to 1inch liquidity pools and stake LP tokens to earn 1INCH token.
Initital airdrop for early adopters still claimable: To celebrate the launch of the 1INCH token, 1inch airdropped free tokens to early adopters and liquidity providers. All wallets that have interacted with 1inch before December 24 (00:00 UTC) are eligible to receive the tokens if they meet certain conditions and liquidity providers will also receive additional rewards. Click here to scroll down to find out more about this campaign.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the 1inch claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
Click on the purple horse button in the top right corner and click on “Claim”.
If you’re eligible, then you will receive free 1INCH tokens.
All wallets that had interacted with 1inch before December 24 (00:00 UTC) and have made at least one trade before September 15 or made four trades or made a total of $20 worth of trades are eligible to receive the rewards.
1inch liquidity providers will also receive free 1INCH tokens based on the liquidity mining program announced earlier this fall.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: UMA
Description:
UMA’s mission is to make financial markets universally accessible—unrestrained by censorship, pre-existing financial and social capital, or beliefs and values. The economic freedom created by universal market access creates equal opportunity to pursue prosperity and build financial independence.
UMA has allocated a total of 2,000,000 UMA for the airdrop of KPI Options to various participants. The snapshot was taken on February 10th, 2021, at 05:00:49 PM UTC of various governance participants, UMA token holders and other UMA community participants. Eligible participants can claim free KPI Options until June 30th, 2021, at 22:00 UTC and can then redeem them for at least 0.1 UMA each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the UMA KPI Options claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim KPI Options in the form of uTVL-0621 tokens.
The snapshot was taken on February 10th, 2021, at 05:00:49 PM UTC of various participants.
The eligible participants and their corresponding rewards are mentioned below:
Users who’ve held at least 10 UMA in their private wallet – 120 KPI Options
Top 50 UMA Discord participants – 120 KPI Options
Any address that has voted in UMA governance – 120 KPI Options
Any address that has minted a UMA synthetic token – 120 KPI Options
Governance participants of Yearn, Yam, Sushi, BadgerDAO, and Balancer – 90 KPI Options
The claim will be open till June 30th, 2021, at 22:00 UTC and users can then redeem them for at least 0.1 UMA each. The redemption ratio will depend on the TVL of UMA at the end of June.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see article 1, article 2 and article 3.

Name: Liquifi
Description:
Liquifi is a protocol for decentralized digital asset exchange. It is based on the liquidity pool principle. It means that Liquifi maintains pools for various digital asset pairs that are used to perform swap operations automatically using Liquifi automatic market maker (AMM) model.
Liquifi is airdropping a total of 100,000 LQF to airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to get an equal share of the total airdrop pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Liquifi airdrop form.
Join their Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter.
Make a post about Liquifi and post it on Linkedin, Twitter, Instagram or Reddit.
Submit your details to the airdrop form.
A total pool of 100,000 LQF will be equally distributed among all the eligible participants.
You need to have at least 100 followers on your social channels to be eligible.
The rewards will be distributed after April 14th, 2021.

Name: VINE Protocol
Description:
Vine Protocol is a multi-chain protocol for liquidity mining, market making, DeFi token offering and DEX aggregation. It provides all these services at zero cost to the users that have enabled transaction fee mining.
VINE Protocol is airdropping 500 VINE to airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bot to receive the tokens. Also get 20 VINE for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet the pinned tweet.
Follow them on Medium.
Submit your details to the Telegram bot.
You will get 500 VINE tokens.
Also get 20 VINE for each referral.
The rewards will be distributed on May 10th, 2021.

Name: Opensea Traders
Description:
Opensea Traders is an ERC-20 and NFT airdrop for everyone that traded via Opensea in Q1 2021.
Opensea Traders is airdropping 1 OST NFT + 1 OST per trade to early OpenSea traders. A snapshot of users who’ve traded at OpenSea was taken at Q1 of 2021 and eligible addresses can claim the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Opensea Traders website.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
Scroll down and submit your ETH address and click on “Check”.
If you’re eligible then you will be able to claim 1 OST NFT + 1 OST per trade.
The snapshot of users that traded on the OpenSea platform was taken in Q1 of 2021.
A total of 59,868 unique users qualified for the airdrop.

Name: MurAll
Description:
MurAll is an on-chain digital collaborative mural/canvas/wall that anyone anywhere can draw on, without restrictions on what you can draw. The entire ethos of the MurAll project is that it fits with the blockchain narrative of a neutral place that doesn’t filter, censor or stop any transaction.
MurAll is airdropping free PAINT tokens to NFT artists and NFT holders. Verified NFT artists from Known Origin, Rarible, SuperRare and Async Art and ERC-721 compatible NFT holders are eligible to claim the airdrop. NFT artists snapshot was taken on November 15th, 2020 and NFT holders snapshot was taken on December 18th, 2020. Eligible NFT artists can claim 1,048,576 PAINT and NFT holders can claim 193,537 PAINT tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the MurAll website.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you can claim your PAINT tokens.
The snapshot of verified NFT artists from Known Origin, Rarible, SuperRare and Async Art was taken on November 15th, 2020 and the snapshot of  NFT holders was taken on December 18th, 2020.
NFT holders must’ve used ERC-721 compatible NFTs and have had more incoming than outgoing transactions with said NFTs to be eligible.
Eligible participants have until January 22nd, 2022 to claim the rewards.
For more information regarding the airdrop, check out the MurALL FAQ page.

Name: ZKSwap
Description:
ZKSwap is a brand new exchange protocol based on ZK-Rollups technology. Through Zk-Rollups technology, all ERC20 tokens are transferred to Layer2, and the consistent state of Layer1 and Layer2 is guaranteed based on continuously generated zero-knowledge proofs. This solution allows all exchanges to execute on Layer 2, achieving real-time swap with zero gas fees, unlimited scalability, removing the constraint from the Ethereum’s TPS, and block confirmation time.
ZKSwap is airdropping free ZKS to ZKS holders. Hold your ZKS on their Layer 2 wallet for four weeks to be eligible to receive the reward.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold ZKS in ZKSwap layer 2.
A snapshot will be taken every day for four weeks during the campaign period.
The basic savings reward a user receives will be based on the lowest value of all snapshots during the week. The basic rewards will be distributed on the following Monday with an annualized APY of 10%.
Additional bonus rewards will be distributed after four weeks based on the lowest value of the account’s holding during four weeks with an annualized APY of 10%. The bonus rewards will be distributed after the end of the campaign period.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Mofi Finance
Description:
Mofi Finance is creating a DeFi platform that aims to work, including services such as yield-earning, MOFI Swap, MOFI NFT platform and Mofi Starter
Mofi Finance is giving away 20 MOFI tokens to thousand lucky participants. Create an account at Mofi Finance and complete simple social tasks to get a chance to win the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at Mofi Finance.
Verify your mail and log in.
Now visit this airdrop page.
Join their Telegram group. (+4 MOFI)
Join their Telegram channel. (+4 MOFI)
Follow them on Medium. (+3 MOFI)
Follow them on Twitter. (+4 MOFI)
Retweet the last tweet. (+5 MOFI)
Submit your details to the airdrop page.
Thousand lucky participants will be randomly selected to win 20 MOFI each.

Name: QoinIQ
Description:
QoinIQ is trying to become the reference trading platform in the crypto universe, by creating a comprehensive and intuitive set of tools directed at both the seasoned expert trader, as well as the savvy non-professional investor.
QoinIQ is giving away a total of $100,000 worth of QoinIQ tokens. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bot to get a chance to win $40 worth of QoinIQ tokens. Top 50 referrals will also get up to $1,500 worth of QoinIQ tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Like their Facebook page and like and comment on this post with the hashtag #QoinIQ.
Follow them on Instagram and like and comment on this post with the hashtag #QoinIQ.
Follow them on Reddit and upvote and comment on this post with the hashtag #QoinIQ.
Follow them on LinkedIn and like and comment on this post with the hashtag #QoinIQ.
Submit your details to the bot.
Two thousand lucky participants will be randomly selected to win $40 worth of QoinIQ each.
Top 50 referrals will also get up to $1,500 worth of QoinIQ tokens.

Name: POAP
Description:
POAP is a software system that allows humans to collect badges (in the form of non fungible tokens) every time they participate in an activity, in person or remotely. It's a system that event organizers can easily use to distribute attendance crypto-badges to people that show up, a tool for attendees to display and share the badges they have obtained and an open standard for Dapp developers to build on top of.
POAP is airdropping free NFTs to early participants of historic crypto events. Visit the airdrop page, connect your Metamask wallet and click on the relevant event page to claim your NFT. Once claimed, they can be viewed on POAPscan or any other NFT-enabled interfaces like Ethereum and traded on OpenSea.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the POAP website. and connect your Metamask wallet from the top right.
Participants of historic crypto events will be able to claim free POAP NFTs. These includes users that were among the original group of 409 INVaders that helped establish the Inverse Finance DAO, the first Beacon Chain depositors and validators, qualified r/ethtrader subreddit users, AAVE V2 Pioneers, users that helped launching the yearn.finance protocol and participants of many other events mentioned on the airdrop page.
Click on “Claim your POAP” to check if you’re eligible to claim your free POAP for the respective crypto event.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim your NFT using Metamask.
Claimed NFTs can be viewed on POAPscan or any other NFT-enabled interfaces like Ethereum or OpenSea.
Claimed can also be traded on NFTs marketplaces like OpenSea.

Name: DeFiScale
Description:
DeFiScale offers customers participation in the diversified pool of profits, allocated in assets related to blockchain projects operating in the most lucrative industries – gambling and finances. Their investors make deposits available in two assets – USDT and DFC. In exchange, they offer fixed interest for the entire deposit time.
DeFiScale is giving away a total of $50,000 worth of DFC tokens. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bot to get a chance to win $40 worth of DFC. Top 50 referrals will also get up to $1,500 worth of DFC tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet this tweet with a comment and hashtags #DFC #Defi #DefiScale.
Like their Facebook page and like and comment on this post with hashtags #DFC #Defi #DefiScale.
Follow them on Instagram and like and comment on this post with hashtags #DFC #Defi #DefiScale.
Submit your details to the bot.
Thousand lucky participants will be randomly selected to win $40 worth of DFC each.
Top 50 referrals will also get up to $1,500 worth of DFC tokens.

Name: SATO
Description:
SATO is a brand new cross-chain oracle system, the world’s first algorithmic stable coin that supports rebase of multiple smart chains. Their goal is to provide people with equal dividends and make the game fairer through stablecoins.
SATO is airdropping a total of 500,000 SATO tokens to certain communities. A snapshot of BADGER, DIGG and AMPL holders and Gitcoin donors was taken on March 25th. Eligible participants will be able to claim at least 10 SATO each from 5th April – 25th April 2021. Users can also earn more SATO by participating in the SATO staking program.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the SATO airdrop claim page.
Connect your Metamask wallet and claim your rewards.
The claim has started on April 5th, 2021, at 20:00 UTC and will end on April 25th, 2021.
A snapshot of BADGER, DIGG and AMPL holders and Gitcoin donors was taken on March 25th, 2021.
A total of 50,000 addresses are eligible for the airdrop in which the total airdrop pool will be distributed equally to the participants.
Each address will be able to claim at least 10 SATO tokens.
A total of 300,000 SATO will be distributed to users before 21:00 (UTC) on April 14th who claim before April 14th at 13:00 (UTC) and a total of 200,000 SATO will be distributed to users before 21:00 (UTC) on April 25th who claim after April 14th at 13:00 (UTC). For more information regarding distribution, see this Medium article.
You will have twenty days from the start of the claim period to claim your rewards.
All unclaimed rewards will be redistributed to airdrop participants.
Participate in SATO staking to earn more SATO tokens.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Secret Network
Description:
Secret Network is a first-of-its-kind, open-source blockchain that provides data privacy by default. As the first blockchain to support encrypted inputs, encrypted outputs, and encrypted state for smart contracts, Secret Network allows for new kinds of powerful decentralized applications to be built.
Secret Network is airdropping 10% of all the SEFI supply to SCRT stakers, SecretSwap LPs, Secret Network – Ethereum bridge users and certain Ethereum DeFi communities that are supported on the Secret Ethereum Bridge. The remaining 90% supply will be distributed to SecretSwap users, SEFI and SCRT stakers and for the development fund over the course of four years.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Secret Network will take random snapshots between March 4th and SEFI genesis, which is on March 31st.
A total of 10% of all SEFI supply will be distributed to eligible users at genesis as follows:
75% will be distributed to SCRT stakers, SecretSwap LPs, Secret Network – Ethereum bridge users.
The remaining 25% will be distributed to certain Ethereum DeFi communities that are supported on the Secret Ethereum Bridge.
The remaining 90% of the supply will be distributed after genesis to SecretSwap users, SEFI and SCRT stakers and for the development fund over the course of four years.
For more information regarding the airdrop and distribution, see this Medium post.

Name: Hydra
Description:
Hydra is a permissionless, open-source, proof-of-stake blockchain built on top of the most proven open-source technologies - QTUM, Bitcoin, Ethereum and BlackCoin’s PoV v3, designed by Pavel Vasin. The philosophy behind Hydra is to implement critical economic features while utilizing proven technology for data transmission.
Hydra is airdropping a total of 18,585,932 HYDRA to HRC-20 LOC holders over a period of 350 days. A varying snapshot will be taken every week for 50 weeks and eligible holders will receive free HYDRA within seven days of each snapshot. Eligible holders will receive 2% of the LOC holdings as HYDRA coins.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold HRC-20 LOC tokens in your Hydra wallet.
If you’re having ERC-20 LOC tokens, then swap them to HRC-20 to be eligible. For more information regarding swapping, see this page.
A snapshot will be taken every week for 50 weeks, in which each week will have an allocation of 2% of the total airdrop pool.
The first distribution is planned to happen around April 1st and the snapshot a few days before that. Follow their announcements to see the snapshot date.
The rewards will be distributed within seven days after each snapshot.
Users who join after the first snapshot and users who increase the balance after the first snapshot will only receive the rewards after a cool-down period of four weeks. For more information regarding this, see this Medium article.
A one-time KYC is mandatory for all participants. Complete your KYC verification from here to be eligible to receive the rewards.
A certain percentage of airdropped HYDRA as mentioned in this article must be maintained every week in the wallet to be eligible for the airdrop.
Eligible holders will receive 2% of the LOC held during each snapshot as HYDRA coins.
All unclaimed HYDRA coins will be burned.
Your weekly distribution amount, KYC status etc. can be tracked from this sheet.
For more information regarding the airdrop requirements and distribution, see this Medium article.

Name: DNFTfomo
Description:
DNFTfomo is a cross-chain decentralized NFT asset network based on substance, committed to building a new generation of NFT protocol. The DNFTfomo Protocol integrates the functions of NFT asset creation, NFT asset decentralized transaction/auction, NFT asset maintenance tax, NFT recovery mechanism, and DNFTfomo governance. At the same time, NFT and assets are transferred across the chain by integrating Polkadot cross-chain asset protocol(XCMP).
DNFTfomo is giving away a total of 50,000 DNF tokens to the giveaway participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form. Five thousand valid participants will be randomly selected to win 2 DNF each. Also get 0.5 DNF for each referral. The rewards will be distributed once DNF is live on the Binance Smart Chain, which is expected to be in mid-April.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the DNFTfomo giveaway form.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet this tweet and tag DNF and three friends.
Join their Discord channel.
Submit your BEP-20 wallet address and other details to the giveaway form.
Five thousand lucky participants will be randomly selected to win 2 DNF each.
Also get 0.5 DNF for each referral.
The rewards will be distributed once DNF is live on the Binance Smart Chain, which is expected to happen in mid-April.
For more information regarding the giveaway, see this Medium post.

Name: My Lotto Coin
Description:
My Lotto Coin is a permissionless, DeFi-powered lottery bringing the most wished decentralized features into play and providing a full-inclusion model by incorporating the rules of classic games. Designed to empower players and disrupt unjust classic games, MyLottoCoin is the first of its kind for a blockchain-based lottery providing unique solutions to official and online lottery problems and offering features, opportunities, and tokenized reward programs that extend beyond current platforms.
My Lotto Coin is giving away $5,000 worth of MYL tokens to the top three content writers. Complete simple social tasks, write original content about the project’s uniqueness and submit your details to the giveaway form for a chance to win the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the My Lotto Coin giveaway form.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet the pinned tweet with a comment and hashtags #MYL #MyLottoCoin #cryptolottery.
Like their Facebook page. (Optional)
Follow them on Instagram. (Optional)
Write original content about the project’s uniqueness and share it on social media, tag/mention #MyLottoCoin in the post and share the post’s screenshot to their Telegram group.
Submit your details to the giveaway form.
The top three content writers will be selected to share $5,000 worth of MYL tokens.

Name: Anchor Protocol
Description:
Anchor is a decentralized money market and savings protocol built on top of the Terra blockchain. It fulfills the trifecta of Terraform Lab’s vision for implementing the 3 financial primitives of finance (savings, payments, and investing) on the Terra network.
Anchor Protocol is airdropping a total of 50,000,000 ANC to early LUNA stakers. The snapshot was taken on January 15th at 00:02:02 UTC at a block height of 2179600. Visit the airdrop page and connect your Terra wallet to claim your rewards at a ratio of 1 LUNA : 0.16 ANC. An additional pool of 100M ANC will be distributed every week to LUNA stakers for the next two years.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Anchor Protocol airdrop page.
Connect your Terra wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will be able to claim your ANC rewards.
The snapshot of LUNA stakers was taken on January 15th at 00:02:02 UTC at a block height of 2179600.
A total pool of 50M ANC has been allocated in which the users who were staking LUNA during the snapshot are eligible to claim free ANC at a ratio of 1 LUNA : 0.16 ANC.
An additional pool of 100M ANC will be distributed every week to LUNA stakers over the next two years.
For more information regarding ANC distribution, see this page.

Name: BlockFi
Description:
With BlockFi you can use your cryptocurrency to earn interest at up to 8.6% APY, borrow cash, and fee-free buy or sell crypto. BlockFi services individuals and businesses worldwide including all 50 U.S. states. BlockFi’s vision is to bridge the worlds of traditional finance and blockchain technology to bring financial empowerment to clients on a global scale.
BlockFi is airdropping $10 worth of BTC to new users. Simply create an account at BlockFi, complete your KYC verification, deposit at least $100 worth of any crypto into your interest account and hold it for at least 30 days to be eligible to receive the BTC rewards and referral rewards (up to $20 worth of BTC for each ref). You will also earn up to 9.3% APY interest on your deposited crypto.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the BlockFi website.
Click on “Get started” and sign up.
Verify your mail and log in.
Complete your KYC verification.
Now make a deposit worth $100 of any type of crypto into your interest account and hold it for at least 30 days.
You will get $10 worth of BTC.
Also get $10 worth of BTC for the first five referrals and $20 worth of BTC for the subsequent referrals.
Hold your minimum balance of $100 for at least 30 days to receive your reward, earn interest and to be eligible for the referral program.
The rewards will be distributed on the 15th of every month.

Name: YFDAI
Description:
YFDAI is an entire permissionless DeFi ecosystem that combines Staking & Farming services and soon, Lending/Borrowing services, SafePredict, and Insurance together with their own DEX called SafeSwap and their own LaunchPad where legitimate projects in the DeFi space can launch their new vetted projects with contract audits, locked liquidity and locked dev tokens in time-release smart contracts.
YFDAI is airdropping a total of 21,000,000 SSGT tokens to YF-DAI holders, stakers and farmers. Hold, stake or farm as mentioned in the below steps to be eligible to receive free SSGT rewards. Users who’ve not sold or moved their rewards will receive additional rewards. The rewards will be equally distributed every month over the course of six months.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold YF-DAI in a private wallet or stake or farm YF-DAI.
The first snapshot was taken on March 9th, 2021 and users who held YF-DAI during this time will receive SSGT in a ratio of 1 YF-DAI : 1250 SSGT and users who were staking or farming YF-DAI during this time will receive SSGT in a ratio of 1 YF-DAI : 1350.
Holders between March 9th, 2021 and March 16th, 2021 will receive SSGT in a ratio of 1 YF-DAI : 1100 SSGT and users who stake or farm during this time will receive SSGT in a ratio of 1 YF-DAI : 1150 SSGT.
Users who hold, stake or farm YF-DAI after March 16th, 2021, will not be eligible for the airdrop.
The rewards will be equally distributed every month over the course of six months.
There’s no minimum YF-DAI you need to hold to be eligible for the airdrop.
SSGT holders who’ve not sold or moved SSGT during the six-month distribution period will receive a bonus of 5% of their total SSGT airdrop and YF-DAI stakers and farmers who’ve not sold, moved, unstaked or not removed LP tokens from the farms will receive a bonus of 10% of their total SSGT airdrop. Bonus tokens will be distributed after the initial six-month distribution period.
Unclaimed SSGT from the airdrop pool will be distributed to the staking pool.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: BTCST
Description:
BTCST is the bridge between Bitcoin hashrate assets and the DeFi world. Each BTCST is collateralized by 0.1 TH/s of Bitcoin mining power. By staking BTCSTs, holders of the tokens will receive daily Bitcoin distributions that correspond to the mining power staked.
BTCST is airdropping free BTCST tokens to Telegram users. Create an account on Binance, join BTCST’s Korean Telegram group and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive anywhere from $1 – $5 worth of BTCST. The top ten referrers will also get a share from a pool of $2,000 BTCST.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the BTCST airdrop form.
Create an account on Binance.
Join the BTCST’s Korean Telegram group.
Submit your BTCST wallet address from Binance and other details to the airdrop form.
You will randomly receive $1 – $5 worth of BTCST tokens.
Top 10 referrers will also get a share from a pool of $2,000 BTCST.

Name: Graphene
Description:
Graphene is a next-generation Blockchain architecture that makes use of the CASPER staking consensus protocol, being developed by the Phore Blockchain team. Graphene can support complex decentralized applications (dApps), business models, and allow the creation of customized shards that are optimized for different use cases while allowing full interoperability between shards.
Graphene and Phore are jointly airdropping free GFN to PHR holders. There will be a total of six snapshots in which the first snapshot will be taken on March 14th at 23:59 (GMT). The remaining snapshots will be announced at a later time. Eligible users will receive 1.66 GFN per PHR for the first five snapshots and 1.7 GFN per PHR for the sixth snapshot.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold PHR coins in your Phore wallet.
A total of six snapshots will be taken starting from the first snapshot on March 14th at 23:59 (GMT).
Eligible users will receive 1.66 GFN per PHR for the first five snapshots and 1.7 GFN per PHR for the sixth snapshot.
If you participate in all six snapshots, then you will receive 10 GFN for every 1 PHR.
The rewards will be distributed on the Binance Smart Chain. For more information, see this announcement.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.
Follow their social channels to see the announcements regarding the remaining snapshots.

Name: Ruler Protocol
Description:
Ruler Protocol is a lending platform where users can borrow their preferred cryptocurrency with any other cryptocurrency as collateral. It aims to fill the gap by enabling no liquidations as long as borrowers pay back on time, interest rates determined by supply and demand, fixed-rate loans at the moment of borrow/lend, fungible loans that can be tradable anytime & anywhere.
Ruler Protocol is airdropping a total of 3,333 RULER to users who participated in Cover Protocol, Yearn Ecosystem, and Inverse governance via snapshot.page and to Ruler Protocol testing program participants. All eligible participants will be able to claim 2 RULER tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Ruler Protocol claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will see the “2 RULER” claim button.
Claim it to receive 2 RULER tokens.
Governance participants of Cover Protocol, Yearn Ecosystem, and Inverse (via snapshot.page) and users who’ve participated in the Ruler Protocol testing programs are eligible to claim the tokens.
You will only be able to claim your tokens for 20 days. All unclaimed tokens will be sent to the treasury.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: Phemex
Description:
Phemex is a professional and trustworthy global cryptocurrency derivatives exchange. They offer Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Litecoin, and EOS perpetual contracts, with up to 100x leverage.
Phemex is giving away prizes worth up to $30,000. Participate in the Phemex Twitter Giveaway and win one of the prizes, including $10k worth of BTC. Refer your friends to the giveaway and increase your chances of winning.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Phemex giveaway page and sign up.
Follow Phemex on Twitter and retweet the giveaway tweet from the giveaway page. (Required)
Complete additional tasks to earn more entries.
Also get an entry for each referral.
If the Phemex Twitter page reaches 40,000 followers, then Milestone 1 will be unlocked, if it reaches 45,000 followers, then Milestone 2 will be unlocked, if it reaches 50,000 followers, then Milestone 3 will be unlocked and if it reaches 60,000 followers, then Milestone 4 will be unlocked.
Top Milestone prizes include SAMSUNG Odyssey G9 Monitor, Razer Gaming Set, Razer Blade Pro 17 Laptop etc.
One lucky participant will win $10k worth of BTC.
The more entries you get, the greater your chances of winning.
The winners will be randomly selected on March 22nd, 2021.
The winners will be contacted through mail and Twitter.
For more information regarding the giveaway, see this article.

Name: Pangolin
Description:
Pangolin is a decentralized exchange (DEX) that runs on Avalanche, uses the same automated market-making (AMM) model as Uniswap, features a native governance token called PNG that is fully community distributed and is capable of trading all tokens issued on Ethereum and Avalanche.
Pangolin is airdropping a total of 26,900,000 PNG tokens to UNI and SUSHI holders. The snapshot was taken on December 7th, 2020 and eligible holders can claim their tokens within one month of Pangolin’s launch (deadline is 10th of March 2021).
Step-by-Step Guide:
To check the amount you are able to claim, follow this link and type in your address at the bottom of the page. Take the value output and divide by 10^18 to get the number of PNG tokens you are able to claim. A 400 UNI balance will have got you around 80 tokens.
Visit the Avalanche bridge page.
Connect your Metamask wallet where you held your UNI or SUSHI tokens during the snapshot date.
The snapshot was taken on December 7th, 2020.
Now select UNI or SUSHI as the token you would like to transfer. This step costs a lot of gas (check gasnow.org for appropriate gas fee) + bridge fee, but could be worth paying it depending on your amount of claimable PNG.
You need to send at at least 1 UNI or SUSHI to activate the claim. You can still claim even if you don’t have any UNI/SUSHI in your wallet by buying UNI/SUSHI on some exchange and sending it across the bridge.
Now select your destination address and complete the transaction. Select “I want to send funds to my address” so that the UNI/SUSHI crosses the bridge into the same address controlled by your wallet but on the Avalanche network. (Warning for Trezor users: It seems like there is no way to get your UNI/SUSI back to ETH Mainnet right now, because Avalanche does not support Trezor yet)
You need some AVAX to pay the transaction fee for the following steps. Buying at least 0.3 AVAX from an exchange is recommended.
Because Avalanche works on multiple chains, you need to create an Avalanche wallet, get your X-chain address from the wallet and send your AVAX from the exchange to your X-chain address. Follow this tutorial to learn more. (do not use Ledger, because cross chain transfers won’t work with Ledger)
Now do a cross-chain transfer from X-chain to C-chain and send your AVAX from your C-chain wallet to your ETH address on the Avalanche network.
Set up your Metamask to work with the Avalanche network so that you can access/claim your PNG airdrop on Avalanche. Follow the steps on this page to learn more.
Visit the Pangolin app page after you’ve accessed your airdrop wallet on Avalanche.
Click on “Airdrop” and claim your tokens. You need to exactly set 470 Gwei gas price, otherweise your transaction will be stucked an Metamask has to be reseted until you try again.
The number of tokens you will receive will be based on this formula: PNG amount = 0.7 * (UNI amount ^ 0.8) & PNG amount = 0.3 * (SUSHI amount ^ 0.8).
UNI holders have an allocation of 18.5M PNG and SUSHI holders have an allocation of 7.8M PNG tokens.
After claiming your airdrop you could  send your AVAX and UNI/SUSHI from C-chain to X-chain address and then withdraw it to an exchange without the need to pay expensive bridge fees.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this page or check this extremely detailed tutorial on Reddit. Follow this tutorial to set up your Metamask for Avalanche.

Name: Utile Network
Description:
Utile Network is a unified digital workplace for the cryptocurrency community - combining analytical and operational tools for investors and influencers in the blockchain sector. It allows receiving rewards for generating, adding, monitoring and detecting valuable information.
Utile Network is airdropping 1666 UTL tokens ($50) to max. 5000 participants. Create an account at Utile Network, complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive the tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Utile Network airdrop form.
Create an account at Utile Network and add at least three trading ideas.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter and like + retweet the pinned tweet using hashtags #BNB #BTC #BSC $BSC $BNB $BTC and tag at least two friends.
Submit your details to the airdrop form.
You will get $50 worth of UTL tokens.
The rewards will be distributed to your Utile Network account and can be withdrawn after the presale.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: Velo
Description:
Velo is a blockchain based financial protocol enabling digital credit issuance and borderless asset transfer for businesses using a smart contract system. Velo’s core mission is to build a decentralized settlement network that allows partners to safely and securely transfer value between each other in a timely and transparent way.
Velo is airdropping 20 USDT worth of VELO tokens to the first 5,000 airdrop participants. Create an account at OKEx, complete level 2 KYC verification and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account on OKEx.
Complete Level 2 KYC verification.
Submit your details to this airdrop form.
First eligible 5,000 participants will receive 20 USDT worth of VELO tokens.
The airdrop is available only to new OKEx users.

Name: Sperax
Description:
Sperax mission is to make decentralized financial services accessible to all global citizens. Sperax BDLS consensus protocol ensures the highest-level security and performance with their original blockchain design. The Sperax Foundation issues a native multi-currency stablecoin, the first in the public blockchain ecosystem, to bridge the gap between Internet users and crypto-native applications.
Sperax is airdropping free SPA to SPA holders in a total of three rounds. Simply hold your SPA tokens on Sperax Play, private wallet or in a supporting exchange to be eligible to receive the airdrop. A snapshot will be taken two days before each round at random block height.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold at least 100 SPA tokens on Sperax Play, private wallet or in a supporting exchange.
There will be a total of three airdrop rounds. The first round will start on February 26th, the second round on March 17th and the last round on March 31st, 2021. Each round will start at 9 AM ET.
A snapshot will be taken two days before each round at a random block height. The block height can be checked from this smart contract.
An announcement regarding the details will be published on the Sperax Telegram group on the day of each airdrop round at 9 AM ET.
Hold your SPA on Sperax Play to get an extra 100% airdrop. You will have 48 hours to claim the airdrop from the Sperax Play app and the rewards will be distributed within 72 hours.
Users having SPA tokens in a private wallet will receive the rewards within five days after each round.
Users having SPA tokens on a supporting exchange will receive the rewards according to the policy of the exchange. Follow the social channels of Sperax to see the list of the supporting exchanges.
The number of rewards a user receives will be based on the calculation proposed in the below Medium article.
For more information regarding the airdrop, rules and calculation, see this Medium article.

Name: SelfKey
Description:
SelfKey is a blockchain based end-to-end digital identity system with an integrated marketplace, designed to put identity owners in control of their personal data, to allow them to request identity claims attestations and to instantly apply for passports, residency and financial services, sign up for exchanges and participate in token sales in a safe, secure manner.
SelfKey and Binance are jointly airdropping a total of 60,000,000 KEY & 80,000 KEYFI to KEY holders on Binance. Monthly snapshots will be taken of your KEY balances on Binance starting from 28 February 2021 for the KEYFI airdrop and from 8 March 2021 for the KEY airdrop.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold your KEY tokens on Binance during the snapshots.
A snapshot will be taken every month at 8:00 AM HKT (UTC +8:00) for a total of five months starting from 8 March 2021 till 8 July 2021.
You need to hold at least 500,000 KEY as the average amount through the snapshots to be eligible to receive the airdrop.
Eligible holders will receive 1 KEY for every 60 KEY tokens held on average throughout the snapshots.
The rewards will be distributed on 18 July 2021.

Name: Seedify.fund
Description:
Seedify.fund is a disruptive blockchain incubator program and a decentralized seed-stage fund, empowered through DAO based community-involvement mechanisms. At Seedify.fund, stakers and our community members who involve in the success of the projects that get their seed fund and incubated through community votings, receive reward tokens from selected projects, creating a DeFi seed fund mechanism.
Seedify.fund is giving away 500 $SFUND each to 250 lucky participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway page to win the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Seedify.fund giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Complete simple social tasks to earn a total of seven entries.
Also get two entries for each referral.
Two fifty participants will be randomly selected to win 500 $SFUND each.

Name: PoolTogether
Description:
PoolTogether is a protocol for no-loss prize games on Ethereum. Modeled on the well-established concept of "no loss lotteries" and "prize savings accounts" the protocol offers a chance to win prizes in exchange for depositing funds.
PoolTogether is airdropping a total of 1,400,000 POOL (1% of total supply) to early PoolTogether users. All users who’ve deposited on PoolTogether until January 14th, 2021, at midnight UTC are eligible to claim the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the PoolTogether claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will see a “Claim POOL” button.
Claim it to receive your tokens.
All users who’ve deposited on PoolTogether until January 14th, 2021, at midnight UTC are eligible to claim the rewards.
The number of POOL tokens you will receive will be based not only on amount of the deposit but also how long you have been taking part in PoolTogether.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.

Name: Sifchain
Description:
Sifchain’s mission is to be an omni-chain DEX. Sifchain, which inherits its infrastructure from Thorchain and Cosmos, will target 20–25 blockchains (such as Ethereum and Stellar) for cross-chain integration. It will also simplify the process of blockchain integration, lowering the development process for the open source community so that additional cross-chain integrations will be cost minimized in terms of money and developer resources.
Sifchain is airdropping a total of 40,000,000 Rowan to RUNE and ATOM holders. Complete the tasks mentioned below to be eligible to receive an equal share from the total airdrop pool. Sifchain approved KYC applicants are also eligible for the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Sifchain will be airdropping Rowan tokens to RUNE and ATOM holders.
The snapshot was taken on February 18th, 2021.
You must’ve held at least 50 RUNE or 10 ATOM in a private wallet during the snapshot to be eligible.
Generate a Sifchain address. Instructions to create an address can be found here.
Now post a tweet with an image of Sif and also include your Sifchain address, mention @Sifchain and include hashtags #Sif, $ROWAN. Sif images can be found here.
If you’re a RUNE holder, then send 0.005 RUNE to address: bnb1p0kmzzrq0220agpey43nyp826pgh9rc5y9a4m3. Make sure to submit your Twitter username and Sifchain address in the Memo field. (e.g. utx0_:sif1hjkgsq0wcmwdh8pr3snhswx5xyy4zpgs833akh)
Up to 1,000 eligible ATOM addresses will receive an equal share of 0.5% of the total supply. Top 20% up to 1,000 addresses on Cosmos Hub will get an equal share of an additional pool of 0.5% of the total supply.
If you’re an ATOM holder, then send 0.005 ATOM to address: cosmos1ejrf4cur2wy6kfurg9f2jppp2h3afe5h6pkh5t. Make sure to submit your Twitter username and Sifchain address in the Memo field. (e.g. utx0_:sif1hjkgsq0wcmwdh8pr3snhswx5xyy4zpgs833akh)
Up to 1,000 eligible RUNE addresses will receive an equal share of 0.5% of the total supply. Top 20% up to 1,000 pooling addresses on BEPSwap will get an equal share of an additional pool of 0.5% of the total supply.
An additional pool of 2% of the total supply will be distributed equally to the approved Sifchain KYC applicants. Sifchain KYC applicants need to submit this google form to be eligible to receive the rewards.
The rewards will be distributed over the course of four months starting from one week after the end of the Sifchain public token sale. The token sale will end on Friday, February 26, at 6:00 am GMT.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.

Name: BlockNoteX
Description:
BlockNoteX is a digital asset with a 100% gold deposit on the Ethereum blockchain. The company behind BNOX is BlockBen, which is regulated within the European Union.
BlockNoteX and WhiteBIT are giving away a total of 1,750 BNOX and 10 BSO to lucky participants. Create an account at WhiteBIT, complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form to win the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at WhiteBIT.
Visit the BNOX website and subscribe to their newsletter.
Follow them on Twitter and like, retweet one tweet.
Subscribe to their Youtube channel.
Submit your details to this giveaway form.
A total of 350 lucky participants will get 5 BNOX each and ten lucky participants will get 1 BSO each.

Name: xDeFi
Description:
xDeFi is a stack of decentralized finance protocols. They believe that a fully developed DeFi ecosystem should start from well-established infrastructures. xDeFi ecosystem includes xDEX as one of optimized AMM DEXes, xHalfLife as a money stream protocol, xSTA as a stable coin minted from crypto assets, xBadge as a incentivating approoach based on social consensus, and any other DeFi building blocks which are essential for a well-ordered market.
xDeFi is giving away a total of 168,000 XDEX tokens to top participants. Sign up for the airdrop and complete simple tasks to earn points. The top 5,000 participants will get 30 XDEX each and the top three participants will get up to 10,000 XDEX.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the xDeFi giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Now complete simple tasks to earn points.
You need to complete at least 5 tasks to submit your ERC-20 wallet address.
Also earn more points for each referral.
The top 5,000 participants will get 30 XDEX each and the top three participants will get up to 10,000 XDEX.
The rewards will be distributed when the project goes live on the mainnet.
For more information regarding the giveaway, see this Medium post.

Name: DEXTools
Description:
DEXTools is a one-stop shop for DEX trading tools and information. It provides DEX traders with liquidity pool information, real-time charts, transaction history, charting tools, trending Uniswap 'hot pairs', project integrity ratings via the DEXT score, trackers for team wallet transactions, trackers for front-running bots, and much more.
DEXTools is airdropping a total of 12,000,000 DEXT tokens to premium holders. Hold at least 100,000 DEXT to be eligible to receive a share from a monthly pool of 1,000,000 DEXT.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold at least 100,000 DEXT in a private wallet.
The first snapshot was taken on the 15th of November 2020 at UTC 18:00 and the remaining 11 snapshots will be taken on the first of every month at UTC 00:00 till October 1st, 2021.
A total pool of 12,000,000 DEXT has been allocated in which each month has an allocation of 1,000,000 DEXT.
The number of DEXT rewards you get will be proportionate to the total eligible holdings of all wallets.
The rewards will be distributed every month around the same time the snapshot was taken.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.

Name: Bifrost
Description: Bifrost and BiFi are airdropping free BFC_K tokens to airdrop participants. Chat with the Telegram bot and complete simple social tasks to earn points. The points can be converted to BFC_K tokens every month and can then be converted to ERC-20-based BFC in the Bifrost Wallet in a 1:1 ratio, which will be launched in late 2021. You can also earn more points for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join their Telegram group and send any commands like /balance to the group.
You will get 500 points only if you’ve signed up using the above referral link.
You can also earn 500 points for each referral. Send the command /link to the bot to get your referral link.
Do additional tasks mentioned on this BFC bot page to earn more points.
Now visit this Bifrost airdrop form.
Share at least three posts about Bifrost and BIFI on any social platform.
Submit a screenshot of your posts, links to your posts and your Telegram username to the airdrop form.
The points will be converted to a Klaytn based token called BFC_K tokens and will be distributed to your Klaytn wallet every month.
The BFC bot has automatically created a Klaytn wallet for you in the bot. You can see it by sending the command /wallet to the bot.
The Klaytn based BFC_K token can be converted to the ERC-20-based BFC token in the Bifrost Wallet in a 1:1 ratio, which will be launched in late 2021.
You can earn a maximum of 1,000 BFC_K tokens.
For more information regarding the airdrop, rules and what to post, see this Medium page.

Name: Neutrino Protocol
Description:
Neutrino Protocol is an algorithmic price-stable cryptocurrency protocol that allows for the creation of stable coins tied to a specific real-world asset, such as national currency or commodity, collateralized by WAVES token. Neutrino Protocol is represented by a set of five interacting smart contracts written in the programming language RIDE and deployed to Waves Protocol blockchain
Neutrino Protocol is airdropping a total of 20,000 NSBT tokens to WAVES holders on Binance, Huobi, OKEx & Bithumb. Binance, Huobi, OKEx & Bithumb users who’ve at least 10 WAVES are eligible to receive the airdrop. A snapshot of Binance and Huobi users will be taken on February 10, 2021, at UTC 00:00:00 and a snapshot will be taken on February 21, 04:00 am UTC for OKEx and Bithumb users.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold at least 10 WAVES on Binance, Huobi, OKEx or on Bithumb.
A snapshot of Binance and Huobi users will be taken on February 10, 2021, at UTC 00:00:00 and a snapshot of OKEx and Bithumb users will be taken on February 21, 04:00 am UTC.
The number of tokens you will receive will depend on this calculation: user A = (amount of WAVES held by user A at the snapshot time / total amount of WAVES held by the exchange at the snapshot time) * total NSBT airdrop amount (5,000 NSBT).
Binance will have an allocation of 5,000 native Waves NSBT tokens, Huobi will have an allocation of 5,000 ERC-20 NSBT tokens, OKEx will have an allocation of 5,000 native Waves NSBT tokens and Bithumb will have an allocation of 5,000 native Waves NSBT tokens.
The distribution date of the NSBT rewards will be announced at a later time.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.
Also see the airdrop announcements from Binance, Huobi, OKEx and Bithumb.

Name: Bounce
Description:
Bounce is a decentralized auction platform, creating a competitive swap environment based on the principle of the scarcity of resources. The Bounce platform incorporates liquidity mining, decentralized governance and staking mechanisms.
Bounce and Tokamak Network are jointly airdropping $200,000 worth of AUCTION tokens to TON holders on Upbit. The snapshot will be taken on the 9th of February, 2021, at 16:00 KST and the eligible holders will receive free AUCTION in a ratio of 1 TON : 0.002 AUCTION. AUCTION token was previously called BOT and has been migrated recently.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold TON tokens on Upbit.
The snapshot will be taken on the 9th of February, 2021, at 16:00 KST.
Eligible holders will receive free AUCTION in a ratio of 1 TON : 0.002 AUCTION.
AUCTION token was previously called BOT and has been migrated recently. For more information regarding migration, see this Medium post.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.

Name: Dogecoin
Description:
Dogecoin is a decentralized, peer-to-peer digital currency that enables you to easily send money online. They were primarily used as a tipping system on Reddit and Twitter to reward the creation or sharing of quality content.
Binance is airdropping a total of $100,000 worth of DOGE coins to new and existing Binance users. Create a new account and complete at least two tasks to get $10 worth of DOGE. All users who make a trade on any DOGE pairs will receive additional DOGE coins based on their trading volume.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account on Binance.
Task 1: Purchase at least $50 or the equivalent in your currency worth of DOGE coins via a Credit/Debit card on Binance Buy Crypto.
Task 2: Deposit 1,000 DOGE or more into your spot wallet from an external wallet or exchange.
Task 3: Trade 5,000 DOGE or more (buys & sells) in any DOGE trading pairs (Fiat, Spot, Margin, or Futures).
The first 500 users who create an account during each daily qualifying period and completes at least two of the tasks mentioned above are eligible to receive the rewards.
There will be a total of five daily qualifying periods in which the first will run for 36 hours starting from 2021-01-29 at 12:00:00 PM (UTC) to 2021-01-30 23:59:59 (UTC) and the remaining four daily qualifying periods will run for 24 hours starting from 2021-01-31 to 2021-02-03 23:59:59 (UTC).
All eligible users will receive $10 worth of DOGE coins.
Also participate in the DOGE trading competition in which all users who trade any DOGE trading pairs will get a share from a total pool of $75,000 in DOGE based on their trading volume.
The rewards will be distributed within two weeks after the end of the airdrop.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Binance post.

Name: Invest & Hodl
Description:
Invest & Hodl is focused on bullish the assets of own investors with monthly passive income. lnvestHodl.com is a website that will have primary contact with Invest & Hodl investors. Also will predicts and prevents inflationary losses and manipulations on the principal currencies of own investors and presents them to own investors as gain.
Invest & Hodl is airdropping 10 iHODL to the airdrop participants. Create an account at Invest & Hodl and complete simple social tasks to receive the tokens. Also get 2 iHODL for each referral up to a maximum of 5 referrals.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Invest & Hodl registration page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Verify your mail and log in.
Join their Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet the pinned tweet.
You will get 10 iHODL tokens.
Also get 2 iHODL for each referral up to a maximum of five referrals.

Name: PolkaBridge
Description:
PolkaBridge is a decentralized application platform. PolkaBridge’s most noticeable product is PolkaBridge DEX - a decentralized exchange that allows users to swap tokens on Polkadot to other ones on other blockchain platforms without any centralized organizations. Also, with the smart farming mechanism, liquidity providers can earn more rewards than they think.
PolkaBridge is airdropping a total of 1,000,000 PBR tokens to the airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive 50 PBR tokens. Also get 50 PBR for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the PolkaBridge airdrop form.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet the pinned tweet.
Submit your details to the airdrop form.
You will get 50 PBR tokens.
Also get 50 PBR for each referral.
The rewards will be distributed on April 1, 2021.

Name: Stake DAO
Description:
Stake DAO is a new multi-service DeFi platform built by the community. Stake DAO removes the need to stake users' assets across multiple platforms. They provide a simple solution for staking a variety of tokens all from one dashboard. From Stake DAO, users can search through the best of DeFi and choose from the best products to help them beat the market.
Stake DAO is airdropping a total of 1,500,000 SDT tokens to active members of different projects. Gitcoin Round 8 Donors, $JULIEN holders, addresses registered with RektHQ, Lido contract depositors, Arbitrage DAO users and governance participators of other projects are eligible to claim the airdrop.
Step-by-Step Guide:
