Visit the Stake DAO website.
Connect your ETH wallet.
You will see a claim button and your claimable SDT tokens if you’re eligible.
Gitcoin Round 8 Donors, $JULIEN holders, addresses registered with RektHQ, Lido contract depositors, Arbitrage DAO users and governance participators of other projects mentioned in this Medium post are also eligible to claim the airdrop.
The snapshots of projects were taken on different dates. To see the snapshot dates, see this Medium post.
The claim started on Wednesday, 20 January 2021, at 22:37:13 GMT.
The claimable amount will decrease by 10% every day for 10 days from Friday, 22 January 2021, 22:37:13 GMT.
Any unclaimed tokens will be claimed by the multisig and will be redistributed at a later stage to users who partake in Stake DAO governance, provide SDT liquidity on Sushiswap and Uniswap, provide liquidity to the Vaults and other products, participate in governance proposals, contribute to the Stake DAO ecosystem/community.
Eligible addresses can be found in this spreadsheet.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.

Name: Furucombo
Description:
Furucombo is a tool built for end-users to optimize its DeFi strategy simply by drag and drop. It visualizes complex DeFi protocols into cubes. Users setup inputs/outputs and the cubes’ order (a “combo”), then Furucombo bundles all the cubes into one transaction and sends them out.
Furucombo is airdropping a total of 250,000,000 COMBO tokens to early contributors. Furucombo Donors, Combo Masters, ComboHacking Winners and early adopters can claim their free tokens now.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Furucombo App page.
Click on the “+” sign and click on “Claim COMBO”.
Now connect your ETH wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will see your rewards.
Click on”Claim COMBO” again to claim your tokens.
Wallets with two or more transactions before December 23rd will get 900 COMBO each and wallets with one transaction before December 23rd will get 350 COMBO each.
Users who’ve donated tokens or coins to Furucombo via Gitcoin grant rounds or directly to their deployer address before December 23rd will get 350 COMBO each.
Users who’ve been selected as Combo Masters by the Furucombo team will get 6,000 COMBO each.
Winners of the ComboHacking campaign before December 23rd will get 1,500 COMBO each.
You can only claim 25% of your airdrop amount for now and the rest will be vested for eight weeks.
The list of eligible airdrop wallets can be found here.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.

Name: Bybit
Description:
Bybit is a cryptocurrency derivative trading platform established in March 2018 and registered in the BVI. It is headquartered in Singapore and has offices in Hong Kong and Taiwan. They have users from all over the world including North America, Europe, Russia, Japan, South Korea and Southeast Asia, and are focused on serving everyone from individual retail clients to professional derivatives traders.
Bybit is giving away up to $500 worth of BTC to giveaway participants. Create an account at Bybit and make a BTC deposit to get the rewards. Also get $10 in BTC for you and your referral when your referral makes their first trade on BTCUSD Inverse Perpetual or Futures Contract.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Bybit registration page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Now visit this rewards page and enter “JACKPOT” into the voucher code field and click on “Redeem”.
Make a BTC deposit worth any amount to get a minimum of $15 in BTC.
The deposit and rewards tier are mentioned below:
Net Deposit BTC Rewards
≥ 0.01 BTC $15
≥ 0.05 BTC $50
≥ 0.1 BTC $100
≥ 0.5 BTC $300
≥ 1.5 BTC $500
You can get up to $500 worth of BTC for making a deposit.
All users who make a BTC deposit worth any amount will also get a $20 coupon.
Also earn additional rewards from the rewards page.
Also earn $10 in BTC for you and your referral when your referral makes their first trade on BTCUSD Inverse Perpetual or Futures Contract.
For more information, see this post.

Name: WikiBit
Description:
WikiBit is a project that establishes an authentic and reliable credit database system with wide coverage by connecting various credit data in series based on big-data multidimensional risk assessment and blockchain technology. Credit data was shared through a blockchain alliance to create an intelligent digital credit platform. Meanwhile, the WikiBit project team promises to reverse repurchase coins globally to make WikiBit the world's preferred credit currency.
WikiBit is airdropping a total of 100,000,000 WikiBit tokens to the airdrop participants. Visit the airdrop page and submit your ETH address and mobile number to receive 100 WikiBit. Also get 50 Wikibit for each referral up to 20 referrals and an extra 500 WikiBit if you refer 20 users. The rewards will be distributed on Feb. 28th, 2021.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the WikiBit airdrop page.
Submit your ETH address and click on “Get 100 WikiBits free”.
Now verify your mobile number.
You will get 100 WikiBits.
Also get 50 WikiBit for each referral up to a maximum of 20 referrals and an extra 500 WikiBit if you refer 20 users.
The rewards will be distributed on Feb. 28th, 2021.

Name: Lido
Description:
Lido is a liquid staking solution for ETH 2.0 backed by industry-leading staking providers. Lido lets users stake their ETH without locking assets or maintaining infrastructure whilst participating in on-chain activities, e.g. lending. Lido attempts to solve the problems associated with initial ETH 2.0 staking - illiquidity, immovability and accessibility - making staked ETH liquid and allowing for participation with any amount of ETH to improve the security of the Ethereum network.
Lido is airdropping a total of 4,000,000 LIDO tokens to early adopters. All holders and stakers of stETH and users who exchanged stETH:ETH and yvsteth for Uniswap LP tokens before December 28 are eligible to receive free LDO tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Lido claim page.
Connect your ETH wallet.
All holders and stakers of stETH and users who exchanged stETH:ETH and yvsteth for Uniswap LP tokens before December 28 are eligible to receive free LDO tokens.
If you’re eligible then you will see the number of tokens you will receive.
Click on “Claim LDO tokens” to claim your tokens.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: Chainge
Description:
Chainge, fueled by the brilliant infrastructure of Fusion, offers coded financial services one tap away. It is the gateway to decentralized, automated finance: the foundation of the upcoming internet-of-value revolution. With Chainge users are in complete control of the assets: no boundaries, no middlemen, just smooth and uncomplicated interaction with users money.
Chainge is airdropping free CHNG tokens to the airdrop participants. Create an account at Chainge and complete simple social tasks to earn up to 200 points. Also get 10 points for each referral, 3 points when your referral invites another friend and an additional 1 point when the friend of your friend invites another friend. The points will be converted to CHNG tokens in a 1:1 ratio at the product launch.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Chainge website.
Now click on “Account”.
Sign up using a social network or email.
Verify your mail.
You will get 20 points.
You will also get an extra 5 points for signing up using the above referral link.
Go to your profile and connect your Fusion wallet address or get your Fusion wallet address from here if you don’t already have one.
Complete additional tasks to earn up to 200 points.
Also get 10 points for each referral, 3 points when your referral invites another friend and an additional 1 point when the friend of your friend invites another friend.
The points will be converted to CHNG tokens in a 1:1 ratio at the product launch.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.

Name: Bondly
Description:
Bondly is an interoperable, transparent, and portable swap protocol designed to revolutionize traditional escrow methods and make everyone into their own digital marketplace. Their family of trust-enabling DeFi products is designed to be a part of everyday buying and selling activities, giving peace of mind for swap or online purchases.
Bondly and Mantra DAO are jointly airdropping a total of 1,000,000 BONDLY to OM stakers. Mantra DAO took a total of six snapshots between October 28th 12:00 UTC till November 30th of OM stakers on Mantra DAO and all the eligible stakers will receive free BONDLY over the course of December and January. The number of tokens you will receive will be equal to your overall proportion of the total staking pool for the time period, which means that if you’ve staked 100 OM over the course of the snapshot period, then you will receive 100 BONDLY tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Mantra DAO took six snapshots between October 28th till November 30th of OM stakers on Mantra DAO.
The first snapshot was on October 28th 12:00 UTC and the remaining snapshots were taken every week.
A total pool of 1,000,000 BONDLY will be distributed to all eligible OM stakers.
The number of tokens you will receive will be equal to your overall proportion of the total staking pool for the time period.
For example, if you’ve staked 100 OM over the snapshot period, you will receive 100 BONDLY tokens.
The rewards will be distributed over the course of December and January. You can see the complete distribution schedule below:
Distribution Date Number of BONDLY
December 28th, 2020 250,000 BONDLY
January 4th, 2021 250,000 BONDLY
January 11th, 2021 250,000 BONDLY
January 18th, 2021 250,000 BONDLY
For more information regarding the airdrop and distribution, see this Medium post.

Name: Megatech
Description:
Megatech is an Alternative Energy Supply company that is implementing the ultimate in green sustainable energy technology to overcome feasibility challenges and ensuring maximum efficiency and profitability. Megatech Token (MGT) was developed in 2020, and will be utilizing certifiably the best and most advanced Blockchain on the planet as an (APL–Token). Megatech (MGT) is registered as a security token and will revolutionize ICO/STO and crypto investments.
Megatech is giving away a total of  $166,250 worth of MGT tokens to the giveaway winners. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway bot to be eligible. Random winners will be selected every week and will be awarded $80 worth of MGT tokens. The top hundred referrers can get up to $1,500 worth of MGT tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet this tweet with a comment using hashtags #MGT #MGTToken #MegatechToken.
Like their Facebook page and share this post.
Submit your Apollo wallet and other details to the bot. If you don’t have an Apollo wallet, then get one from here.
Lucky winners will be rewarded every week with $80 worth of MGT tokens.
The top hundred referrers will also get up to $1,500 worth of MGT tokens.
Referral rewards will be distributed on February 11, 2021.

Name: Flare Finance
Description:
Flare Finance is the first institutional-grade decentralized finance platform being built on the Flare Network. It will deliver 6 industry-proven products to the Flare Ecosystem consisting of trading, yield farming, stable currency, loans, insurance, and yield mining. All together, Flare Finance will promote a truly decentralized financial ecosystem with a widely diverse and adaptable DAO governance system that allows holders to maintain true control over the ecosystem and its future.
Flare Finance is giving away a total of $6,500 worth of XRP to the giveaway participants. Complete simple social tasks to earn entries. Participants with the most number of entries will get up to $1,000 worth of XRP. Refer your friends to the giveaway to earn more entries.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Flare Finance giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Now complete simple social tasks to earn entries.
The top 10 participants with the most number of entries will get up to $1,000 worth of XRP.
Ten lucky participants will get an additional $100 worth of XRP each.
Earn more entries for referring your friends.

Name: Tornado Cash
Description:
Tornado Cash is a fully decentralized protocol for private transactions on Ethereum. It is controlled and governed by its community. By acquiring TORN tokens, you can participate by voting on governance proposals and weighing in on the protocol's evolution. You also mine TORN by the platform. The more you use it, the more say you have in the evolution of the protocol.
Tornado Cash has airdropped free TORN to early adopters of the protocol. All addresses that have made deposits into Tornado Cash ETH pools before block 11400000 have received a non-transferable TORN voucher (vTORN), which can be redeemed for TORN within one year.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Tornado Cash airdrop page.
All addresses that have made deposits into Tornado Cash ETH pools before block 11400000 have received a non-transferable TORN voucher (vTORN).
The eligible addresses can be found here.
Connect your ETH wallet to the airdrop page.
If you’re eligible then you can redeem your vTORN voucher for TORN token in a 1:1 ratio.
You have until one year to redeem the rewards.
The number of vTORN you received was based on the size and age of your deposit.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.

Name: OnX Finance
Description:
OnX Finance addresses the growing liquidity needs of the Ethereum 2.0 network and the DeFi market by incentivizing collateralized token staking. The ONX token will play an integral part of the OnX finance protocol, with its use cases ranging from paying interest on OnX loans to earning a portion of trading fees on the platform and governance.
OnX Finance and ANKR are jointly airdropping ONX tokens to ANKR holders. A snapshot will be taken on December 24th, 2020, at Ethereum block height of 11,513,500. The minimum number of tokens you need to hold to be eligible for the airdrop will depend on the exchange. All eligible holders will receive free ONX at a ratio of 10000 ANKR: 1 ONX which means the holders will get 1 ONX for every 10,000 ANKR.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold your ANKR in an exchange supporting the airdrop.
Exchanges that have announced support for the airdrop are Binance, Huobi, Gate.io, Bithumb, Wazirx, Upbit, and Coinone.
The snapshot will be taken on December 24th, 2020, at Ethereum block height of 11,513,500.
The number of tokens you need to hold to be eligible for the airdrop will depend on the exchange. Some exchanges require at least 100 ANKR and some exchanges like Upbit doesn’t have a minimum requirement. Check the exchange announcements to see more information.
Eligible holders will receive free ONX at a ratio of 10000 ANKR: 1 ONX, which means the holders will get 1 ONX for every 10,000 ANKR.
The distribution date is not announced yet.
Follow the social media channels of ANKR and OnX Finance to see the updated information and exchanges list.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.

Name: MiL.K
Description:
Mil.k is a blockchain-based platform on which various lifestyle service companies are aligned and users can integrate their spread reward points of those companies as a cryptocurrency, Mil.k Coin. Through the blockchain, they will implement a mileage point integration platform that secures the credibility of data that does not require a direct exchange of personal information between companies and has no need for the post-settlement.
MiL.K is airdropping a total of 3,000,000 MAP tokens to MLK holders. MiL.K will take a snapshot of all MLK holders on Dec 28th, 2020, at 17:00 KST. All MLK listed exchanges and MiL.K App holders are eligible to receive the MAP airdrop. The number of MAP tokens you will receive will be at a ratio of 1 MLK: 0.03 MAP, which means you will get 0.03 MAP for every MLK token.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold your MLK in the MiL.K App or at an exchange where MLK is listed.
All MLK listed exchanges such as KuCoin, Bithumb and Upbit are supported.
The snapshot of all MLK holders will be taken on Dec 28th, 2020, at 17:00 KST.
A total pool of 3,000,000 MAP are allocated for the airdrop in which all eligible holders will receive free MAP at a ratio of 1 MLK: 0.03 MAP, which means you will get 0.03 MAP for every MLK token.
The rewards will be distributed within two weeks after the snapshot.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.

Name: MarcoPolo Protocol
Description:
MarcoPolo Protocol is a new peer-to-peer electronic cash system infrastructure that is strategically invested by Softbank. It aims to achieve public chain TPS sharing and intelligent scheduling through multiple public chains and enable the peer-to-peer cash system to enjoy the unlimited expansion of TPS and optimal GAS fee among the entire blockchain network.
MarcoPolo Protocol is airdropping 50 MAP tokens to the airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bot to receive the tokens. Also get 5 MAP for each referral up to 30 MAP. The top three referrers will also share 2,000 MAP tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join their Telegram group. (+20 MAP)
Follow them on Twitter. (+10 MAP)
Retweet this tweet. (+20 MAP)
Submit your details to the bot.
You will get 50 MAP tokens.
Also earn 5 MAP for each referral up to a maximum of 30 MAP tokens.
The top three referrers will also share 2,000 MAP tokens.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium post.

Name: Stratis
Description:
Stratis is a powerful and flexible blockchain development platform designed for the needs of real-world enterprises and global organizations that want to develop, test and deploy applications on the blockchain. Stratis blockchain apps can be developed in pure C# and can also utilize the Microsoft .NET framework, while also taking advantage of the powerful Stratis APIs and framework. Stratis significantly simplifies the development process for creating blockchain applications and accelerates the development lifecycle for blockchain development projects.
Stratis is airdropping a total of 100,000 STRAX coins to the airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop page to receive free entries. The total pool will be distributed to users depending on the number of entries.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Stratis airdrop page.
Submit your STRAX address and other details.
Get your STRAX wallet from here if you don’t already have one.
Complete simple social tasks to earn entries.
You can earn a maximum of six entries.
A total airdrop pool of 100,000 STRAX will be distributed on a per-entry basis. This means that the number of coins you receive will depend on the number of entries you got.

Name: The Sandbox
Description:
The Sandbox is a virtual world where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences on the Ethereum blockchain using the platform’s utility token SAND.
The Sandbox and CoinMarketCap are jointly airdropping a total of 10,000,000 SAND tokens to the airdrop participants. Create an account at CoinMarketCap and Binance, complete your Binance KYC verification and answer simple questions to get 250 SAND tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Sandbox airdrop page.
Create an account at CoinMarketCap.
Create an account at Binance and complete your KYC verification.
Go to the airdrop page and watch all the videos.
Now in Lesson 4, you will be asked to sign up at The Sandbox.
Submit your details to this quiz form.
Make sure that you’ve already completed your Binance KYC verification before participating in the quiz.
You will get 250 SAND tokens.
Only the first successful 40,000 participants will be awarded.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: FLASH
Description:
FLASH is crypto’s first flashstaking protocol that enables anyone to earn instant upfront yield without the wait. Flashstaking is the concept of locking money today and earning money from the future. All done in a decentralized, instantaneous, and permissionless manner.
XIO Token Studio is airdropping free FLASH tokens to XIO holders. XIO Token Studio started taking daily snapshots from December 11th and will last till December 30th. You can earn 5 FLASH for every 100 XIO tokens. There are no minimum XIO tokens you need to hold to claim your free FLASH. You will be able to claim your rewards starting from January 1st, 2021.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the FLASH airdrop claim page.
XIO Token Studio started taking daily snapshots of all XIO balances from December 11th and will last till December 30th.
Make sure that you’re holding XIO Token Studio (XIO) tokens in a private wallet where you’ve access to the private keys.
You won’t be able to claim your rewards if you’re holding your tokens on an exchange.
There are no minimum XIO tokens you need to hold to claim your free FLASH.
You will get 5 FLASH for every 100 XIO tokens.
You will be able to claim your FLASH from January 1st, 2021.
For more information regarding the airdrop, visit their Telegram group.

Name: Cryptonits
Description:
Cryptonits provides safe and fast transactions without revealing the user's identities. It is owned and operated by CRYPTONITS LTD. They have their own exchange called Dualex.io and they provide the best possible rates by comparing a wide range of reliable trading platforms and work with many cryptocurrencies that are constantly increasing.
Cryptonits and WhiteBIT are jointly giving away a total of 20,000 CRT to 2,000 lucky participants. Create an account at WhiteBIT from the below link, complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form for a chance to win 20 CRT.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at WhiteBIT.
Join their Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter, post a tweet about Cryptonits and tag Cryptonits and 3 friends.
Follow them on Facebook.
Submit your details to this giveaway form.
Two thousand lucky participants will be randomly selected after the campaign and will be rewarded with 20 CRT each.

Name: Phala Network
Description:
Phala Network is the first confidential smart contract network built on Substrate, aiming to provide confidential computation and data protection services for enterprises and users. Phala Network would serve the whole Polkadot ecosystem as one of the Polkadot parachains.
Phala Network is airdropping 30 PHA to users running the Phala miner node. Download the mentioned file, run the specified commands and submit a screenshot and other details to the airdrop form to receive the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Phala Network airdrop form.
Setup a Phala miner node as mentioned in this post.
Download this file and run two lines of commands mentioned in this post.
Submit a screenshot with {"ok":true,"path":"/files/systemlogxxxxxxxxxx.tar"}  and other details to the airdrop form.
You will get 30 PHA tokens.
The rewards will be distributed after Phala pre-mainnet Darth Vader is live.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.
You can also earn more PHA by joining the Phala Firedrop.

Name: Mirror Protocol
Description:
Mirror Protocol is a DeFi protocol powered by smart contracts on the Terra network that enables the creation of synthetic assets called Mirrored Assets (mAssets). mAssets mimic the price behavior of real-world assets and give traders anywhere in the world open access to price exposure without the burdens of owning or transacting real assets.
Mirror Protocol is airdropping a total of 18,300,000 MIR tokens to UNI holders and LUNA stakers. Mirror Protocol took a snapshot of all UNI holders who had at least 100 UNI on 11/23/2020 at 00:00 UTC+0 and another snapshot of LUNA stakers on 11/23/2020 at 03:36 UTC+0. All eligible UNI holders will be able to claim 220 MIR tokens and eligible LUNA stakers can claim their rewards on a pro-rata basis.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Mirror Protocol airdrop claim page for UNI holders.
Connect your Metamask wallet.
If you’re eligible, then you will see a “Claim” button.
Now confirm the transaction using Metamask.
The snapshot was taken on 11/23/2020 at 00:00 UTC+0 and if you had at least 100 UNI during the snapshot, then you will receive 220 MIR tokens.
Support for WalletConnect and Coinbase will be available soon.

Name: Yield Bank
Description:
Yield Bank platform aims to improve and unify many of the popular services DeFi has to offer under one platform alongside their own yield farming ecosystem. Additionally, inside their platform, they are creating the first-ever DeFi Futures Perpetual Contracts trading market where users can place long and short position trades with leverage all completely decentralized and by the people.
Yield Bank is giving away $40 worth of yCASH to 2,000 lucky giveaway participants. Chat with the Telegram bot, complete simple social tasks and submit your details for a chance to win the rewards, Top referrers can also win up to $1,500 in yCASH.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Follow them on Twitter and like, comment and retweet this tweet using hashtags #yCASH #Defi #YieldBank #yB.
Join their Discord channel, say “Hi” and have a conversation.
Follow them on Medium and clap, comment on this post using hashtags #yCASH #Defi #YieldBank #yB.
Submit your details to the bot.
Two thousand lucky participants who’ve completed all the tasks will be randomly selected after the end of the giveaway and will be rewarded with $40 worth of yCASH each.
Also refer your friends to the giveaway and the top referrers can get up to $1,500 in yCASH.
The rewards will be distributed on February 14, 2021.

Name: CUDOS
Description:
CUDOS is a Next-Generation Cloud platform. They have created the technology that connects consumers of cloud computing, to providers looking to monetize their underutilized hardware. The CUDOS network links the blockchain world to the extensive Cudo platform through a smart contract governed layer 2 oracle, reducing the cost and increasing the performance for DeFi and other popular blockchain use cases.
CUDOS is giving away a total of $5,000 worth of CUDOS to top giveaway winners. Visit the giveaway page, sign up and complete simple social tasks to earn entries. Also earn more entries for each referral. The top five winners will get up to $1,000 worth of CUDOS tokens. The top 50 winners will get $60 worth of CUDOS each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the CUDOS giveaway page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Complete simple tasks to earn entries.
The more the tasks you complete, the higher the entries you will earn.
Also earn more entries for each referral.
The top 5 winners will get up to $1,000 worth of CUDOS tokens.
The top 50 winners will get $60 worth of CUDOS each.
The winners will be announced a week after the end of the competition.
The rewards will be distributed after the token generation event. Follow their social channels to see announcements regarding distribution.

Name: Numio
Description:
Numio makes crypto easy by building payment and storage applications that anyone can use. Numio Pay is a cryptocurrency payments app that lets you easily and quickly send money to friends and family or make in-store purchases. Numio Vault is an easy-to-use cryptocurrency wallet which is jam-packed with features, such as allowing for a trusted person to recover your money if something goes wrong and joint accounts where responsibilities are shared.
Numio and PhoenixDAO are jointly airdropping a total of 500,000 PHNX to the airdrop participants. Sign up for the airdrop and refer your friends to get 100 PHNX for each referral up to a maximum of 100,000 PHNX per user. You will be able to claim the rewards by completing the KYC on the Numio App when it launches on December 14th. Your referrals also need to complete their KYC verification for you to claim the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Numio airdrop page.
Enter your email and click on “Submit”.
Now you will get your referral link.
Start referring your friends to earn 100 PHNX for each referral up to a maximum of 100,000 PHNX per user.
The referral program will end when the total pool of 500,000 PHNX is reached.
You and your referrals must complete KYC verification on the Numio APP when it launches.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: Solana
Description:
Solana is a high-throughput blockchain that is currently supporting 50–65k transactions per second and 400ms block times, without complex solutions like sharding or layer-two. As the world's first web-scale blockchain, Solana will unlock a whole new class of performant applications and facilitate larger scale blockchain adoption.
Solana is giving away a total of 35,000 SOL tokens in multiple giveaways. Participate in both the drops mentioned below to get a chance to win from the total pool. Top referrers can also win up to 250 SOL from each of the giveaways.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Solana Huobi giveaway page.
Create an account at Huobi and complete your KYC verification.
Sign up for the newsletter.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter.
Read this primer and complete the quiz on this form.
Invite one friend to the giveaway.
Submit your details to the giveaway page.
A pool of 22,750 SOL will be shared randomly with the lucky participants.
Top referrers on the leaderboard can win up to 250 SOL tokens.

Name: Flare
Description:
Flare is a new blockchain network based on the Flare Consensus Protocol - the first Turing Complete Federated Byzantine Agreement protocol. Flare’s native token will be an algorithmically managed, pegged stablecoin, aiming to keep network usage costs predictable and providing a primary input for DeFi use cases.
Flare is airdropping a total pool of 45 Billion SPARK tokens to eligible XRP holders. All holders except Ripple Labs, certain previous employees of Ripple Labs and others mentioned in the announcement page will be eligible to receive the SPARK tokens. The snapshot will be taken at the first validated XRP ledger index number with a timestamp greater than or equal to 00:00 GMT on 12th December 2020. If you’re holding your XRP in a private wallet then you will have to set the Message Key field on your XRP Ledger address to your Flare address and if you’re holding XRP on a supporting exchange, then you’re already set to receive the tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold your XRP in a private wallet where you have access to your private key or in an exchange that has announced support for the airdrop.
The snapshot will be taken at the first validated XRP ledger index number with a timestamp greater than or equal to 00:00 GMT on 12th December 2020.
Exchanges that have currently announced support for the airdrop are Binance, KuCoin, OKEx, Huobi, Bittrex, FTX,  Bithumb, Gate.io, Wazirx, Bitfinex, Kraken, etc. Check the supported exchanges page to see the complete list. Atomic Wallet has also announced support for the airdrop.
Binance will only count the XRP positions in spot wallets, savings accounts, and coin-margined futures wallets and not the ones in margin accounts and crypto loans.
FTX exchange holders will either receive the airdrop tokens directly or the USD equivalent of the airdrop tokens.
If you have XRP in self custody (private wallet), then you will have to set the Message Key field on your XRP Ledger address to your Flare address to be eligible to receive the rewards. Learn the complete process from this FAQ page.
Users having XRP in self custody will have six months from the snapshot date to claim their tokens, that is until 11th June 2021.
Ledger Nano and XUMM wallet holders can set their wallet to receive SPARK tokens seamlessly by using this tool.
Trezor has not yet announced support for the airdrop, so make sure to follow their official channels for updates regarding the airdrop.
Ripple Labs, certain previous employees of Ripple Labs, non-participating exchanges, and accounts known to have received XRP as a result of fraud, theft and scams are excluding from the airdrop. There’s also a “Whale cap” in which an individual can claim only up to 1 Billion XRP worth of SPARK tokens.
All eligible claimers will receive 15% of their total SPARK at network launch and the remaining tokens will be distributed over a minimum of 25 months and a maximum of 34 months.
The number of SPARK tokens a user receives will be based on the following formula:    SPARK claimable = total number of eligible XRP / total XRP in existence – excluded XRP * 45 Billion.
All unclaimed SPARK tokens will be burned after 11th June 2021.
Check this FAQ page to learn more about the airdrop and claiming. For further information regarding token distribution, see this post.

Name: YottaChainMENA
Description:
YottaChainMENA is at the forefront of blockchain data storage development. With the support of its global team of designers, developers and system architects, YottaChainMENA is redefining blockchain data storage throughout the Middle East and North Africa. YottaChainMENA offers a massive decentralized global storage pool, connecting distributed resources all around the world. Boasting multiple technology awards, and with over 200 patents at home and abroad, YottaChainMENA is the future of secure, reliable and affordable data storage.
YottaChainMENA is giving away a total of 169,500 MTA to 1,000 lucky participants. Create an account at WhiteBIT from the below link, complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form for a chance to win 169.5 MTA coins.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at WhiteBIT.
Follow YottaChainMENA and Yottafile on Facebook.
Follow them on Instagram.
Follow them on Twitter, post a tweet about YottaChainMENA and also tag YottaChainMENA and 3 friends.
Submit your details to this giveaway form.
Thousand lucky participants will be randomly selected after the campaign and will be awarded 169.5 MTA each.

Name: SocialGood
Description:
The SocialGood Team aims to reduce global economic disparities and improve society for everyone with an app that allows users to accumulate assets by simply shopping daily. Get the cryptocurrency SocialGood (known as SG) for free! Shop at Amazon, Nike, AliExpress, and over 1,800 large retailers and get the industry-highest crypto back via the SocialGood App.
SocialGood is airdropping $1 worth of SG to all airdrop participants. Download and install the app to receive the signup bonus. Also get $1 SG for each referral (unlimited ref system). One participant with the most number of referrals will also get $10,000 worth of SG tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Download the SocialGood App for Android/IOS.
Install and sign up.
You will get $1 worth of SG tokens.
Also get $1 worth of SG for each referral. (unlimited referrals)
The participant with the most number of referrals will also get $10,000 worth of SG tokens.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: BitWin24
Description:
BitWin24 is the first global blockchain-based lottery with a referral system. The lottery is forgery-proof and the winning combination is generated on the Bitcoin blockchain. The jackpot is paid out automatically through a smart contract to all participating winners. The innovation lies within the so-called “WinChain”, which allows multiple people to win from one single jackpot.
BitWin24 is airdropping 3 BWI coins to each airdrop participant. Sign up here and also invite two friends or share this Facebook post to receive 2 BWI coins.
Additonal tasks for an extra reward of 1 BWI: Join their Telegram group, follow them on Instagram (optional) and like their Facebook page (optional). Submit your social media usernames to this airdrop form.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the BitWin24 airdrop page.
Submit your details and click on “go to step 2”. (Don’t forget to submit your Telegram username)
Now invite at two friends to the airdrop by submitting their details to the airdrop page or share this Facebook post and tag two friends.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Instagram (optional).
Like their Facebook page (optional).
Submit your social media usernames to this airdrop form (Submit the same Telegram username like in step 2)
You will get 3 BWI coins deposited to your Bitwin24 account once the campaign is over.
You will also be automatically enrolled in a raffle worth 1,000 €.

Name: Crust
Description:
Crust implements the incentive layer protocol for decentralized storage with adapting to multiple storage layer protocols including IPFS, and provides support for the application layer. At the same time, Crust's architecture also can provide support for a decentralized computing layer to build a distributed cloud ecosystem.
Crust is airdropping a total of 100,000 CRU tokens to all airdrop participants. Complete the simple social task, create your CRU wallet address and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive an equal share of the total airdrop pool.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Crust airdrop form.
Share this Medium article on Twitter, Reddit, Telegram or any social media of your choice.
Create your CRU Stash address from here. Make sure to backup up your Mnemonic Seed.
Submit your details to the airdrop form.
You will get an equal share of the total airdrop pool.
The rewards will be distributed before December 1st.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.

Name: Serum
Description:
Serum is the world's first completely decentralized derivatives exchange with trustless cross-chain trading in collaboration with a consortium of crypto trading and DeFi experts. It is natively based on the Solana blockchain and also has an Ethereum (ERC20) version.
Serum and FTX Exchange are jointly airdropping a total of 500,000,000 SRM tokens to FTT token holders. Create an account at FTX exchange and hold a minimum of 500 FTT tokens to be eligible to receive free SRM tokens. All eligible users will receive 3 SRM for every 500 FTT held per week.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at FTX exchange.
Now hold at least 500 FTT tokens.
Snapshots of the FTT holdings will be taken randomly.
All eligible users will receive 3 SRM for every 500 FTT held per week.
The rewards will be distributed every Tuesday to the user’s FTX exchange wallet.
The airdropped SRM tokens will be in a locked state and will only be unlocked over the next seven years.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this post.

Name: TomoChain
Description:
TomoChain blockchain and product ecosystem enable the development of high-performance blockchain projects. Their mission is to accelerate the onboarding of millions of users by empowering today’s applications with technology that masks the friction of Blockchain, all while retaining its underlying benefits. TomoChain is tradable on multiple exchanges including Binance and KuCoin. You can also track it on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko.
To celebrate TomoChain’s acquisition of Lition, they’re both airdropping a total of 18,000 TOMO & 300,000 LIT to TOMO and LTT holders. The airdrop is worth $60,000 and TOMO (native) holders or LIT (TRC21) holders or both are eligible to participate in the airdrop.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold your TOMO coins in your personal wallet or stake TOMO on the TomoChain network or both.
Centralized exchange holders and TOMOE or TOMOB holders are not eligible.
The snapshot will happen at 9 am UTC on Nov 3rd, 2020.
You will get 80 LIT if you’re holding between 1,000 and 5,000 TOMO coins or you will get 120 LIT if you’re holding more than 5,000 TOMO coins.
A maximum of 3,000 addresses will receive the LIT airdrop rewards.
TOMO holders will be able to claim their rewards on the TomoWallet web version for 30 days from Nov 5th, 2020.

Name: Audius
Description:
Audius is trying to give everyone the freedom to distribute, monetize, and stream any audio content. The Audius protocol brings artists, node operators, and fans together in an incentive aligned way, allowing these actors to collectively provide a high-quality audio streaming experience. Audius is currently tradable on Binance and Uniswap. It can also be tracked on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko.
Audius airdropped a total pool of 50 million AUDIO tokens to their 10,000 most active users. If you were an active user you may be eligible to receive free AUDIO tokens. Simply claim your free tokens from your Audius dashboard. Based on the total pool and the number of accounts eligible to receive the airdrop, the average distribution per account was 5,000 AUDIO tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit your Audius dashboard.
If you’re eligible for the reward you will see a “Claim AUDIO” button.
Now click on the “Claim AUDIO” button to claim your tokens.
You don’t need any ETH to claim your tokens.
The claimed tokens will immediately be available in your dashboard.
The number of tokens a user receives will depend on his platform activity. Based on the total pool and the number of accounts eligible to receive the airdrop, the average distribution per account was 5,000 AUDIO tokens.
If you want to see a breakdown of the airdrop distribution, see this GitHub page.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this announcement post.

Name: Avalanche
Description:
Avalanche is an open-source platform for launching highly decentralized applications, new financial primitives, and new interoperable blockchains. Avalanche democratizes financial markets and bridges all blockchain platforms together into one interoperable ecosystem. Avalanche can be traded on popular exchanges like Binance, OKEX, Huobi and can also be tracked on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko.
Avalanche and Binance are jointly airdropping a total of $20,000 worth of AVAX coins to the airdrop participants. Create an account at Binance, complete your KYC verification, learn about Avalanche from the Binance social channels and pass the quiz which will be posted daily on Binance social channels to receive $10 worth of AVAX coins. Also get up to $50 worth of AVAX for referring your friends.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at Binance.
Complete your KYC verification.
Follow Binance social media pages in your region and watch out for the #BinanceLearnAndEarn hashtag and retweet it.
Learn about Avalanche daily from the #BinanceLearnAndEarn videos and articles posted on Binance social channels.
Pass the quiz, which will be posted on their social channels.
You will get up to $10 worth of AVAX coins.
Also refer your friends to the Learn & Earn campaign to receive up to $50 worth of AVAX coins.
The rewards will be distributed to your Binance wallet within seven days after the end of the campaign.
For more information, see this announcement post.

Name: Sapphire Studios
Description:
Sapphire Studios is trying to build games with an economic impact. GoldBar created by Sapphire Studios was built on the Apollo Blockchain as a Gold-backed cryptocurrency that allows players to build a real-world net worth within a game. GoldBar is not distributed like traditional Cryptocurrencies. It is mined through a real-time strategy multiplayer game called, Gold Inc.
Sapphire Studios is airdropping 500 GXB to the airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive the tokens. Also, get 25 GXB for each referral up to a maximum of  12 referrals.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Sapphire Studios airdrop form.
Follow them on Twitter.
Like their Facebook page.
Follow them on Instagram.
Submit your Apollo wallet address and the remaining details to the airdrop form. If you don’t have an Apollo wallet, then get one from here.
You will get 500 GXB tokens.
Also, get 12 GXB for each referral up to a maximum of  12 referrals.

Name: SwanFinance
Description:
SwanFinance is a decentralized platform for earning interest. Users can take SWAN tokens to earn higher interest, up to 20% APY on SWAN tokens and up to 12% APY for other cryptocurrencies. They safeguard your wallets and your cryptocurrencies with multiple ways to verify your identity from your login to your withdrawals.
SwanFinance is airdropping 10,000 SWAN each to the first 10,000 airdrop participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive the tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the SwanFinance airdrop form.
Join their Telegram channel. (+4,000 SWAN)
Follow them on Twitter and retweet one tweet. (+3,000 SWAN)
Like their Facebook page. (+3,000 SWAN)
Follow them on LinkedIn. (+3,000 SWAN)
Submit your details to the airdrop form.
The first 10,000 participants will receive a maximum of 10,000 SWAN each.
The tokens will be distributed after the token sale.

Name: Cryptoenter
Description:
Cryptoenter is a decentralized financial marketplace that brings together various regulators, financial institutions and consumers of financial services within one digital infrastructure, both locally and globally, using distributed ledger technology and data validation. Cryptoenter is also the winner of the IBM special award.
Crryptoenter is airdropping a minimum of $33 worth of LION tokens to the airdrop participants. Create an account at Cryptoenter, complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive the rewards. Early participants can also get up to $50 worth of LION tokens each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at Cryptoenter.
Follow them on Twitter, like and retweet the pinned tweet and also tag 3 friends.
Join their Telegram group and Telegram channel.
Like their Facebook page and share the pinned post.
Join the referral program and invite three friends. For more information, see this thread.
You will get $15 worth of LION tokens.
Follow them on Instagram and like, repost their stories. (+$3 LION, Optional)
Subscribe to their Youtube channel and click on the bell to enable notifications. (+$3 LION, Optional)
Follow them on Reddit. (+$2 LION, Optional)
Invite at least ten friends to Cryptoenter. (+$10 LION, Optional)
Submit your details to this airdrop form.
Complete all the above tasks to get a total of $33 worth of LION tokens.
The First 1,000 participants will get an additional $50 worth of LION, the first 5,000 participants will share $200 worth of LION, the first 10,000 participants will share $100 worth of LION and the first 30,000 participants will share $50 worth of LION tokens.
For more information, see this airdrop announcement post.

Name: CHADS
Total Value: 166 Sam The Slick’s, 166 Blood Lau’s and 167 Common Virgin’s
Description:
CHADS is a social experiment designed to teach virgins how to trade like a chad. It is a deflationary coin utilizing a novel burn curve mechanism. The lower the price you sell or transfer CHADS, the more of your tokens are burnt. Only buying CHADS or supplying liquidity to the Uniswap pool is exempt from this burn. CHADS is tradable at Uniswap and can also be tracked on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko.
CHADS is giving away a total of 500 NFT’s which includes 166 Sam The Slick’s, 166 Blood Lau’s and 167 Common Virgin’s worth between 0.15 to 1.5 ETH each to the lucky giveaway participants. Complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form to win the NFT’s. These NFT’s are already being traded at OpenSea.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the CHADS giveaway form.
Join their Telegram group. (+1 Ticket)
Join their Telegram channel. (+1 Ticket, Optional)
Follow them on Twitter. (+1 Ticket, Optional)
Retweet the pinned tweet. (+1 Ticket, Optional)
Join their Discord channel. (+1 Ticket, Optional)
Submit your details to the giveaway form.
The more tickets you have, the higher the chance of winning the prize.
A total pool of 166 Sam The Slick’s, 166 Blood Lau’s and 167 Common Virgin’s NFT’s will be given away to the lucky participants.
For more information regarding the giveaway, see this Medium post.

Name: DeFi Yield Protocol
Description:
DeFi Yield Protocol (DYP) is developing a platform that allows anyone to provide liquidity and to be rewarded with DYP tokens, at the same time maintaining both token price stability and secure and simplified DeFi for end-users.
DeFi Yield Protocol is hosting a bounty campaign with a total reward of 200 ETH. Complete simple bounty tasks mentioned on the bounty page and submit your details to the bounty Telegram group to get your share from the total pool. Whitelist participants who hold at least 100 DYP after the crowdsale will also get to share a prize pool worth $50,000 ETH after their token sale ended.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the DeFi Yield Protocol bounty page and read the rules carefully.
Join their Telegram group and leave at least one constructive comment and also join the Telegram bounty group.
Now start participating in different bounty campaigns. It’s not required to participate in all the campaigns.
The bounty campaigns are divided as shown below:
Campaign Stakes per week Allocation per campaign
Twitter 1250 stakes 25%
Telegram 1250 stakes 25%
Discord 1250 stakes 25%
Youtube 1250 stakes 25%
Bounty participants need to submit weekly reports to the Telegram bounty group in Docx format every Friday before 23:59 UTC.
All the participants need to fill out the bounty authentication form to join the bounty campaign.
The bounty rewards will be distributed within 72 hours after the end of the bounty campaign.
The amount of reward a user gets will depend on the number of stakes he/she owns. Each stake is worth 0.01 ETH.
You will be banned from receiving the rewards if you talk about the bounty campaign in their main group instead of the bounty group.
There will also be a giveaway for whitelist participants who’ve participated in the crowdsale and hold at least 100 DYP tokens. A total pool of $50,000 ETH will be shared to all eligible participants. Sign up for the whitelist only if you have an intention to participate in the crowdsale.

Name: Rarible
Description:
Rarible is an NFT marketplace where you can mint, buy and sell digital collectibles without any coding skills. RARI is the native governance token of Rarible, designed to reward active platform users with a voice on the platform's future.

The ultimate goal of Rarible is to evolve into a fully Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO), where all governance and decision rights belong to the platform users. Rarible is already tradable on Uniswap, and is also listed on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko.
To celebrate the launch of Rarible on Decentraland, they will be sharing free RARI tokens to LAND holders. Sign up for the event using Metamask and you will be able to claim your RARI from Oct 14th. The snapshot was taken in July and eligible holders will receive free RARI if you sign up for the event. All unclaimed tokens will be shared with all non-LAND holders who’ve signed up for the event.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Rarible airdrop event page on Decentraland.
Click on “Want to go” and sign up for the event using Metamask.
A snapshot of all LAND holder’s wallets was taken in July and you will receive a percentage of the airdrop equivalent to the LAND you held during the snapshot.
You will be able to claim your RARI tokens from Oct 14th.
The claim for LAND holders will only be open for one week, so make sure to visit the event within one week.
Unclaimed RARI will be equally distributed after the first week to all the non-LAND holders who’ve signed up for the event.

Name: BonFi
Description:
BonFi is a multilayered open finance management protocol complemented by the AI-powered BonVest. BonFi’s mission is to transition to a universally more beneficial liquidity pool operating model. They aim to achieve this through technological innovation and user empowerment. Users can join their professionally managed liquidity pool that leverages their advanced AI technology.
BonFi is giving away $20 worth of BNF tokens to two hundred lucky participants. Complete the social tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bot to get a chance to win the rewards. The top three referrers will also get up to $1,000 worth of BNF tokens,
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join their Telegram group.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet this tweet using hashtags #BNF #ICO #cryptocurrencies #BTC #ETH and tag your friends.
Follow them on Reddit, upvote and comment on this post using hashtags #BNF #ICO #cryptocurrencies #BTC #ETH and tag your friends.
Follow them on Medium, clap and comment on this post using hashtags #BNF #ICO #cryptocurrencies #BTC #ETH and tag your friends.
Submit your details to the bot.
Two hundred lucky participants who’ve completed all the tasks will get $20 worth of BNF tokens.
Refer your friends to the giveaway and the top 3 referrers with the most number of referrals will get up to $1,000 worth of BNF tokens. You can track your referral ranking from here.
The rewards will be distributed on November 1, 2020.
For more information, see this post.

Name: Plutus
Description:
UPDATE 2020-10-12: AIRDROP FINISHED

UPDATE 2020-10-09: AIRDROP EXTENDED: PLU team decided to extend the airdrop for additional 4,000 new participants who will receive 0.5 PLU ($3.6) each. The first 1,000 valid participants who already claimed the airdrop on 6th of October will still receive 1.5 PLU tokens each.

Plutus combines the ease of modern banking with access to cryptocurrencies. The finance app consists of a UK account or a European IBAN to manage fiat, and a non-custodial wallet to manage crypto. The app also includes a decentralized exchange that allows you to swap between both asset forms and a rewarding Visa Debit Card. Every time a user spends with their VISA bank card, which works at over 60 million merchants, they earn 3% back in crypto (PLU). Plutus also offers additional rewards (over 15%) at selected online retail affiliates such as Amazon, Sky, Nike, and many more.

They recently announced some major plans including the pursuit of a banking license, launching Latin American & Asia, five exchange partnerships and several PLU sales with a 40% bonus applied. Find out more details here. Plutus native token is already tradable on Uniswap and is listed on Coinmarketcap & Coingecko.
Plutus is airdropping a total of 3,500 PLU tokens to 5,000 exclusive airdrop participants. The first 1,000 valid participants who already claimed the airdrop on 6th of October will still receive 1.5 PLU tokens each. Additional 4,000 new participants will receive 0.5 PLU each. Complete simple social tasks, pass the human verification, and submit your details to the below airdrop form to receive 0.5 PLU tokens each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Join the Plutus Telegram group and Airdrops.io Telegram channel.
Follow Plutus and Airdrops.io on Twitter.
Retweet the Plutus token sale announcement tweet. (Please do not comment on the post, only retweet it)
Your Twitter account must have a minimum of 30 followers.
Follow Plutus on Facebook and like this token sale announcement post. (Optional)
Like the following Youtube video. (Optional)
Pass the human verification quiz and fill out the exclusive airdrop form with your details.
4,000 new participants will receive 0.5 PLU (~$3.6) tokens. First 1,000 participants who already claimed on 6th of October will still receive 1.5 PLU (~$11) tokens.

Name: DIA
Description:
DIA (Decentralised Information Asset) is an open-source, data, and oracle platform for the DeFi ecosystem. DIA leverages crypto-economic incentives to drive supply, share and use transparent, crowd-verified price data and oracles on financial and digital assets. DIA’s mission is to democratize financial data, similar to what Wikipedia has done in the broader information space with regard to central encyclopedias.

DIA data sources and methodologies are transparent and publicly accessible to everyone. DIA uses crypto-economic incentives for its stakeholders to validate data sources when be added and throughout their usage. DIA is already tradable on Binance, OKEx, Uniswap, etc and is also listed on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko.
To mitigate the KuCoin hack’s effects, DIA will be airdropping a total of 3,031,866 DIA tokens to all eligible DIA holders. Hold at least 1 DIA token on an exchange where DIA is listed or in a private wallet to be eligible for the airdrop. DIA will take daily snapshots between September 25, 2020, 12 pm CEST – December 10, 2020, 12 pm CEST. The number of tokens a user gets will be based on their average daily balance.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold at least 1 DIA token in your private wallet or at an exchange where DIA is currently trading.
DIA will take daily snapshots between September 25, 2020, 12 pm CEST – December 10, 2020, 12 pm CEST.
All wallets (excluding the DIA Association, DIA team and the KuCoin hackers’ wallets), including DIA staking participants, CEX holders, DEX holders and LPs (liquidity providers), are eligible to receive the airdrop.
A total pool of 3,031,866 DIA tokens from the ecosystem fund has been allocated to the airdrop.
Holding the tokens even for one day will make you eligible to receive the airdrop. So the more number of days you hold, the more tokens you get.
The number of tokens a user receives will be based on their average daily balance during the snapshot period. To see the formula that will be used to calculate your rewards, see the below announcement post.
The rewards will be distributed on January 11, 2021, to their respective wallets.
For more details regarding the airdrop, see this announcement post.

Name: Permission
Description:
Permission has created a global cryptocurrency (ASK) that drives a transparent, trustworthy economy, one in which consumer engagement is achieved by asking Permission® rather than by the current interruptive and exploitative commercial norms. Their mission is to lead the globe toward a Permission-based economy that recognizes the value of an individual’s time and data. Their native coin ASK is already tradable on Bithumb and can also be tracked on CoinMarketCap & CoinGecko.
Permission is airdropping 100 ASK to all airdrop participants. Create an account at Permission and verify your mail to receive the coins. Also get up to 100 ASK for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Permission registration page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Verify your mail.
You will get 100 ASK.
Also get up to 100 ASK for each referral.
The rewards will be in “Pending balance” for now and will be moved to your wallet after you complete your KYC verification. The KYC verification feature will be available soon.

Name: HEX
Description:
HEX is the first high-interest savings account on the blockchain, founded by Richard Heart. HEX includes all of the features of Bitcoin (send, receive, earn) and adds Trustless Interest through staking, where longer stakes pay better than shorter. HEX adds staking function which pays stakers instead of miners. This replaces third parties with a trustless peer-to-peer to the system. Instead of sending HEX to exchange so they can lend it out on your behalf to earn interest for you, you just send it to the same smart contract that minted all the HEX in the first place, and it credits you interest. Find more about the highly optimized HEX token economics by visiting checking out their tech specs.
HEX is airdropping free HEX tokens to BTC holders that held BTC in their private wallets during the snapshot on December 2 at 00:00:00 UTC. You will be able to claim 10,000 HEX for each 1 BTC. Important: You will get an extra 10% bonus if you will use our referral link for claiming. You can also earn 20% of anyone’s claim by inviting your friends using your own referral link. Your invited friends will also receive an extra 10% of their claim if they use your referral link.
Step-by-Step Guide:
You can claim your free HEX tokens if you held BTC in your private wallet on the time of the snapshot on December 2 at the first Bitcoin block mined after 00:00:00 UTC.
Install Metamask in your browser and connect your wallet.
Visit the claiming page using this link to activate your 10% claiming bonus.
Make sure you have enough ETH in your wallet to cover the small gas fee.
Enter your BTC address into the “Bitcoin address” field and click on “Claim this address”.
Go to your private BTC wallet and signthe message given by the claim tool using the “Sign Message” feature within your wallet (instructions for Trezor users / instructions for Electrum users).
Now submit the signature to the claiming tool.
Choose your Auto-Stake length and press “Submit Claim” button. Your claim starts with 90% as an Auto-Stake for a minimum length of 350 days. You can choose a longer period for even more gains. Auto-Staking can be canceled at any time.
Confirm the claiming transaction in the MetaMask prompt to finalize your claim. Note: Make sure you have funds in your ETH wallet to cover the small gas fee for claiming your airdrop.
Your HEX will immediately appear in your ETH wallet.
The claiming window will be open for 50 weeks.

Name: BeatzCoin
Description:
BeatzCoin and VibraVid together contribute an ecosystem that allows creators and users a means of barter, peer-to-peer, for goods, services, through bounties, and as prizes. BeatzCoin is a cryptocurrency which is the trade of value on the VibraVid platform.
To celebrate the partnership between VibraVid and Syscoin, VibraVid will be airdropping a total of 125,000,000 BTZCspt tokens to all SYS Mastnode holders and to anyone who holds more than 20,000 SYS coins.
Step-by-Step Guide:
BeatzCoin will be airdropping a total of 125,000,000 BTZCspt tokens to all the qualified SYS Masternode and SYS coin holders.
A total of 105,000,000 BTZCspt tokens will be equally shared among all SYS Masternode holders. For more information regarding owning an SYS Masternode, see this page.
A total of 20,000,000 BTZCspt tokens will also be equally shared among SYS holders who hold more than 20,000 SYS coins in an SYS supported wallet.
The airdrop will run from November 1st, 2020 till January 31st, 2021 and a snapshot will be taken on the 15th of every month.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this announcement post.

Name: Morpher
Description:
Morpher is a zero fee trading platform where you can trade stocks, crypto, commodities and forex 24/7. The project is backed by Tim Draper's venture capital fund. Their native token MPH is already tradable on Uniswap and listed on Coinmarketcap & Coingecko. Find out more about MPH tokenomics from here.
Simply sign up to their platform, connect a wallet and complete your KYC to fund your trading account with 100 MPH for free. You can also earn an additional 50 MPH for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Morpher airdrop page.
Click on “Claim your free crypto”.
Create a Fortmatic wallet or connect a wallet using Metamask.
Submit your email addresse and confirm it.
Complete KYC using your computer or mobile phone.
Claim your 100 MPH by clicking on “Redeem Tokens” from within the Morpher dashboard.
For Metamask users: Don’t be confused when Metamask asks you for contract interaction. You can set 1 GWEI as gas price, because it’s a contract interaction on the Morpher sidechain which is covered by the virtual ETH balance.
You can use your free 100 MPH to invest in your favourite asset like Amazon, Bitcoin, or Gold.
You can also invite your friends and earn an additional 50 MPH for each referral.
Make a deposit using PayPal until March 31st to get an extra 20% MPH bonus.
For more information about the airdrop, visit this official airdrop guide.
Find out how to sell or withdraw your MPH from here.

Name: Massnet
Description:
Massnet is a blockchain consensus engine that aims to become the basic infrastructure to all blockchain consensus layers. They are based on a proof-of-capacity consensus protocol which creates a consensus layer that is permissionless, fair, energy efficiency, secure, and universal, ensuring the fundamental security of the public chain.
Massnet is airdropping 6 MASS coins to all airdrop participants. Create an account at Masscafe, complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the Telegram bot to receive the coins. Also earn 0.5 MASS for each referral.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Chat with this Telegram bot.
Join Massnet and Masscafe on Telegram and stay active.
Follow Massnet and Masscafe on Twitter and retweet this tweet using hashtags #MASS and #CryptoMining.
Create an account at Masscafe.
Follow Massnet and Masscafe on Medium. (+1 MASS, Optional)
Submit your details to the bot.
You will get 6 MASS coins.
Also get 0.5 MASS for each referral.

Name: WhiteBIT
Description:
WhiteBIT is a European crypto exchange aimed at driving the mass adoption of blockchain technologies by providing our users with a secure and easy-to-use trading platform. It's a centralized crypto-to-fiat exchange with a team of 80+ members. Having the European Exchange and Custody licenses, they meet all KYC and AML requirements.
To celebrate the launch of limitless deposits and withdrawal of up to 2 BTC a day without KYC, WhiteBIT is giving away a total of 1,000 USDT to new users. Create an account at WhiteBIT, complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the giveaway form to receive up to 5 USDT each.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at WhiteBIT.
Follow them on Twitter and retweet this tweet.
Join their Telegram group.
Submit your details to this giveaway form.
Three hundred lucky participants will get 3 USDT each and twenty lucky participants will get 5 USDT each.

Name: Symbol
Description:
Symbol is a next-generation, open source decentralized blockchain platform from NEM that connects businesses to the blockchain, helping them to reduce cost, complexity, and find new ways to create value. It has increased speed, usability, security and flexibility - making Symbol the smart, effective choice for both enterprise users and developers.
NEM will be launching the Symbol blockchain in March and is conducting an airdrop in which all eligible holders who hold at least 100 XEM during the snapshot will receive free XYM in a 1:1 ratio. The snapshot was taken on March 12, 2021, at 04:26 UTC at a block height of 3,105,500. NEM wallet holders need to download the NEM wallet, import their NEM account and opt-in for the airdrop to receive free XYM after the mainnet launch on March 15, 2021. Mobile users can opt-in by following this instruction. You can also hold it in a supporting exchange to receive the airdrop.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold at least 100 NEM (XEM) coins in your private wallet or in an exchange that has announced support for the airdrop.
The snapshot was taken on March 12, 2021, at 04:26 UTC at a block height of 3,105,500.
NEM wallet holders need to download the latest NEM Desktop wallet, import their NEM account and then need to go to the Symbol opt-in section and confirm the opt-in for the airdrop. Android and IOS users can opt-in by following this instruction.
Exchanges that have announced support for the airdrop are Binance, Bithumb, Wazirx, OKEx, Huobi, Upbit, Gate.io, Poloniex, ProBit, etc. Visit this NEM announcement page to see the complete list.
Trezor, Ledger and Multisig account holders can also opt-in using the NEM Desktop wallet. For more information regarding this, see this page.
The opt-in will close on March 12, 2021, and you will be able to opt-in again for up to six years after the Symbol mainnet goes live.
The Symbol mainnet will go live on March 15, 2021.
All eligible holders who held at least 100 XEM at the time of the snapshot will receive free XYM in a 1:1 ratio.
You will be able to claim your XYM coins after the Symbol mainnet goes live.
For more information regarding opt-in and the airdrop, see this post. Also, check out this Youtube channel to see the instructions regarding opt-in.

Name: Bella Protocol
Description:
Bella Protocol is an aggregated user interface for existing Decentralized Finance (DeFi) protocols. Built by the ARPA project team, Bella Protocol aims to simplify the user experience of existing DeFi protocols and to allow users to deploy their assets and earn yield with ease.
Bella Protocol and ARPA Chain are jointly airdropping a total of 2,000,000 BEL tokens to ARPA holders. Hold your ARPA tokens on the supported exchanges during the snapshot period to receive free BEL at a ratio of 5,000 ARPA: 1 BEL.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold ARPA tokens on an exchange that will be supporting the BEL airdrop.
There will be a total of eight rounds, which will last over the course of two years.
The first round will start with a snapshot at 00:00 UTC+8 on Sept 30 and ends on Oct 15. For the complete list of rounds and snapshot dates, see this table:
Rounds Snapshot starts Snapshot ends Amount of BEL
1 30/9/2020 15/10/2020 250,000 BEL
2 30/12/2020 14/1/2021 250,000 BEL
3 30/3/2021 14/4/2021 250,000 BEL
4 30/6/2021 15/7/2021 250,000 BEL
5 30/9/2021 15/10/2021 250,000 BEL
6 30/12/2021 14/1/2022 250,000 BEL
7 30/3/2022 14/4/2022 250,000 BEL
8 30/6/2022 15/7/2022 250,000 BEL
Daily snapshots of your ARPA holdings on the supporting exchanges will be taken during each round.
All eligible ARPA holders will receive free BEL at a ratio of 5,000 ARPA: 1 BEL.
The current partner exchanges that will be supporting the airdrop are Binance, Huobi Global, Bithumb, Gate.io, KuCoin, MXC, HBTC and Ju.com.
Exact details regarding snapshot time, distribution, etc will vary from exchanges to exchanges, so make sure to follow the announcements of the supporting exchanges.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this announcement post.

Name: Bitcoin Rhodium
Description:
Bitcoin Rhodium is not a fork of Bitcoin. It is a new crypto asset, simple and transparent, with long-term vision for investors and scarcity to help drive its value. There will only ever be 2.1 million XRC.
Bitcoin Rhodium is airdropping free XRC to XRC holders. A total of 16,072 XRC will be airdropped to all eligible participants for the next cycle. Just hold XRC in your private wallet for 3 months to receive the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Hold XRC in your private wallet like Electrum, Web wallet, etc.
Each cycle lasts for 3 months and the rewards will be distributed within 2 weeks after the end of each cycle.
There’s no manual action required to receive the rewards.
Snapshot of the individual balances will take place at the beginning and the end of every 3-month cycle.
The closing snapshot for one cycle is also the opening snapshot for another cycle.
The next snapshot will happen on 10/05/2020 00:00:01 UTC (October 5, 2020).
There shouldn’t be any outgoing transaction during the 3 month period.
The rewards will be based on the address’s initial balance for the period, regardless of whether any additional XRC was added to it and the total airdrop poll will be proportionally distributed to the total number of qualified participants.
For more information regarding the airdrop see this post.

Name: Verasity
Description:
Verasity is creating a disruptive video sharing ecosystem that allows the entire community to be paid for their activity, including (but not limited to) creating and watching content.
To celebrate the launch of the Esports Fight Club’s PUBGM tournament, Verasity and OKEx are jointly airdropping up to $27.5 worth of OKB and VRA tokens to the airdrop participants. Create an account at OKEx, open a VeraWallet account and complete level 1 KYC to receive $2.5 worth of VRA tokens. Also make a trade worth at least $50 on OKEx to get $16 worth of OKB and $9 worth of VRA tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at OKEx via this link.
Open a VeraWallet account.
Complete level 1 KYC at OKEx.
Submit your details to this airdrop form.
You will get $2.5 worth of VRA tokens.
Also make a trade worth at least $50 on OKEx by October 12, 2020 to get an extra $16 worth of OKB and $9 worth of VRA tokens. (optional)
Make sure to register on OKEx with the same email address that you’ve used to sign up at VeraWallet.
The tokens will be distributed by October 12, 2020.

Name: Intexcoin
Description:
Intexcoin is a blockchain-based trading project, they are launching sustainable solutions to reduce inequality, hunger and poverty in the world and their token “INTX” is turning some areas to DeFi, putting donations and decentralization on a common basis, and calling this trend DeDo (Decentralized Donation).
Intexcoin and WhiteBIT are jointly airdropping a total of 450,000 INTX to the airdrop participants. Create an account at WhiteBIT, complete simple social tasks and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive 2,000 INTX tokens.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Create an account at WhiteBIT.
Follow Intexcoin on Twitter, post a tweet about Intexcoin and also tag at least three friends.
Follow Intexcoin on Telegram.
Submit your detail to this airdrop form.
You will get 2,000 INTX tokens.

Name: GoodDollar
Description:
GoodDollar is a non-profit organization on a mission to leverage new blockchain technologies to deliver a scalable, sustainable model to deliver basic income. GoodDollar has built a wallet that enables any human with an internet connection to sign up and claim a small daily income in G$ coins.
GoodDollar is airdropping free G$ every day to the airdrop participants. Create an account at GoodDollar and complete your Video KYC verification to claim the 1 G$ registration bonus. Also claim more G$ every day for login in.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the GoodDollar registration page.
Submit your details and sign up.
Verify your mobile and log in.
Now complete your Video KYC verification.
You will get 1 G$ token.
Also claim free G$ every 24 hours.
The number of G$ a user receives every day depends on the number of tokens set aside for a day and the number of unclaimed tokens.
For more information regarding the airdrop see this FAQ.

Name: ARCS
Description:
ARCS chain is a proprietary blockchain for data banking infrastructure. ARCS was developed to make the construction and working of AIre faster. It is a platform that desires to improve well-being for people around the world by empowering individuals through the rights to their data and by valuing the data that they hold. A lot of companies in japan are already considering to use ARCS. ARCS is already listed on KuCoin.
ARCS is airdropping 25 ARX tokens to the first 200 airdrop participants. Create an account at bitCastle, complete your KYC and submit your details to the airdrop form to receive the rewards.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the ARCS airdrop form.
Create an account at bitCastle.
Complete your KYC verification.
The first 200 participants who’ve signed up at bitCastle from the above link, completed KYC and submitted the details to the airdrop form will receive 25 ARX each.
The tokens will be distributed within one week after the end of the airdrop.

Name: OKEx
Description:
OKEx is an exchange platform that allows cryptocurrency investors to trade with BTC, ETH, LTC and other cryptocurrencies in a secure and simple manner.
To celebrate the launch of Uniswap (UNI) on OKEx, the platform is sharing a total prize pool worth 100,000 USDT to new OKEx users. Create an account at OKEx from the airdrop page and complete a deposit worth at least 400 UNI tokens and make a UNI trade worth at least 2,000 USDT to get up to 20 USDT worth of OKB tokens and a 100 USDT worth rebate card.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the OKEx airdrop page.
Click on “Register” and sign up.
Now make a Uniswap (UNI) deposit worth at least 400 UNI tokens to get 10 USDT worth of OKB tokens and a 50 USDT worth rebate card.
Also conduct Uniswap (UNI) trades (Spot/Margin/Perpetual) worth at least 2,000 USDT to get an additional 10 USDT worth of OKB and a 50 USDT rebate card.
The rewards will be distributed to the qualified OKEx uses within 15 days after the end of the airdrop campaign.
For more information regarding the airdrop, see this page.
Learn more about the Uniswap token launch from here.

Name: Uniswap
Description:
Uniswap, a fully decentralized protocol for automated liquidity provision on Еthеrеum, released its governance token UNI.
60% of the UNI genesis supply is allocated to Uniswap community members, a quarter of which (15% of total supply) can be claimed by historical users, liquidity providers, and SOCKS redeemers based on a Snapshot at September 1, 2020 12:00 am UTC.
Step-by-Step Guide:
Visit the Uniswap app.
Connect your ETH wallet.
If your wallet is eligible you will see an “UNI has arrived” popup in the Uniswap app.
Click on “Claim your tokens” and finalize your claim. Don’t forget to set appropriate gas limit due to high gas prices.
If you’re experiencing problems claiming your free UNI, check for alternative claim links from their official social channels.
UNI is already tradable on Binance, KuCoin, Huobi & OkEx. Coinbase listing also has already been annoounced.
For more information about this airdr, see this official announcement.

Name: Raicoin
Description:
Raicoin is a well-decentralized and easily extendable crypto coin offering low latency and high performance transactions. In the Raicoin ecosystem, all nodes with election weight can earn a reward. Join their Telegram group.
Download the Raicoin wallet and submit your wallet address to the bot. **
